original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: n'a ma sam g'i ti britti n'a ma aartha pra sa ka k'a ra na d'i pa n'a ma /
analyzed: n'a ma sam g'i ti britti n'a ma aartha pra sa ka k'a ra na d'i pa n'a ma /
translated: Nāmasamgīti-vṛtti-nāma-arthaprakāśakāraṇadīpanāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
translated: The Commentary on the Recitation of the Names of Mañjuśrī, the Lamp Illuminating the Meaning of the Names, Called the Illuminator of the Meaning🔽Homage to the youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to Mañjuśrī,

original: zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba'i //🔽'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal te //🔽skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zhig gis //
analyzed: zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba'i // 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal te // skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zhig gis //
translated: who possesses the profound and vast body,🔽and for the sake of realizing the recitation of the names of the venerable one

original: rje btsun mtshan brjod rtogs bya'i phyir ;🔽/ bshad pa'i rgyud dang gdams ngag la //
analyzed: rje btsun mtshan brjod rtogs bya'i phyir ; / bshad pa'i rgyud dang gdams ngag la //
translated: by any fortunate yogī,

original: brten te 'bad pas bshad par bya //
analyzed: brten te 'bad pas bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain with effort, relying on the explanatory tantras and instructions.

original: bshad tshul lnga yi sgo phye la //
analyzed: bshad tshul lnga yi sgo phye la //
translated: Having opened the door with the five modes of explanation,

original: ji snyed rigs rnams drug bsdus te //
analyzed: ji snyed rigs rnams drug bsdus te //
translated: as many as the six classes of beings are included,

original: phan yon bcas pa bshad pa yin //
analyzed: phan yon bcas pa bshad pa yin //
translated: and the benefits are explained.

original: de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ji ltar yin pa rtogs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang po rab 'bring gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ji ltar yin pa rtogs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang po rab 'bring gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: For that, there are three types of yogis who wish to realize the name of the pristine consciousness of Mañjuśrījñānasattva.

original: rab la bka' rgyud mdo'i bdag nyid can 'di'i mtshan bshad par bya /
analyzed: rab la bka' rgyud mdo'i bdag nyid can 'di'i mtshan bshad par bya /
translated: For the best, the name of this tantra, which is the essence of the sūtras, will be explained.

original: 'bring la gzhung dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan par bya //
analyzed: 'bring la gzhung dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan par bya //
translated: For the middling, the divisions of the beginning and end of the text will be explained.

original: tha mal yi ge 'bru re re nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: tha mal yi ge 'bru re re nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: For the average, each syllable will be explained.

original: de la dris lan gyi tshul du bshad pa dang / mtha' sdud gsum gyi tshul du bshad pa ni don gnas skabs su sbyar @2a * //
analyzed: de la dris lan gyi tshul du bshad pa dang / mtha' sdud gsum gyi tshul du bshad pa ni don gnas skabs su sbyar @2a * //
translated: The explanation in the manner of questions and answers and the explanation in the manner of the three summaries should be applied to the meaning in the context.

original: bar bya'o // de la dbang po rab mgo smos pas go ba rnams kyi don du rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bar bya'o // de la dbang po rab mgo smos pas go ba rnams kyi don du rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: For the purpose of those of best capacity who understand through an indication, the explanation of the characteristics of the tantra is

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa 'dis bstan te /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa 'dis bstan te /
translated: explained by the words “the name of the noble Mañjuśrī is perfectly expressed.”

original: de la 'phags pa ni gnyis te//
analyzed: de la 'phags pa ni gnyis te//
translated: There are two types of “noble”:

original: brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa dang / rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa'o //🔽de yang ji ltar bsnams na rab dku la /
analyzed: brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa dang / rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa'o // de yang ji ltar bsnams na rab dku la /
translated: It is exalted in terms of the meaning that is expressed and in terms of the words that express it.

original: myang na zhim pa'i sman bzhin du //
analyzed: myang na zhim pa'i sman bzhin du //
translated: Just as there is medicine that smells foul but tastes delicious,

original: chos kyang de bzhin gnyis su gnas //
analyzed: chos kyang de bzhin gnyis su gnas //
translated: so too is the Dharma, which is of two kinds.

original: don dang yi ger shes par bya //
analyzed: don dang yi ger shes par bya //
translated: One should know it in terms of meaning and words.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //🔽de la brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa ni /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // de la brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa ni /
translated: It is like that.

original: rje btsun nyid la 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis las 'phags te /
analyzed: rje btsun nyid la 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis las 'phags te /
translated: It is exalted in terms of the meaning that is expressed because the Exalted One is exalted above the two extremes of cyclic existence and of nirvana.

original: mtha' gnyis la zhen pa ni sgrib pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: mtha' gnyis la zhen pa ni sgrib pa med pa yin te /
translated: Attachment to the two extremes is an obscuration.

original: 'di gnyis las ;
analyzed: 'di gnyis las ;
translated: It is said:

original: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
translated: Liberated from all obscurations,

original: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
analyzed: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
translated: they abide in the equality of space.🔽It is exalted in terms of the words that express it because this very vehicle of means is exalted above the vehicle of dialectics.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //🔽rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa ni thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //🔽rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa ni thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: It is said:

original: thabs mang ba dang thabs mkhas pa dang / thabs sla ba dang / thabs myur ba dang bzhis 'phags te /
analyzed: thabs mang ba dang thabs mkhas pa dang / thabs sla ba dang / thabs myur ba dang bzhis 'phags te /
translated: It is superior by four means: by having many methods, by being skillful in means, by being an easy method, and by being a quick method.🔽And it is said:

original: de yang / don gcig na yang bye brag ni //🔽thabs mang ba dang mkhas pa dang // de bzhin sla dang myur ba yis //
analyzed: de yang / don gcig na yang bye brag ni // thabs mang ba dang mkhas pa dang // de bzhin sla dang myur ba yis //
translated: Even if the meaning is the same,🔽the teaching of mantra is superior🔽by having many methods, by being skillful,

original: sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: and likewise by being easy and quick.

original: de la thabs mang ba ni @2b gdul bya rnams kyi blo la ji ltar mos pa las ma bzlog par grol ba'i thabs mtha' yas par ston pa'o //
analyzed: de la thabs mang ba ni @2b gdul bya rnams kyi blo la ji ltar mos pa las ma bzlog par grol ba'i thabs mtha' yas par ston pa'o //
translated: Therein, it has many methods because it teaches limitless methods for liberation without contradicting the inclinations of the minds of those to be tamed.🔽And it is said:

original: de yang / nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
analyzed: de yang / nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
translated: Abiding on the path of all definite exits.

original: zhes so // nyon mongs ma spangs kyang grol ba'i thabs shes pas thabs mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // nyon mongs ma spangs kyang grol ba'i thabs shes pas thabs mkhas pa'o //
translated: It is skillful in means because it knows the method for liberation even without abandoning the afflictions.🔽And it is said:

original: de yang / mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
analyzed: de yang / mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
translated: Greatly skilled, with great means.

original: zhes pa'o// sgo gsum dka' thub kyis ma gzir bar 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas bzhin du grol ba'i thabs ston pas thabs sla ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o// sgo gsum dka' thub kyis ma gzir bar 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas bzhin du grol ba'i thabs ston pas thabs sla ba'o //
translated: It is an easy method because it teaches the method for liberation while abiding in the enjoyment of desire without being oppressed by the austerities of the three doors.

original: de yang / longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
analyzed: de yang / longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
translated: It is the king of all the sambhogakayas.

original: zhes so // thabs kyi theg pa'i rigs can gyis thams cad gnyis med du rtogs pas /
analyzed: zhes so // thabs kyi theg pa'i rigs can gyis thams cad gnyis med du rtogs pas /
translated: Since those who are of the family of the vehicle of means realize everything as nondual,

original: tshe 'di nyid la byang chub 'grub pas thabs myur ba'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la byang chub 'grub pas thabs myur ba'o //
translated: they attain enlightenment in this very lifetime. Therefore, it is the swift method.

original: de la 'jam dpal ni dbye na rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: de la 'jam dpal ni dbye na rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: Manjushri has five divisions:🔽natural causal Manjushri,🔽meditative path Manjushri,🔽ultimate result Manjushri,🔽Manjushri appearing to pure trainees, and

original: rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal dang // sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal dang // mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal dang // gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal dang / rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal dang // sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal dang // mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal dang // gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal dang / rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal lo //
translated: Manjushri appearing as an aspect.

original: de la rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyis khyab pa ste /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyis khyab pa ste /
translated: Natural causal Manjushri is the dharmata that pervades all phenomena of samsara and nirvana.

original: 'di nyid las /
analyzed: 'di nyid las /
translated: This tantra states:

original: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //
analyzed: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //
translated: Unchanging, all-pervading, and pervasive,

original: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: subtle, uncontaminated, and free from seeds.

original: de la mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa'i zug rdu bral ba dang / rtogs na kun gyi dpal du gyur pas de skad ces bya'o ;
analyzed: de la mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa'i zug rdu bral ba dang / rtogs na kun gyi dpal du gyur pas de skad ces bya'o ;
translated: It is called that because it is free from the pain of the conception of signs, and because it is the glory of all when realized.

original: / sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal ni bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim la sogs te /
analyzed: / sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal ni bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim la sogs te /
translated: The Mañjuśrī of the path of meditation is the stage of generation, the stage of completion, and so forth.

original: lam gyi chos su gyur pa rnams yin te /
analyzed: lam gyi chos su gyur pa rnams yin te /
translated: It is all the phenomena that are the path.

original: 'di nyid las /
analyzed: 'di nyid las /
translated: As it says in this very text:

original: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Abiding on the path of all renunciation.

original: de nyid kyi gnas skabs nas rtogs pa'i zug rngu rnams ni spangs la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi gnas skabs nas rtogs pa'i zug rngu rnams ni spangs la /
translated: From that state, the pain of conception is abandoned,

original: shas shig ni spong ba la zhugs pas 'jam la /
analyzed: shas shig ni spong ba la zhugs pas 'jam la /
translated: and some of it is engaged in abandonment, so it is gentle.

original: de las bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'byung bas dpal lo //
analyzed: de las bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'byung bas dpal lo //
translated: Since one's own and others' benefit arises from that, it is glorious.

original: mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ni sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid la bya ste /
analyzed: mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ni sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid la bya ste /
translated: The ultimate Mañjuśrī of the result is the identity of the three kāyas and the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: 'di nyid las //
analyzed: 'di nyid las //
translated: As it says in this very text:

original: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: The first supreme holder of the three kāyas.

original: de la sku gsum ni thun mong gi dbang du byas na /
analyzed: de la sku gsum ni thun mong gi dbang du byas na /
translated: In that, the three kāyas are the common [kāyas].

original: chos sku skye med nam mkha' lta bu la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad sprin lta bu 'byung ba de las sprul sku sh'akya thub pa char lta bus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: chos sku skye med nam mkha' lta bu la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad sprin lta bu 'byung ba de las sprul sku sh'akya thub pa char lta bus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
translated: In the unborn dharmakāya, which is like space, the sambhogakāya, which is like a cloud, appears as Vairocana. From that, the nirmāṇakāya, Śākyamuni, who is like rain, benefits beings.

original: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na /
analyzed: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na /
translated: In particular,

original: rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
analyzed: rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
translated: naturally luminous awareness is the sambhogakāya.

original: rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba sprul pa'i sku /
analyzed: rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba sprul pa'i sku /
translated: Awareness arising as a diversity is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: ji ltar snang @3a * //
analyzed: ji ltar snang @3a * //
translated: However things appear,

original: yang don skye mad las ma 'das pa chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: yang don skye mad las ma 'das pa chos kyi sku'o //
translated: they are nothing other than the unborn reality, which is the dharmakāya.

original: de la ye shes lnga ni chos nyid skye 'gag med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: de la ye shes lnga ni chos nyid skye 'gag med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
translated: The five wisdoms are as follows: The unborn and unceasing dharmatā is the wisdom of the dharmadhātu.

original: de nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes /
analyzed: de nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes /
translated: That itself, clear yet nonconceptual, is mirrorlike wisdom.

original: de gnyis su dbyer med cing blang dor med pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes //
analyzed: de gnyis su dbyer med cing blang dor med pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes //
translated: Those two are inseparable and free of acceptance and rejection, so it is the wisdom of equality.

original: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par gsal ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
analyzed: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par gsal ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
translated: The individual characteristics of phenomena in general are clearly distinct, so it is discerning wisdom.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don rtsol ba med par grub pas ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don rtsol ba med par grub pas ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Since the aims of self and other are accomplished without effort, it is the wisdom of successful action.

original: de yang 'di nyid las /
analyzed: de yang 'di nyid las /
translated: Moreover, this is stated in the same text:

original: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / ces 'byung ngo //
translated: The lord of all, the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin goms pa'i mthus lha'i sku'i zhal mthong ba'o //
analyzed: gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin goms pa'i mthus lha'i sku'i zhal mthong ba'o //
translated: Mañjuśrī who appears to pure trainees is the vision of the deity’s body through the power of cultivating the yogi’s samādhi.

original: rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa ras pa la ri mo bris pa dang / zangs lcags la 'phur du btod pa de rnams so //
analyzed: rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa ras pa la ri mo bris pa dang / zangs lcags la 'phur du btod pa de rnams so //
translated: Mañjuśrī who appears as an aspect is the deity’s form that appears as a painting on cloth or as a statue cast in copper or iron.

original: gyi zhes pa ni 'brel pa'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: gyi zhes pa ni 'brel pa'i yi ge ste /
translated: The word “also” is a connective particle.

original: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang / yon tan can rje btsun 'jam dpal du 'brel par ston te /
analyzed: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang / yon tan can rje btsun 'jam dpal du 'brel par ston te /
translated: It shows that the qualities mentioned and the one who has those qualities, the venerable Mañjuśrī, are connected.

original: brgya byin gyi ba phra mo zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: brgya byin gyi ba phra mo zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the expression “the fine hair of Indra.”

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa /
translated: The statement “the praise of the names” is as follows.

original: mtshan ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi chos rnams yin la /
analyzed: mtshan ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi chos rnams yin la /
translated: The name is the qualities that will be explained below.

original: yon tan de dag dang rje btsun nyid ldan la /
analyzed: yon tan de dag dang rje btsun nyid ldan la /
translated: The Exalted One is endowed with those qualities.

original: ldan pa kho na ltar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa kho na ltar brjod pa'o //
translated: The name is expressed just as it is endowed.

original: tshul ji ltar brjod na gnyis te /
analyzed: tshul ji ltar brjod na gnyis te /
translated: How is it expressed? There are two:

original: zab pa don gyi sgo nas brjod pa dang / rgya che ba tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: zab pa don gyi sgo nas brjod pa dang / rgya che ba tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa'o //
translated: expressing the profound from the perspective of the meaning and expressing the vast from the perspective of the words.

original: don gyi sgo nas brjod pa ni don gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi sgo nas brjod pa ni don gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'o //
translated: Expressing from the perspective of the meaning is clarifying the nondual pristine consciousness of the meaning.

original: tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa la gsum ste /
analyzed: tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa la gsum ste /
translated: Expressing from the perspective of the words is threefold:

original: mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa dang ; gsang sngags kyi tshul du brdzod pa dang / yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa dang ; gsang sngags kyi tshul du brdzod pa dang / yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa'o //
translated: expressing from the perspective of the nondual characteristic, expressing from the perspective of secret mantra, and expressing from the perspective of qualities.

original: de la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa ni rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su ngo shes par byas la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa ni rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su ngo shes par byas la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
translated: Among those, expressing from the perspective of the nondual characteristic is recognizing one’s mind as the nondual pristine consciousness of the characteristic and then expressing the name.

original: brjod pa'i sgra de dag byung yang skye 'gag med pa'i dang las byung la ;
analyzed: brjod pa'i sgra de dag byung yang skye 'gag med pa'i dang las byung la ;
translated: Although those expressive sounds arise, they arise from the unborn and unceasing expanse.

original: thim yang de nyid du thim ste /
analyzed: thim yang de nyid du thim ste /
translated: And although they dissolve, they dissolve into that expanse.

original: mdor na chos kyi rang sgrar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mdor na chos kyi rang sgrar shes par bya'o //
translated: In brief, they should be understood as the natural sound of the Dharma.

original: 'di nyid las /
analyzed: 'di nyid las /
translated: This very tantra states:

original: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
translated: Nondual, taught as nondual,

original: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Abiding in the limit of reality.

original: mtshan sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa ni bdag nyid rje btsun 'jam dpal du bskoms te mtshan brjod pas thugs @3b ka'i mum las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod pa dang / sems can gyi don byas slar rang gi thugs kar thim /
analyzed: mtshan sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa ni bdag nyid rje btsun 'jam dpal du bskoms te mtshan brjod pas thugs @3b ka'i mum las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod pa dang / sems can gyi don byas slar rang gi thugs kar thim /
translated: Recitation in the manner of a name mantra is as follows: Having transformed yourself into Venerable Mañjuśrī, by reciting the name, light rays radiate from the mūṃ in the heart, make offerings to the āryas, benefit sentient beings, and return and dissolve into your heart.

original: yang snga ma ltar spro zhing bsdus te /
analyzed: yang snga ma ltar spro zhing bsdus te /
translated: Again, radiate and gather as before.

original: mtshan klag pa ma thon gyi bar du ci rigs su bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan klag pa ma thon gyi bar du ci rigs su bya ba'o //
translated: Do this as much as you like until you have finished reciting the name.

original: de yang 'di nyid las /
analyzed: de yang 'di nyid las /
translated: This very tantra states:

original: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: The essence of the great way of mantra.

original: mtshan yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa ni rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid la 'khor sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pas bskor ba /
analyzed: mtshan yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa ni rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid la 'khor sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pas bskor ba /
translated: The expression of his good qualities as a name is that the venerable Manjusri himself is surrounded by an immeasurable retinue of Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, Sravakas, and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
translated: Having invited him into the space in front of you, you should recite his names.

original: 'di yang khyod kyi yon tan yin zhes dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang khyod kyi yon tan yin zhes dmigs pa'o //
translated: The visualization is that you say, “This is one of your good qualities.”

original: de yang 'di nyid las /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
analyzed: de yang 'di nyid las / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
translated: Moreover, this is stated in the Manjusri Nama Sangiti:

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: “The ocean of the good qualities of the Tathagata.”

original: de dag kyang bsdun don zab pa dang / tshig rgya che ba gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag kyang bsdun don zab pa dang / tshig rgya che ba gnyis te /
translated: Those are also summarized as two: profound meaning and extensive words.

original: 'di nyid las /
analyzed: 'di nyid las /
translated: This is stated in the Manjusri Nama Sangiti:

original: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: “The sound of the profound and extensive.”

original: da ni bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phyag btsal pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phyag btsal pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to pacify obstacles, the homage is taught:🔽“Homage to the youthful Manjusri.”

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smos te /🔽phyag na rdo rjes sh'akya thub pa la zhus nas /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smos te /🔽phyag na rdo rjes sh'akya thub pa la zhus nas /
translated: Vajrapani asked Shakyamuni,

original: glegs bam du sdud pa'i dus su /
analyzed: glegs bam du sdud pa'i dus su /
translated: At the time of compiling the tantra into a book,

original: slad du yi dam lha la phyag 'tshal ba yin te /
analyzed: slad du yi dam lha la phyag 'tshal ba yin te /
translated: he paid homage to the meditation deity for the sake of future disciples.

original: 'on phyag na rdo rje la yang bar chad 'byung ngam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on phyag na rdo rje la yang bar chad 'byung ngam zhe na /
translated: One might ask, “Does Vajrapāṇi have obstacles?”

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, he does not.

original: rjes 'jug gi don du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rjes 'jug gi don du dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is stated with the intention of benefiting future disciples.

original: de yang 'jam dpal ni gong du bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yang 'jam dpal ni gong du bshad zin to //
translated: Mañjuśrī has already been explained above.

original: sku dus gsum du bgres rgud mi mnga' bas gzhon nu ste /
analyzed: sku dus gsum du bgres rgud mi mnga' bas gzhon nu ste /
translated: He is a youth because his body does not age or deteriorate in the three times.

original: rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba lta bu'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba lta bu'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He always abides in the manner of the present.

original: la ni dkar ba'i yi ge ste 'jam dpal nyid la'o //
analyzed: la ni dkar ba'i yi ge ste 'jam dpal nyid la'o //
translated: The syllable la is white and is placed on Mañjuśrī himself.

original: phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa /
translated: Homage is paid

original: zab pa don rtogs pa'i phyag dang / rgya che lus ngag yid gsum gus pa'i tshul gyis phyag btsal ba'o//
analyzed: zab pa don rtogs pa'i phyag dang / rgya che lus ngag yid gsum gus pa'i tshul gyis phyag btsal ba'o//
translated: with the homage of realizing the profound meaning and with the homage of the body, speech, and mind respectfully bowing.

original: de la dbang po 'bring gi don du dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la dbang po 'bring gi don du dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the divisions of the beginning and end for the sake of those of average capacity is as follows.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas le'u bcu bzhir ston pa las dang por zhus pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas le'u bcu bzhir ston pa las dang por zhus pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Following the explanatory tantra, the text is presented in fourteen chapters.

original: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Then, the glorious Vajradhara,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig yin te gong du rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa bshad pa'i rjes su mtshan yang dag par brjod pa man ngag gi snying po glur blangs pa'i le'u 'di zhus zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig yin te gong du rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa bshad pa'i rjes su mtshan yang dag par brjod pa man ngag gi snying po glur blangs pa'i le'u 'di zhus zhes pa'o //
translated: Then is a connective word, meaning after explaining the root tantra in sixteen thousand chapters, request this chapter of the Song of the Essence of Intimate Instructions, the Explanation of the Names.

original: dpal ni rtogs pa bdag gi dpal //
analyzed: dpal ni rtogs pa bdag gi dpal //
translated: GloriOus is the glory of realization for oneself,🔽and compassion is the glory of others,

original: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal gnyis dang // phyag na rdo rje nyid ldan pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal gnyis dang // phyag na rdo rje nyid ldan pa'o //
translated: endowed with Vajrapani himself.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba ni //🔽nad @4a * //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba ni // nad @4a * //
translated: Vajradhara means🔽holding the profound meaning vajra

original: na zab pa don gyi rdo rje ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed par 'chang ngo //
analyzed: na zab pa don gyi rdo rje ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed par 'chang ngo //
translated: of the indivisible five wisdoms.🔽Moreover, it is said:

original: de yang / mi phyed rdo rje zhes brjod de //🔽sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pu'o //
analyzed: de yang / mi phyed rdo rje zhes brjod de // sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pu'o //
translated: It is called the indivisible vajra,

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: the being, the sole one in the three existences.

original: don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rtags su rgya che ba lcags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rtags su rgya che ba lcags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: As a sign of possessing that meaning, he holds a vast iron five-pronged vajra.

original: des mdzad pa'i phrin las ci mdzad ce na /🔽gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog / dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
analyzed: des mdzad pa'i phrin las ci mdzad ce na / gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog / dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
translated: What is the enlightened activity that he performs?

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: He is the supreme tamer of those difficult to tame, the hero who conquers the three worlds.

original: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs te /
analyzed: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs te /
translated: Brahma, Vishnu, and so forth

original: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la /
analyzed: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la /
translated: are difficult to tame.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ri rab kyi rtse mor phyag na rdo rje la dbang bskur bas mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ri rab kyi rtse mor phyag na rdo rje la dbang bskur bas mchog ces bya'o //
translated: Since all buddhas gather and confer empowerment upon Vajrapani on the peak of Mount Meru, he is called supreme.

original: rang 'jigs pa dang bral zhing gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas dpa' la /
analyzed: rang 'jigs pa dang bral zhing gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas dpa' la /
translated: Since he is free from fear and destroys the armies of others, he is a hero.

original: sa 'og gi bdag po ma h'a de ba dang / sa stengs kyi bdag po khyab 'jug / sa bla'i bdag po tshangs pa dang gsum ni phyi rol pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum yin la /
analyzed: sa 'og gi bdag po ma h'a de ba dang / sa stengs kyi bdag po khyab 'jug / sa bla'i bdag po tshangs pa dang gsum ni phyi rol pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum yin la /
translated: The lord of the underworld is Mahakala, the lord of the earth is Vishnu, and the lord of the earth is Brahma.

original: de gsum btul bas 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: de gsum btul bas 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'o //
translated: Since he tames those three, he is the conqueror of the three worlds.

original: de yang nang du nyon mongs pa gsum btul ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: de yang nang du nyon mongs pa gsum btul ba'i rtags so //
translated: That is also the sign of taming the three afflictions internally.

original: de'i rigs dang rtags gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rigs dang rtags gang zhe na /
translated: What is his type and sign?

original: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal // zhes smos te /
translated: Vajra Lord of Secrets, Victor.

original: rdo rje'i rigs yin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sdud pa po rdo rje theg pa'i mda' bdag tu gyur pas kyang rdo rje dbang phyug go //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs yin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sdud pa po rdo rje theg pa'i mda' bdag tu gyur pas kyang rdo rje dbang phyug go //
translated: He is the Vajra Family, and also the Lord of Secrets of the Vajra Vehicle, because he is the compiler of the Secret Mantra.

original: gsang ba'i dam tshig dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dam tshig dang ldan zhing /
translated: He is the Victor because he is endowed with the secret commitments,

original: nang gi nyon mongs pa dang gdug pa can rnams las rgyal bas rgyal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi nyon mongs pa dang gdug pa can rnams las rgyal bas rgyal zhes bya'o //
translated: and because he is victorious over the inner afflictions and the wicked.

original: de'i zhal ras ci 'dra zhe na /🔽padma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan //
analyzed: de'i zhal ras ci 'dra zhe na / padma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan //
translated: What is the appearance of his face?🔽Eyes like a full-blown white lotus,

original: padma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: padma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba // zhes smos te /
translated: Face like a full-blown lotus.

original: padma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: padma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa dang 'dra bar /
translated: Like a lotus born from the mud, but unstained by the faults of the mud,

original: phyag na rdo rje nyid shin tu khro khro 'dra yang nang na nyon mongs pa med pas dkar ba'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje nyid shin tu khro khro 'dra yang nang na nyon mongs pa med pas dkar ba'o //
translated: Vajrapāṇi himself is very wrathful, but white because he is without inner afflictions.

original: spyan kun du zlum pas rgyas 'dra'i spyan no //
analyzed: spyan kun du zlum pas rgyas 'dra'i spyan no //
translated: His eyes are full-blown because they are round.

original: de'i phyag mtshan ci 'dra zhe na //
analyzed: de'i phyag mtshan ci 'dra zhe na //
translated: What are his hand implements?

original: rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog / yang dag yang du gsor byed pa //
analyzed: rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog / yang dag yang du gsor byed pa //
translated: is raised again and again.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: lag gi rdo rje de don gyi rtags su byung bas mchog go//
analyzed: lag gi rdo rje de don gyi rtags su byung bas mchog go//
translated: The vajra in his hand is supreme because it arises as the sign of the meaning.

original: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa ni /
analyzed: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa ni /
translated: It is raised again and again.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo yang nas yang du skor cig bar zhu ba 'bul ba'i brda yang yin /🔽thugs rje rgyun mi chad pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i brda yang yin /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo yang nas yang du skor cig bar zhu ba 'bul ba'i brda yang yin / thugs rje rgyun mi chad pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i brda yang yin /
translated: This is also an offering to the Bhagavān of the request to turn the wheel of dharma again and again.🔽It is also a sign of continuously guiding migrating beings with compassion.

original: gdug pa can rgyun mi chad par 'dul ba'i brda yang yin /
analyzed: gdug pa can rgyun mi chad par 'dul ba'i brda yang yin /
translated: It is also a sign of continuously subduing the wicked.

original: nang na ye shes rgyun mi chad par mnga' @4b ba'i brda yang yin //
analyzed: nang na ye shes rgyun mi chad par mnga' @4b ba'i brda yang yin //
translated: It is also a sign of continuously possessing gnosis internally.

original: de yi grogs gang dang lhan cig tu zhus she na /
analyzed: de yi grogs gang dang lhan cig tu zhus she na /
translated: With whom did he make this request?

original: 'khor lag na rdo rje khro tshogs lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu zhus pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'khor lag na rdo rje khro tshogs lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu zhus pa'i phyir //
translated: He made the request together with the retinue of five hundred wrathful vajra holders.

original: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
analyzed: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
translated: Wrinkles, and so on.

original: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
translated: Vajrapāṇis are infinite.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: khro gnyer ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang / spyan bzlog pa dang / smin ma bsdus pa dang / 'bri gu ta gyen du 'greng ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro gnyer ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang / spyan bzlog pa dang / smin ma bsdus pa dang / 'bri gu ta gyen du 'greng ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Frowning is the bared fangs, rolling the eyes, knitting the brows, and raising the eyebrows.

original: khro tshogs de dag la yang yon tan dang mthu mtha' yas pa dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: khro tshogs de dag la yang yon tan dang mthu mtha' yas pa dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: These wrathful hosts also have infinite good qualities and powers.

original: de dag gis phrin las ci mdzad ce na //🔽dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
analyzed: de dag gis phrin las ci mdzad ce na // dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
translated: What activity do they perform?

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: The hero who tames the difficult to tame.

original: gong du bshad pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gong du bshad pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: This is as explained above.

original: ci'i phyir gdul dka' zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gdul dka' zhe na /
translated: Why are they difficult to tame?

original: drag po btsan thabs kyis 'dul dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag po btsan thabs kyis 'dul dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they must be tamed with fierce force.

original: de'i nyams ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: de'i nyams ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is their experience like?

original: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byed can //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byed can // zhes smos te /
translated: The terrifying and heroic.

original: khro bo'i cha byad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i cha byad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: They have the appearance of wrathful ones.

original: de dag gi phyag mtshan ci zhe na //
analyzed: de dag gi phyag mtshan ci zhe na //
translated: What are their hand implements?

original: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
translated: The vajra with a very sharp point

original: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa // zhes smos te /
translated: is brandished in their hands.

original: rdo rje'i rtse mo las rdo rje phra mo byung nas gdug pa can 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rtse mo las rdo rje phra mo byung nas gdug pa can 'dul ba'o //
translated: Vajra sparks emerge from the tip of the vajra and tame the wicked.

original: de dag kyang gtso bo'i rjes mthun du sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang gtso bo'i rjes mthun du sbyong ba'o //
translated: These are also practiced in accordance with the principal one.

original: de dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par ci zhe na //
analyzed: de dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par ci zhe na //
translated: What is the difference in their intentions?

original: snying rje che dang shes rab dang // thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog //🔽ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: snying rje che dang shes rab dang // thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog // ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Great compassion, wisdom, and skillful means are the best for benefiting beings.

original: 'gro ba rnams la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ni rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ni rgya che ba'o //
translated: Having great compassion for beings is vast.

original: shes rab kyi chos rnam par 'byed pa ni zab pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi chos rnam par 'byed pa ni zab pa'o //
translated: The discernment of phenomena through wisdom is profound.

original: thabs de lta bus gzhan don byed pas na mchog go //
analyzed: thabs de lta bus gzhan don byed pas na mchog go //
translated: Benefiting others through such skillful means is the best.

original: yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bus she na //
analyzed: yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bus she na //
translated: By what kind of special qualities?

original: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
analyzed: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
translated: With the intention of joy, delight, and satisfaction.

original: zhes pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dga' //
analyzed: zhes pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dga' //
translated: They delight in benefiting beings.

original: ston pa mthong ba na mgu /
analyzed: ston pa mthong ba na mgu /
translated: When seeing the teacher, they are delighted.

original: chos bshad pas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsam pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: chos bshad pas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsam pa yod pa'o //
translated: They have the intention of rejoicing in the explanation of the Dharma.

original: gzugs ci dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las byed ce na //
analyzed: gzugs ci dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las byed ce na //
translated: What kind of form do they have to perform the activity of the buddhas?

original: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
analyzed: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
translated: Having the form of a wrathful body,

original: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
translated: they are the protectors who perform the activity of the buddhas.

original: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
translated: but with a very respectful manner, they bow their bodies and make requests.🔽In what manner or method do they make requests?🔽Having bowed to the Tathagata, the Bhagavan,🔽the perfect🔽Buddha,🔽having joined palms,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: sitting in his presence, they said this:

original: rgyan dang rang bzhin khro bor gnas shing mdzad pa bcu gnyis sam phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad la /
analyzed: rgyan dang rang bzhin khro bor gnas shing mdzad pa bcu gnyis sam phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad la /
translated: It is said that they, abiding in the ornaments and nature of wrath, perform the benefit of migrators by means of the twelve deeds or the four activities.

original: khro bo de rnams kyis kyang bag med du ma yin te /
analyzed: khro bo de rnams kyis kyang bag med du ma yin te /
translated: And those wrathful ones are not heedless,

original: shin tu gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud nas zhus pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud nas zhus pa'o //
translated: but with a very respectful manner, they bow their bodies and make requests.

original: tshul lam thabs ji ltar zhus she na /
analyzed: tshul lam thabs ji ltar zhus she na /
translated: In what manner or method do they make requests?🔽Having bowed to the Tathagata, the Bhagavan,🔽the perfect🔽Buddha,🔽having joined palms,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
translated: sitting in his presence, they said this:

original: rdzogs @5a * //
analyzed: rdzogs @5a * //
translated: It is said that they, abiding in the ornaments and nature of wrath, perform the benefit of migrators by means of the twelve deeds or the four activities.🔽And those wrathful ones are not heedless,🔽but with a very respectful manner, they bow their bodies and make requests.🔽In what manner or method do they make requests?🔽Having bowed to the Tathagata, the Bhagavan,🔽the perfect🔽Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: having joined palms,🔽sitting in his presence, they said this:🔽It is said that they, abiding in the ornaments and nature of wrath, perform the benefit of migrators by means of the twelve deeds or the four activities.🔽And those wrathful ones are not heedless,

original: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
translated: but with a very respectful manner, they bow their bodies and make requests.🔽In what manner or method do they make requests?🔽Having bowed to the Tathagata, the Bhagavan,🔽the perfect🔽Buddha,🔽having joined palms,

original: spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol // zhes smos te /
translated: sitting in his presence, they said this:

original: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang // 'gro ba'i don la gshegs shing bdud bzhi bcom /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang // 'gro ba'i don la gshegs shing bdud bzhi bcom /
translated: It is said that they, abiding in the ornaments and nature of wrath, perform the benefit of migrators by means of the twelve deeds or the four activities.🔽And those wrathful ones are not heedless,🔽but with a very respectful manner, they bow their bodies and make requests.

original: legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa che ba'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa /🔽ma rig pa'i sgrib pa sangs rgyas shing ye shes rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa che ba'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa /🔽ma rig pa'i sgrib pa sangs rgyas shing ye shes rgyas pa ste /
translated: In what manner or method do they make requests?

original: de yang ma rig gnyid ni sangs phyir dang // shes bya la yang blo rgyas phyir //
analyzed: de yang ma rig gnyid ni sangs phyir dang // shes bya la yang blo rgyas phyir //
translated: Because the sleep of ignorance has been awakened, and because the mind has expanded with respect to objects of knowledge,

original: sangs rgyas padmo ltar sangs rgyas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas padmo ltar sangs rgyas //
translated: the Buddha is like a lotus flower.

original: zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus it is.

original: de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'i bar du rdo rje bcu gnas /
analyzed: de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'i bar du rdo rje bcu gnas /
translated: In the space between their palms, there are ten vajras.

original: mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug nas zhus pa'o //
analyzed: mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug nas zhus pa'o //
translated: They sat down in front of him, squatting on their heels, and made their request.

original: dgos ched ci'i don du zhus she na /
analyzed: dgos ched ci'i don du zhus she na /
translated: For what purpose did they make their request?🔽For the sake of my welfare, O all-pervading lord,

original: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
analyzed: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
translated: out of love for me,🔽may I attain enlightenment,

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa'i //🔽byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa'i // byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //
translated: which is the perfection of the web of magic.

original: ces smos te /
analyzed: ces smos te /
translated: Thus it is.

original: brtan g-yo kun la khyab pas na khyab bdag ces ston ba la bos nas /
analyzed: brtan g-yo kun la khyab pas na khyab bdag ces ston ba la bos nas /
translated: Addressing the Teacher, they call him “all-pervading lord” because he pervades all things stable and moving.

original: 'khor bdag cag rnams la sman pa dang / thugs brtse bar mdzad pas thabs dang shes rab khyad par can zung du 'brel pas sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor bdag cag rnams la sman pa dang / thugs brtse bar mdzad pas thabs dang shes rab khyad par can zung du 'brel pas sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
translated: Out of love for us, his disciples, he has attained the union of the special method and wisdom that is the “web of magic.”

original: de'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bdag gis thob par mdzod cig pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bdag gis thob par mdzod cig pa ste /
translated: By that means, may I attain manifest complete enlightenment.

original: rang don gzhan don dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: rang don gzhan don dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: This is related to one's own aim and the aim of others.

original: 'o na bdag gi don zhus pa de yin na /
analyzed: 'o na bdag gi don zhus pa de yin na /
translated: Well then, if that is the request for one's own aim,

original: gzhan gyi don du zhus pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don du zhus pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: what is the request for the aim of others?🔽To that, it says:🔽In order to heal all sentient beings

original: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
translated: who are disturbed by afflictions

original: mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi //
analyzed: mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi //
translated: and sunk in the mud of ignorance,

original: sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir // zhes smos te /
translated: and to attain the unsurpassed fruit.

original: zhe sdang la sogs pa nyon mongs pas byang chub sems chu rnyogs pa lta bur dkrugs shing /
analyzed: zhe sdang la sogs pa nyon mongs pas byang chub sems chu rnyogs pa lta bur dkrugs shing /
translated: The afflictions such as hatred disturb the mind of the bodhisattva like muddy water.

original: de kho na nyid mi shes te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid mi shes te /
translated: And one does not know suchness.

original: glang po che 'dam du chud pa ltar sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor chud pa'i sems can kun la /
analyzed: glang po che 'dam du chud pa ltar sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor chud pa'i sems can kun la /
translated: Like an elephant sunk in mud, all sentient beings are sunk in the ocean of suffering.

original: de las bzlog nas tshe 'dir sman par bya ba dang / tshe phyi ma la bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog nas tshe 'dir sman par bya ba dang / tshe phyi ma la bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The request is: Please explain the Dharma for the sake of this life, and for the sake of attaining the unsurpassed fruit of enlightenment in the next life, in order to reverse that.

original: ston pa gang la zhus she na /
analyzed: ston pa gang la zhus she na /
translated: To which teacher should one make the request?

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The perfect Buddha, the Bhagavan,

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
translated: the guru and teacher of beings,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: is mentioned.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus zhes pa'o //
translated: The request is made to the perfect Buddha, the Bhagavan, who has accomplished all one's own and others' goals.

original: des 'gro ba rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: des 'gro ba rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: That teacher teaches the Dharma to beings.

original: ston @5b pa des don mi mkhyen pa mi srid dam zhe na /
analyzed: ston @5b pa des don mi mkhyen pa mi srid dam zhe na /
translated: If one wonders, Is it not impossible for that teacher not to know the meaning?

original: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
translated: The supreme one who knows the truth of the great commitment🔽is mentioned.

original: zhes so // don rtogs pa las mi 'da' bas dam tshig chen po ste /
analyzed: zhes so // don rtogs pa las mi 'da' bas dam tshig chen po ste /
translated: Since one does not transgress the meaning that is realized, it is the great commitment.

original: de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o //
translated: That is knowing the nature of things as they are.

original: des gdul bya'i dbang po dang bsam pa mkhyen zhe na /
analyzed: des gdul bya'i dbang po dang bsam pa mkhyen zhe na /
translated: If one wonders, Does that teacher know the faculties and thoughts of those to be tamed?

original: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
analyzed: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
translated: The supreme one who knows the faculties and thoughts🔽is mentioned.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is what is meant.🔽🔽

original: dbang po'i bye brag gang la gang mos mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i bye brag gang la gang mos mkhyen pa'o //
translated: This is the knowledge of the Lord, which is the knowledge of the various faculties of beings and of the various inclinations of beings.

original: 'on chos gang zhu zhe na /
analyzed: 'on chos gang zhu zhe na /
translated: What is the Dharma that is requested?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
translated: The wisdom body of the Lord,🔽the great uṣṇīṣa, the master of words,

original: gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag / ye shes sku ste rang byung ba //
analyzed: gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag / ye shes sku ste rang byung ba //
translated: the wisdom body, self-arisen,

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
translated: Mañjuśrī, the wisdom being,

original: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / ces smos te /
analyzed: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / ces smos te /
translated: the supreme expression of the name.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku ni /
translated: The wisdom body of the Lord

original: me long ltar thams cad la gsal zhing 'char bas me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: me long ltar thams cad la gsal zhing 'char bas me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: is the mirror-like wisdom, because it is clear and arises like a mirror for everything.

original: gtsug tor chen po ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur ba'i 'os yin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //🔽tshig gi bdag po ni chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'i sgo nas chos kyi tshig gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: gtsug tor chen po ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur ba'i 'os yin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so // tshig gi bdag po ni chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'i sgo nas chos kyi tshig gsungs pa ste /
translated: The great uṣṇīṣa is the wisdom of equality, because it is the crown of the head, the uṣṇīṣa, of all dharmas, and is worthy of being honored by all.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The master of words is the wisdom of discernment, because it is the expression of the words of the Dharma through the knowledge of the general and specific characteristics of phenomena.

original: ye shes sku ni 'gro ba'i bya ba grub par byed pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: ye shes sku ni 'gro ba'i bya ba grub par byed pa'i sku ste /
translated: The wisdom body is the body that accomplishes the activities of beings.

original: de yang ye shes las grub pa'i sku yin pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de yang ye shes las grub pa'i sku yin pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Moreover, since it is a body that is accomplished from wisdom, it is the wisdom that accomplishes activities.

original: rang 'byung ba ni skye ba med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: rang 'byung ba ni skye ba med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: Self-arisen is the wisdom of the dharmadhatu, which is nonarising.

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni /
translated: Manjushri, the wisdom being,

original: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: is the root bodhichitta.

original: ye shes chen pos mnyan pa nyid la sems la thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen pos mnyan pa nyid la sems la thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o //
translated: He is called “wisdom” because he thinks of the benefit of beings with compassion.

original: de'i rtags gzugs skur byung ba la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rtags gzugs skur byung ba la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The form body that arises as the sign of that is also called that.

original: tshig dang don gyi sgo nas de'i ming yang dag par brjod pa ni gzhan pas don che bas na mchog go //
analyzed: tshig dang don gyi sgo nas de'i ming yang dag par brjod pa ni gzhan pas don che bas na mchog go //
translated: The perfect expression of his name from the perspective of words and meaning is supreme because it is more meaningful than others.

original: mdor na ye shes lnga byang chub sems dang drug ro gcig pa'i chos gcig zhus pa'o //
analyzed: mdor na ye shes lnga byang chub sems dang drug ro gcig pa'i chos gcig zhus pa'o //
translated: In brief, he is the single dharma of the single taste of the five wisdoms and bodhichitta.

original: 'o na ming las don ma zhus sam zhe na //
analyzed: 'o na ming las don ma zhus sam zhe na //
translated: Well then, if the name is not the meaning, is the meaning not requested?

original: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
analyzed: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
translated: The meaning is profound, the meaning is vast,

original: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //
analyzed: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //
translated: the great meaning is incomparable, and it is utterly peaceful.

original: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba // zhes smos te /
translated: It is virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: ci'i phyir na don zab ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na don zab ce na /
translated: Why is the meaning profound?

original: don chen po gsang sngags kyi don chos mnyam pa nyid yin pas kyang zab /
analyzed: don chen po gsang sngags kyi don chos mnyam pa nyid yin pas kyang zab /
translated: It is profound because the meaning of the great meaning of secret mantra is the equality of phenomena.

original: chos gang dang yang mtshungs pa med pas kyang zab /
analyzed: chos gang dang yang mtshungs pa med pas kyang zab /
translated: It is profound because it is not the same as any phenomenon.

original: spros pa'i mtshan ma rab tu zhi bas kyang zab /
analyzed: spros pa'i mtshan ma rab tu zhi bas kyang zab /
translated: It is profound because the signs of conceptual elaborations are completely pacified.

original: dge ba gsum gyi rgya dang ldan pas kyang zab //🔽dus gsum gyi @6a * //
analyzed: dge ba gsum gyi rgya dang ldan pas kyang zab // dus gsum gyi @6a * //
translated: It is profound because it is endowed with the seal of the three virtues.

original: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas kyang zab /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas kyang zab /
translated: It is profound because it is taught by the buddhas of the three times.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i glu yin pas kyang zab /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i glu yin pas kyang zab /
translated: It is profound because it is a song of the Vajrayāna.

original: de ltar brjod bya zab pas rjod byed kyang zab po //
analyzed: de ltar brjod bya zab pas rjod byed kyang zab po //
translated: Thus, because the subject matter is profound, the expression is also profound.

original: rgya che ba ni rnam sprul sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
analyzed: rgya che ba ni rnam sprul sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
translated: Vast means appearing as various emanations.

original: gang dang yang mi mnyam pas mtshungs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang dang yang mi mnyam pas mtshungs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is unequaled because it is not the same as anything.

original: sbros pa'i mtha' thams cad rab tu zhib /🔽thog mar dge ba thos pa'i shes rab /🔽bar du dge ba bsam pa'i shes rab /
analyzed: sbros pa'i mtha' thams cad rab tu zhib / thog mar dge ba thos pa'i shes rab / bar du dge ba bsam pa'i shes rab /
translated: It is completely pacified because all elaborations are pacified.🔽It is virtuous in the beginning because of the wisdom of hearing.🔽It is virtuous in the middle because of the wisdom of contemplation.

original: tha mar dge ba bsgom pa'i shes rab po //
analyzed: tha mar dge ba bsgom pa'i shes rab po //
translated: It is virtuous in the end because of the wisdom of meditation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: nyon mongs pa rtsad nas 'byin pas dge ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rtsad nas 'byin pas dge ba'o //
translated: Because it is virtuous, since it eradicates the afflictions from the root.

original: de sus gsungs she na /
analyzed: de sus gsungs she na /
translated: Who taught it?

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: The buddhas of the past taught it,

original: ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la //
analyzed: ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la //
translated: and the buddhas of the future will teach it.

original: da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas //🔽yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas // yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang //
translated: The perfect buddhas of the present🔽repeatedly teach it.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: rgyal ba sh'akya thub pas ri bya rkang can du phyag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs pa'i dus su /
analyzed: rgyal ba sh'akya thub pas ri bya rkang can du phyag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs pa'i dus su /
translated: When the Victor Shakyamuni taught this to Vajrapani on Vulture Peak,

original: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams padmo can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams padmo can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: through his blessing, the world system to the north called Padmavati

original: de bzhin gshegs pa padmo mchog ces bya bas kyang 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa padmo mchog ces bya bas kyang 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so //
translated: was also taught by the Tathagata called Padma-shri to the bodhisattvas in his retinue.

original: de bzhin du phyogs lnga por yang gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyogs lnga por yang gsungs so //
translated: And it was also taught in the five directions.

original: chos nyid kyi mkha' rnam par dag pas kyang sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gis 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi mkha' rnam par dag pas kyang sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gis 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di gsungs so //
translated: And also in the space of the pure nature of reality, Buddha Vajradhara taught this to the retinue of tathagatas.

original: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis kyang 'og min du 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis kyang 'og min du 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so //
translated: And also glorious Vairochana taught this to the retinue of bodhisattvas in Akanishtha.

original: ri rab kyi rtser sprul sku 'khor los sgyur ba lta bus kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: ri rab kyi rtser sprul sku 'khor los sgyur ba lta bus kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la 'di gsungs so //
translated: And also on the peak of Mount Meru, the emanation body, the chakravartin, taught this to the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-three.

original: dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang lha rnams la yang rgyal ba byams pa la 'di gsungs so//
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang lha rnams la yang rgyal ba byams pa la 'di gsungs so//
translated: And also in the realm of Tushita, the conqueror Maitreya taught this to the gods.🔽And not only that, even pebbles, sticks, space, and so on, the sound of this arises.

original: der yang ma zad de rde'u dang shing bu dang nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang 'di'i sgra grag pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: der yang ma zad de rde'u dang shing bu dang nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang 'di'i sgra grag pa 'byung ngo //
translated: And also:

original: de yang / sems dpa' mchog gi bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de yang / sems dpa' mchog gi bstan pa ni //
translated: The teaching of the supreme bodhisattvas🔽is mastered, realized,🔽in space, in all forms,

original: dbang sbyor ba dang rtogs pa dang // mkha' dang gzugs ni thams cad dang // nam mkha' las kyang grag par 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang sbyor ba dang rtogs pa dang // mkha' dang gzugs ni thams cad dang // nam mkha' las kyang grag par 'gyur //
translated: and also from the sky.

original: zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
translated: This is stated.

original: de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud khri drug stong bar yang lan gcig bshad //
analyzed: de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud khri drug stong bar yang lan gcig bshad //
translated: That very [tantra] was explained once in the root tantra in sixteen thousand [verses].

original: phyis dga' ba spyod pa 'dir yang lan gcig bshad de /
analyzed: phyis dga' ba spyod pa 'dir yang lan gcig bshad de /
translated: Later, it was explained once here in the Conduct of Joy.

original: sh'akya thub pas lan gnyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sh'akya thub pas lan gnyis bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus, it was explained twice by Shakyamuni.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba glur blangs pa'i don gang yin na //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba glur blangs pa'i don gang yin na //
translated: What is the meaning of the songs of the Net of Illusion?

original: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
analyzed: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
translated: In the great tantra, the Net of Illusion,🔽the holders of secret mantra,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen gsang @6b sngags 'chang //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen gsang @6b sngags 'chang //
translated: the great Vajradharas,

original: dpag med rnams kyi bka' bzhin du //
analyzed: dpag med rnams kyi bka' bzhin du //
translated: in accordance with the words of the immeasurable ones,

original: glu blangs gar lags bshad du gsol //
analyzed: glu blangs gar lags bshad du gsol //
translated: sang songs and performed dances.

original: zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba la sogs par rdo rje 'chang gis kyang don dpag tu med pa rdo rje'i glu gsungs nas 'khor rnams dga' ba bskyed pa de bzhin du /

translated: Excellent, Vajrapani!

original: gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas //
translated: Therefore, O Lord of Secrets,

original: khyod la legs par bstan par bya //
analyzed: khyod la legs par bstan par bya //
translated: I will teach it well to you.

original: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon // zhes smos te /
translated: You should listen with a one-pointed mind!

original: sh'akya thub pa nga la khyod nyan pa ni legs so //
analyzed: sh'akya thub pa nga la khyod nyan pa ni legs so //
translated: It is excellent that you listen to me, Shakyamuni.

original: ci'i phyir legs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir legs she na /
translated: Why is it excellent?

original: 'jam dpal gyis don dri pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis don dri pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because Manjushri asks about the meaning.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sdud pa po la bos na /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sdud pa po la bos na /
translated: Having addressed the compiler as Lord of Secrets,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bye dpa de'i phyir /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bye dpa de'i phyir /
translated: in order to benefit future sentient beings,

original: khyod la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rigs drug gi bdag nyid can legs par bstan par bya yis /
analyzed: khyod la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rigs drug gi bdag nyid can legs par bstan par bya yis /
translated: I will teach you the recitation of the names, which has the nature of the six families.

original: khyod rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig ces bskul ba'o //
analyzed: khyod rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig ces bskul ba'o //
translated: You should listen with a one-pointed mind! Thus he exhorts.

original: 'o na phyag na rdo rje la yang bskul dgos sam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na phyag na rdo rje la yang bskul dgos sam zhe na /
translated: Well then, does Vajrapani also need to be exhorted?

original: de dgos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dgos pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not necessary.

original: phyag na rdo rje la mtshan nas phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la snod kyis ma zin pa dang / brjed pa dang / 'dres pa dang gsum spongs la nyon cig par gdams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje la mtshan nas phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la snod kyis ma zin pa dang / brjed pa dang / 'dres pa dang gsum spongs la nyon cig par gdams pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] says this in order to advise Vajrapāṇi, “Do not forget, do not mix up the three—not being contained in a vessel, forgetting, and mixing up—and listen to the yoga of future generations.”

original: de ltar gsungs pas 'khor rjes su yi rang ba ni //
analyzed: de ltar gsungs pas 'khor rjes su yi rang ba ni //
translated: Thus, the retinue rejoiced in what was said.

original: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
translated: [They] said, “Bhagavān, that is excellent.”

original: zhes smos pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes smos pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la 'jam dpal gyis chos gnang ba de ni legs so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la 'jam dpal gyis chos gnang ba de ni legs so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: [It means,] “Bhagavān, the Dharma that Mañjuśrī bestowed upon us is excellent.”

original: da ni rigs la gzigs pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir /🔽de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
analyzed: da ni rigs la gzigs pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir / de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
translated: Now, in order to teach the chapter on the view of the family,

original: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] says, “Then the Bhagavān Śākyamuni,” and so on.

original: nyan par nges ma thag pa de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: nyan par nges ma thag pa de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Immediately after ascertaining the listening, [the Bhagavān] says, “Then the Bhagavān spoke.”

original: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // zhes pa 'dis ni rigs bsdus pa la gzigs pa bstan te /
analyzed: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // zhes pa 'dis ni rigs bsdus pa la gzigs pa bstan te /
translated: By saying “all great families of secret mantra,” he teaches the view of the family that is included in the families.

original: gsang sngags 'di mantra zhes pa'i sgras skyob pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di mantra zhes pa'i sgras skyob pa la 'jug ste /
translated: This mantra is called man-tra, which means “that which protects.

original: mdor na thabs dang @8b shes rab khyad par can la bya'o //
analyzed: mdor na thabs dang @8b shes rab khyad par can la bya'o //
translated: ” In brief, it is a special method and wisdom.

original: rigs las byung bas na rigs so //
analyzed: rigs las byung bas na rigs so //
translated: It is a family because it arises from a family.

original: rigs 'dzin pas na rigs so //🔽rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur cing /
analyzed: rigs 'dzin pas na rigs so // rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur cing /
translated: It is a family because it holds the family.

original: rigs thams cad 'dus pas na rigs chen no //
analyzed: rigs thams cad 'dus pas na rigs chen no //
translated: It is a great family because it is the lord of all families and because all families are included in it.

original: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi theg pa rnams bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pas kyang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi theg pa rnams bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pas kyang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is also called that because it is the basis for the generation of the vehicles of action, conduct, and yoga.

original: 'di'i dgos pa ni nyon mongs pa lnga cha mnyam du 'dul ba'i gnyen po ste /
analyzed: 'di'i dgos pa ni nyon mongs pa lnga cha mnyam du 'dul ba'i gnyen po ste /
translated: Its purpose is to be the antidote for taming the five afflictions equally.

original: mdor bstan gyi tshul lo //
analyzed: mdor bstan gyi tshul lo //
translated: This is the style of brief explanation.

original: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
analyzed: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
translated: The family of the holders of mantra and knowledge mantra.

original: zhes pa 'dis ni las kyi rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni las kyi rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
translated: This shows the view of the karma family.

original: gsang sngags ni pho ste thabs so //
analyzed: gsang sngags ni pho ste thabs so //
translated: Mantra is male, which is method.

original: rig sngags ni mo ste shes rab po //
analyzed: rig sngags ni mo ste shes rab po //
translated: Knowledge mantra is female, which is wisdom.

original: byed pa las ni gsang sngags kyis ni log par rtogs pa sel lo //
analyzed: byed pa las ni gsang sngags kyis ni log par rtogs pa sel lo //
translated: From the perspective of function, mantra removes wrong understanding.

original: rig sngags kyis ni ma rig pa sel to //
analyzed: rig sngags kyis ni ma rig pa sel to //
translated: The mantra is om, and the vidya is the removal of ignorance.

original: de yang / 'da' bar bya ba ma yin la //
analyzed: de yang / 'da' bar bya ba ma yin la //
translated: And that is also said: It is not to be transgressed,

original: dbye bar dka' ba gsang ba nyid //
analyzed: dbye bar dka' ba gsang ba nyid //
translated: difficult to divide, secret,

original: gsang ste bsgrub phyir sngags pa ni //
analyzed: gsang ste bsgrub phyir sngags pa ni //
translated: because it is accomplished secretly, the mantra is

original: gsang sngags zhes bya'o nges par brjod //
analyzed: gsang sngags zhes bya'o nges par brjod //
translated: called mantra, definitely expressed.

original: ces pa dang ; ngag gi rigs mchog bsgrub pa dang // dngos grub 'dod pa yod pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa dang ; ngag gi rigs mchog bsgrub pa dang // dngos grub 'dod pa yod pa ste /
translated: And the supreme type of speech is accomplished, and the desire for siddhi exists,

original: de phyir rig sngags zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de phyir rig sngags zhes bya'o //
translated: therefore it is called vidya.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like that.

original: 'chang ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'chang ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Holding means grasping.

original: 'di'i dgos pa ni gdul bya phrag dog dang le lo shas che ba rnams 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i dgos pa ni gdul bya phrag dog dang le lo shas che ba rnams 'dul ba'o //
translated: The purpose of this is to tame those to be tamed who have a lot of jealousy and laziness.

original: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
analyzed: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
translated: The three families are seen.

original: zhes pa 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
translated: This shows the seeing of the Tathagata family.

original: rigs gsum ni sku gsung thugs so //
analyzed: rigs gsum ni sku gsung thugs so //
translated: The three families are body, speech, and mind.

original: rigs de gsum rnam snang la 'dus pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rigs de gsum rnam snang la 'dus pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since those three families are gathered in Vairocana, it is called that.

original: 'di'i dgos pa ni gti mug shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i dgos pa ni gti mug shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o //
translated: The purpose of this is to tame those who have a lot of delusion.

original: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs //
translated: The family of the mundane and supramundane.

original: zhes pa 'dis ni padma'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni padma'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
translated: This shows the family of the lotus family.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis mkhyen te /
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis mkhyen te /
translated: The discriminating intuition knows both the mundane and the supramundane.

original: de yang gnyis su snang la gnyis su ma zhen pa'i tshul du mkhyen no //
analyzed: de yang gnyis su snang la gnyis su ma zhen pa'i tshul du mkhyen no //
translated: Moreover, it knows them in the manner of not adhering to duality, although there is the appearance of duality.

original: des na 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa gnyis ka'i rigs so //
analyzed: des na 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa gnyis ka'i rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is the family of both the supramundane and the mundane.

original: 'di'i dgos pa ni 'dod chags shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di'i dgos pa ni 'dod chags shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed do //
translated: The purpose of this is to subdue those with a predominance of desire.🔽The great family of the illuminator of the world.

original: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /🔽'jig rten gyi chos thams cad snang la rang bzhin med par me long gi gzugs brnyan @9a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad snang la rang bzhin med par me long gi gzugs brnyan @9a * //
translated: This shows the family of the vajra family.

original: ltar rtogs pas 'jig rten snang bar byed do //
analyzed: ltar rtogs pas 'jig rten snang bar byed do //
