translated: Since all mundane phenomena are realized to be like reflections in a mirror, appearing yet lacking intrinsic nature, the world is illuminated.

original: thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bor gyur pas rigs che no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bor gyur pas rigs che no //
translated: Since it is the essence of all minds, it is a great family.

original: 'di'i dgos pa ni zhe sdang shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di'i dgos pa ni zhe sdang shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed do //
translated: The purpose of this is to subdue those who have a preponderance of hatred.🔽The supreme family of the great seal

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // zhes pa 'dis ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rigs bstan te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // zhes pa 'dis ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rigs bstan te /
translated: This shows the vajra family, which is the root awakening mind.

original: phyag rgya la spyir du ma yod kyang 'dir rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya la spyir du ma yod kyang 'dir rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir phyag rgya ste /
translated: Although there are many types of seals in general, here it is a seal because it is a stamp.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i rgyas 'debs pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i rgyas 'debs pa'i mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme stamp of the non-arising of all phenomena.

original: 'di'i dgos pa ni spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: 'di'i dgos pa ni spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad 'joms par byed do //
translated: The purpose of this is to destroy all the signs of conceptual elaborations.

original: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas /
analyzed: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas /
translated: Having seen the great uṣṇīṣa of the great family,

original: zhes pa 'dis ni rin po che'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni rin po che'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
translated: This shows the family of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs yin pas rigs chen no //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs yin pas rigs chen no //
translated: Ratnasaṃbhava is the great family because it is the family from which all the great qualities of the buddhas arise.

original: gtsug tor ni yon tan gyis mtho bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor ni yon tan gyis mtho bar byas pa'o //
translated: The uṣṇīṣa is the height of good qualities.

original: de yang ming gi rnam grangs ni gzigs zhes bya /
analyzed: de yang ming gi rnam grangs ni gzigs zhes bya /
translated: Moreover, the synonym for this is “seeing.”

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ces bya'o //
translated: This is called entering into the meditative equipoise of samādhi.

original: de yang tshul ji ltar gzigs ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis zab pa stong pa nyid ji lta ba'i don la gzigs pa dang / thugs rje'i spyan gyis rgya che ba ji snyed pa la gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang tshul ji ltar gzigs ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis zab pa stong pa nyid ji lta ba'i don la gzigs pa dang / thugs rje'i spyan gyis rgya che ba ji snyed pa la gzigs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, how does he see? He sees with the eye of wisdom the meaning of the profound, just as it is, and with the eye of compassion, he sees the vast, just as it is.

original: yang gsum ste /
analyzed: yang gsum ste /
translated: There are three more:

original: spang bya nyon mongs pa dang / de spong ba'i gnyen po lha'i rigs dang / lha'i rtog pa zlog par byed pa ye shes la gzigs pa rnams su yang sbyar ro //🔽da ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba man ngag gi le'u bstan pa'i phyir thams cad la bstod pa /
analyzed: spang bya nyon mongs pa dang / de spong ba'i gnyen po lha'i rigs dang / lha'i rtog pa zlog par byed pa ye shes la gzigs pa rnams su yang sbyar ro // da ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba man ngag gi le'u bstan pa'i phyir thams cad la bstod pa /
translated: the afflictions to be abandoned, the divine family that is the antidote to abandoning them, and the wisdom that turns back the divine concepts.

original: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
analyzed: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
translated: Now, in order to explain the chapter of the intimate instructions of the Net of Illusory Manifestations, the praise to all is the verse of the lord of words.

original: ces pa / tshig gi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
analyzed: ces pa / tshig gi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
translated: The lord of words is the Bhagavān himself.

original: tshigs su bcad pa ni rigs drug gi bdag nyid tsheg par bdun pa nyid du tshigs su bcad de ston pa gsung gi mnga' bdag yin pas bdag po zhes kyang bya /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa ni rigs drug gi bdag nyid tsheg par bdun pa nyid du tshigs su bcad de ston pa gsung gi mnga' bdag yin pas bdag po zhes kyang bya /
translated: The verse is the seven-syllable nature of the six families. Since the teacher is the lord of speech, he is also called the lord.

original: rigs la gzigs pa thugs la rtogs nas /
analyzed: rigs la gzigs pa thugs la rtogs nas /
translated: Having realized the family in the mind,

original: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad ces bya'o //
analyzed: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad ces bya'o //
translated: the Lord of Speech spoke the verses.

original: gsang sngags rgyal po drug sog pa ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po drug sog pa ste /
translated: The six kings of secret mantra are the holders,

original: gzung 'dzin gnyis med par ye shes kyi sku'i bdag zhes pa /
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gnyis med par ye shes kyi sku'i bdag zhes pa /
translated: the self of the jñānakāya, nondual with the two:

original: aom badzra t'i kshna la sogs pa ye shes sems dpa' drug gi sngags drug go //
analyzed: aom badzra t'i kshna la sogs pa ye shes sems dpa' drug gi sngags drug go //
translated: the six mantras of the six sattvas of gnosis, such as oṃ vajra tiṣṭha.

original: brjod bya'i gtso bo ji lta bu zhig gsungs she na /
analyzed: brjod bya'i gtso bo ji lta bu zhig gsungs she na /
translated: What is the principal topic of expression?

original: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes pa la sog pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes pa la sog pa ste /
translated: It is said to be “nondual arising” and so on.

original: gzung 'dzin gnyis med par ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid du sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gnyis med par ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid du sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: The two: the apprehended and the apprehender, are nondual, awakened as the self of the jñānakāya.

original: mi skye @9b chos can 'di gsungs pa //
analyzed: mi skye @9b chos can 'di gsungs pa //
translated: This is said to be “the dharmin of nonarising.”

original: zhes pa / rig pa rang gsal ba de yang skye med kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa ste 'bras bu'i mchog go //
analyzed: zhes pa / rig pa rang gsal ba de yang skye med kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa ste 'bras bu'i mchog go //
translated: That vidyā, which is self-luminous, abides in the nature of nonarising, the supreme result.

original: blo brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: blo brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sa bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the stage of the result is for the purpose of generating enthusiasm.

original: aa a'a yi a'i au a'u ae ao aoo aom aa: de yang sangs rgyas kyis bcu gnyis la mtho dman dang rim pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: aa a'a yi a'i au a'u ae ao aoo aom aa: de yang sangs rgyas kyis bcu gnyis la mtho dman dang rim pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The twelve vowels a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, e, ai, o, au, am, ah are not high or low or in stages in the buddhas.

original: ye shes gcig la yon tan gyi bye brag bcu gnyis su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes gcig la yon tan gyi bye brag bcu gnyis su bstan pa'o //
translated: The twelve different qualities are shown in a single pristine consciousness.

original: de yang sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis ma rig pa bcom nas shes bya gsal bar snang ba dang / nyon mongs pa ma spang par ye shes su gsal ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / mi 'gyur zhing dbyer mi phyed pa dang /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis ma rig pa bcom nas shes bya gsal bar snang ba dang / nyon mongs pa ma spang par ye shes su gsal ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / mi 'gyur zhing dbyer mi phyed pa dang /
translated: Furthermore, the pristine consciousness of the buddhas’ omniscience illuminates the object of knowledge after destroying ignorance, manifests as pristine consciousness without abandoning the afflictions, is without center or edge, is unchanging and indivisible,

original: sems can gyi dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba dang / 'gro ba'i don mdzad kyang skyon gyis ma gos pa dang / rtsol ba med par gzhan don 'grub pa dang / yang dag par dpe mtshon pa dang bral ba dang / phyogs 'dra tsam gyis mtshon du btub pa dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba dang / 'gro ba'i don mdzad kyang skyon gyis ma gos pa dang / rtsol ba med par gzhan don 'grub pa dang / yang dag par dpe mtshon pa dang bral ba dang / phyogs 'dra tsam gyis mtshon du btub pa dang /
translated: is the source of all the needs and desires of sentient beings, is not tainted by faults even though it performs benefits for migrating beings, accomplishes the benefit of others without effort, is utterly free from an example or illustration, can be illustrated by a mere partial example,🔽and is the source of all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang / shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / so so rang rig pa gnyis su mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang / shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / so so rang rig pa gnyis su mkhyen pa'o //
translated: The first is the naturally luminous awareness, the second is the knowledge of all that can be known, both as it is and in its extent, and the third is the knowledge of the two kinds of no-self.

original: de rnams su sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed cig gsungs pa thams cad 'dus par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams su sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed cig gsungs pa thams cad 'dus par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that all the qualities of buddhahood that are taught are included in these three.

original: de yang 'di skad du rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las //
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las //
translated: The Vajra Essence Ornament Tantra says this:

original: kun du 'od kyis chen pa //
analyzed: kun du 'od kyis chen pa //
translated: The first is called All Light,

original: de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra //
analyzed: de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra //
translated: like the orb of the sun.

original: bdud rtsi 'od ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: bdud rtsi 'od ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: The second is called Nectar Light,

original: shin tu 'od gsal zla ba 'dra //
analyzed: shin tu 'od gsal zla ba 'dra //
translated: very clear, like the moon.

original: nam mkha' 'od ni gsum pa ste //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'od ni gsum pa ste //
translated: The third is called Space Light,

original: nam mkha' ji bzhin ba tu gnas //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji bzhin ba tu gnas //
translated: abiding just like space.

original: rdo rje 'od ni bzhi pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje 'od ni bzhi pa ste //
translated: The fourth is called Vajra Light,

original: sa de nyid ni yid dga' ba'o //
analyzed: sa de nyid ni yid dga' ba'o //
translated: that level itself being delightful.

original: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces pa ;
analyzed: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces pa ;
translated: The fifth is called Jewel Light,

original: / dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: / dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
translated: fully abiding in the empowerment.

original: padma'i 'od ni drug pa ste //
analyzed: padma'i 'od ni drug pa ste //
translated: The sixth is called Lotus Light,

original: padma bzhin du rab tu gyes //
analyzed: padma bzhin du rab tu gyes //
translated: fully open like a lotus.

original: bdun pa las ni 'od ces bya //
analyzed: bdun pa las ni 'od ces bya //
translated: The seventh is called Action Light.

original: sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod //
translated: And to perform the activity of the Buddha.

original: brgyad pa dpe med ces pa ste //
analyzed: brgyad pa dpe med ces pa ste //
translated: The eighth is called Incomparable,

original: don la dpe dang mnyam pa min //
analyzed: don la dpe dang mnyam pa min //
translated: Because the meaning is not the same as the example.

original: dpe ldan zhes pa dgu pa yin //
analyzed: dpe ldan zhes pa dgu pa yin //
translated: The ninth is called Having an Example,

original: thams cad dpe ni so sor 'bigs //
analyzed: thams cad dpe ni so sor 'bigs //
translated: Because all examples are individually applied.

original: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pa //
analyzed: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pa //
translated: The tenth is called Light of Wisdom,

original: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
translated: Because it is the unsurpassed stage of the Buddha.

original: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
analyzed: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
translated: The eleventh is called Omniscience,

original: sa chen rab tu 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: sa chen rab tu 'od gsal ba //
translated: Because the great stage is very radiant.

original: bcu gnyis so so rang rig pa //
analyzed: bcu gnyis so so rang rig pa //
translated: The twelfth is called Self-Realization,

original: sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rdzogs //🔽zhes 'byung bas gsal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rdzogs // zhes 'byung bas gsal lo //
translated: Because the wisdom of the Buddha is perfected.

original: @10a * // dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid du 'jam dpal nyid bstan pa'i phyir sthi to hri di ni zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: @10a * // dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid du 'jam dpal nyid bstan pa'i phyir sthi to hri di ni zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach that Mañjuśrī is the very nature of the mind of all the buddhas of the three times, it says “sthito hṛdi” and so forth.

original: sthi to hri di ni thugs kar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sthi to hri di ni thugs kar gnas pa'o //
translated: “Sthito hṛdi” means “abiding in the heart.”

original: dzny'a na m'u rti ni ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: dzny'a na m'u rti ni ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: “Jñānamūrti” means “the body of wisdom.”

original: ra ham buddho ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: ra ham buddho ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas so //
translated: “Rahm-buddho” means “the buddhas of the three times.”

original: buddha na na ni bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no //
analyzed: buddha na na ni bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no //
translated: Buddhanāni means “I am the Buddha himself.”

original: tryee dhra barti nan ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: tryee dhra barti nan ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Tryadhva-vartin means “existing in the three times.”

original: mtha' bsdus pas ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid thugs la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' bsdus pas ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid thugs la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas yin zhes pa'o //
translated: By the final summary, it means “the Buddha who exists in the mind of the body of gnosis of the Buddhas existing in the three times.”

original: de la shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa bstan pa ni ;
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa bstan pa ni ;
translated: The explanation of the meditation on the wheel of wisdom is as follows.

original: aom badzra t'ikshna ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
analyzed: aom badzra t'ikshna ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-tīkṣṇa means “the sharp vajra.”

original: du: kha tstshe da ni sdug bsngal gcod pa'o //
analyzed: du: kha tstshe da ni sdug bsngal gcod pa'o //
translated: Duḥkha-ccheda means “cutting suffering.”

original: pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'u rta ye ni ye shes kyi gtsug tor ro //
analyzed: pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'u rta ye ni ye shes kyi gtsug tor ro //
translated: Prajñā-jñāna-mūrtaye means “the form of gnosis.”

original: dzny'a k'a ya ni ye shes kyi sku can no //
analyzed: dzny'a k'a ya ni ye shes kyi sku can no //
translated: Jñāna-kāya means “having the body of gnosis.”

original: b'a g'i shva ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: b'a g'i shva ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug go //
translated: Vāgīśvara means “lord of speech.”

original: aa rab tsa na ya te ma: ni skye ba med pa'i shes rab chags pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes pa'o //
analyzed: aa rab tsa na ya te ma: ni skye ba med pa'i shes rab chags pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes pa'o //
translated: Araba-caṇayate means “the object of practice of non-attached wisdom.”

original: de dag ni padma dang / rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / las dang rin po che dang / byang sems rdo rje'i rigs te /
analyzed: de dag ni padma dang / rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / las dang rin po che dang / byang sems rdo rje'i rigs te /
translated: They are the lotus, vajra, tathāgata, action, jewel, and bodhisattva vajra families.

original: go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: They should be applied in order.

original: bsgom zhing sngags bzlas pa'i tshe na ni bdag nyid rje btsun du bsgoms pa'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs drug mu khyud dang / ldan pa la sngags drug po 'di bkod la spro bsdu bya zhing bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom zhing sngags bzlas pa'i tshe na ni bdag nyid rje btsun du bsgoms pa'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs drug mu khyud dang / ldan pa la sngags drug po 'di bkod la spro bsdu bya zhing bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: When meditating and reciting the mantra, at the heart of oneself visualized as the venerable one, on a six-spoked wheel with a rim, arrange these six mantras and perform the emanation and reabsorption, and recite the mantra.

original: mtshan brjod 'don pa'i dus su ni /
analyzed: mtshan brjod 'don pa'i dus su ni /
translated: At the time of reciting the Names,

original: 'di rnams ming gi gtso bo rnams kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams ming gi gtso bo rnams kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: one should understand that these are praised from the perspective of their principal names.

original: da ni rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i le'u bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i le'u bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, the chapter on Mañjuśrījñānasattva is taught from the perspective of the root bodhicitta.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: Thus, the blessed buddhas

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so forth are stated.

original: da ni de'i mtshan rgyas par bshad pa ni 'di ltar yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: da ni de'i mtshan rgyas par bshad pa ni 'di ltar yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Now, the extensive explanation of his name is as follows.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu ni /
translated: The cause for the appearance of perfect buddhahood

original: chos skye ba med pa bsgoms pa las 'byung bas //
analyzed: chos skye ba med pa bsgoms pa las 'byung bas //
translated: is the cultivation of the unborn nature of phenomena.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
translated: Perfect buddhahood arises from A.

original: zhes bya'o // 'o na yi ge aa gcig pu las byung ba ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'o na yi ge aa gcig pu las byung ba ci yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it that arises from the single letter A?

original: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces pa'o //
analyzed: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces pa'o //
translated: A is the supreme of all letters.

original: ci'i phyir mchog yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mchog yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it supreme?

original: chos kyi don chen po ston pa'i yi ge yin pas //
analyzed: chos kyi don chen po ston pa'i yi ge yin pas //
translated: It is the letter that teaches the great meaning of phenomena.

original: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
analyzed: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
translated: It is the sacred letter of great meaning.

original: zhes pa'o // de yang ci'i phyir na @10b don chen skye ba med pa'i don ston pas //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de yang ci'i phyir na @10b don chen skye ba med pa'i don ston pas //
translated: Why is that? Because it teaches the meaning of great significance, the unborn.

original: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //🔽ces bya ste /
analyzed: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med // ces bya ste /
translated: It is unborn, arising from within.

original: yi ge gzhan ni so lce mchu dang yar rkan la sogs pa rnams la rag lus la /
analyzed: yi ge gzhan ni so lce mchu dang yar rkan la sogs pa rnams la rag lus la /
translated: Other letters depend on the teeth, lips, tongue, palate, and so forth.

original: aa ni de rnams la rag ma lus te /
analyzed: aa ni de rnams la rag ma lus te /
translated: A does not depend on those.

original: khong nas rang 'byung du 'byung bas yi ge rnams kyi nang na dam pa'o //
analyzed: khong nas rang 'byung du 'byung bas yi ge rnams kyi nang na dam pa'o //
translated: Since it arises from within, it is self-arisen, and is therefore the most sacred of all letters.

original: de nyid la brjod du med par gnas pas //
analyzed: de nyid la brjod du med par gnas pas //
translated: Since it abides as inexpressible,

original: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
translated: It is free from verbal expression.

original: zhes bya'o // brjod pa'i sgra thams cad kyi rgyu'i gtso bor gyur te dag thams cad la 'jug par byed pas /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // brjod pa'i sgra thams cad kyi rgyu'i gtso bor gyur te dag thams cad la 'jug par byed pas /
translated: It is the primary cause of all verbal sounds, and it causes the engagement of all.🔽It is the supreme cause of all expressions,

original: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: and it illuminates all words.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so on.

original: 'o na nyon mongs pa ji ltar spang zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nyon mongs pa ji ltar spang zhe na /
translated: But how are the afflictions abandoned?

original: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
translated: The great worship is great desire,

original: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
translated: which delights all sentient beings.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so on.

original: de mchod pa ni lha mnyes par byed pa'i phyir na mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de mchod pa ni lha mnyes par byed pa'i phyir na mchod pa ste /
translated: Worship is the worship of the deity, and it is the worship of oneself.

original: 'dir nyon mongs pa ma spangs par ye shes su grub pa dgos pa mthun te rang gis mchod pa'o ;
analyzed: 'dir nyon mongs pa ma spangs par ye shes su grub pa dgos pa mthun te rang gis mchod pa'o ;
translated: Here, the necessity of establishing the afflictions without abandoning them is the same as the necessity of establishing wisdom without abandoning them.

original: / de nas kun la sbyar ro //
analyzed: / de nas kun la sbyar ro //
translated: Then it is applied to all.

original: chen po'i sgra ni dper na dug sel ba'i sngags la dug sngags zer ba ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pas chen po'o //
analyzed: chen po'i sgra ni dper na dug sel ba'i sngags la dug sngags zer ba ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pas chen po'o //
translated: The word “great” is like the mantra of the great medicine, which is called the mantra of poison. It is great because it conquers the opposing factors.

original: 'dod chags ni nyon mongs mnyam pa nyid la dang gis chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni nyon mongs mnyam pa nyid la dang gis chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the spontaneous attachment to the equality of the afflictions.

original: des log pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar byed cing zag med kyi dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des log pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar byed cing zag med kyi dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes one to be free from perverse attachment and to generate uncontaminated joy.

original: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
translated: Great worship, great anger,

original: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
translated: great enemy of all afflictions.

original: zhes pa rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i zhe sdang mnga' la /
analyzed: zhes pa rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i zhe sdang mnga' la /
translated: This has anger that conquers conceptuality.

original: zhe sdang rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o //
translated: Since it conquers its own anger, it is a great enemy.

original: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
translated: Great worship, great ignorance,

original: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
analyzed: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
translated: ignorance is the mind, ignorance is removed.

original: zhes pa chos tha dad du byed pa med pa'i don gyi gti mug dang ldan pas des gti mug rang kha ma sel ba'o //🔽mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
analyzed: zhes pa chos tha dad du byed pa med pa'i don gyi gti mug dang ldan pas des gti mug rang kha ma sel ba'o // mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
translated: This has ignorance that does not differentiate phenomena. Since it has that, it removes its own ignorance.🔽Great worship, great wrath,

original: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
analyzed: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
translated: great wrath, great enemy.

original: zhes smos te /🔽nyon mongs pa skyer mi ster bas khro ba che la /
analyzed: zhes smos te / nyon mongs pa skyer mi ster bas khro ba che la /
translated: This is said.🔽Since it does not allow the arising of afflictions, it is wrath.

original: nges khong khro rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o //
analyzed: nges khong khro rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o //
translated: Since it conquers its own anger, it is a great enemy.

original: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
translated: The great offering is the great attachment.

original: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
analyzed: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
translated: It removes all attachments.

original: ces pa don zag med kyi bde ba la chags la /
analyzed: ces pa don zag med kyi bde ba la chags la /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows. Attachment to uncontaminated bliss

original: ser sna'i chags zhen rang kha ma sel bar byed do //
analyzed: ser sna'i chags zhen rang kha ma sel bar byed do //
translated: removes the attachment of miserliness and clinging to one's own.

original: de la gong ma gong ma ni 'joms byed /
analyzed: de la gong ma gong ma ni 'joms byed /
translated: Among those, the higher ones are the destroyers,

original: 'og ma 'og ma ni gzhom bya'o //
analyzed: 'og ma 'og ma ni gzhom bya'o //
translated: and the lower ones are what is to be destroyed.

original: de dag la man ngag tu sbyar na rnam pa bzhi @11a * //
analyzed: de dag la man ngag tu sbyar na rnam pa bzhi @11a * //
translated: When applied to the intimate instructions, there are four types.

original: ste ; nyon mongs pa de dag la zhen pa'i gdul bya la de dag ma spangs pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa'i thabs kyis grol bar byed pas spyod mthun grol ba'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: ste ; nyon mongs pa de dag la zhen pa'i gdul bya la de dag ma spangs pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa'i thabs kyis grol bar byed pas spyod mthun grol ba'i mchod pa'o //
translated: Since those to be guided who are attached to those afflictions are liberated by the method of conduct that is in harmony with not abandoning those, it is the offering of liberation that is in harmony with conduct.

original: nyon mongs pa ye shes lngar gnas gyur pas gnas gyur ye shes kyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ye shes lngar gnas gyur pas gnas gyur ye shes kyi mchod pa'o //
translated: Since the afflictions are transformed into the five pristine consciousnesses, it is the offering of the pristine consciousness of transformation.

original: nyon mongs pa lnga las grol bas rigs lnga'i sku phyag rgya chen po thob pas grol thar phyag rgya'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa lnga las grol bas rigs lnga'i sku phyag rgya chen po thob pas grol thar phyag rgya'i mchod pa'o //
translated: Since one is liberated from the five afflictions, one obtains the mahāmudrā kāya of the five families, which is the offering of liberation and freedom.

original: nyon mongs pa la brtags na ngo bo grub pa med de chos nyid du gnas pas rang bzhin dag pa'i mchod pa'o //🔽'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la brtags na ngo bo grub pa med de chos nyid du gnas pas rang bzhin dag pa'i mchod pa'o // 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
translated: When one examines the afflictions, they have no established essence, and since they abide in the nature, they are the offering of the pure nature.🔽Great desire, great bliss,

original: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
translated: great joy, and great satisfaction.

original: zhes pa sems can thar par 'dod pa'i blo yod pa la thar pa'i bde ba skyed par byed cing chos bstan pas dga' la //
analyzed: zhes pa sems can thar par 'dod pa'i blo yod pa la thar pa'i bde ba skyed par byed cing chos bstan pas dga' la //
translated: Since the mind that desires liberation for sentient beings generates the bliss of liberation and delights them through teaching the Dharma,

original: don rtogs pas mgu bar byed pa'o //🔽gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
analyzed: don rtogs pas mgu bar byed pa'o // gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
translated: they are satisfied by realizing the meaning.🔽Great form, great body,

original: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
analyzed: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
translated: great color, great size,

original: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
analyzed: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
translated: great name, and great extent

original: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
translated: are the great, vast maṇḍala.

original: zhes snang la rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs dang / gdol pa can gyi lus lta bur yang sprul te /
analyzed: zhes snang la rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs dang / gdol pa can gyi lus lta bur yang sprul te /
translated: Emanating as a form that appears but is essenceless and as a body of a caṇḍāla,

original: de yang ye shes las grub pa yin pas che zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang ye shes las grub pa yin pas che zhes bya'o //
translated: since that is also accomplished from pristine consciousness, it is called “great.”

original: nang na ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su sku gzi mdangs dang ldan pas kha dog che ba'o //
analyzed: nang na ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su sku gzi mdangs dang ldan pas kha dog che ba'o //
translated: Since the body has radiance as a sign of the clear pristine consciousness within, it is “great color.”

original: gzhan zil gyis gnon pas lus bong che ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan zil gyis gnon pas lus bong che ba'o //
translated: It is of great size, since it overwhelms others.

original: grags pa chen po yod pas ming che ba'o //
analyzed: grags pa chen po yod pas ming che ba'o //
translated: It is of great name, since it has great fame.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs rgyas pas rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs rgyas pas rgya che ba'o //
translated: It is of great extent, since the accumulation of merit is extensive.

original: 'dir zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa dang / no pi ka mtha' dag 'byung bas dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
analyzed: 'dir zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa dang / no pi ka mtha' dag 'byung bas dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
translated: Here, it is the great mandala, since it is the nonduality of profundity and abundance, and since the entire Niḥsvabhāva Tantra arises.

original: kun la khyab pa dang gang yang bkag pa med pas yangs pa'o //
analyzed: kun la khyab pa dang gang yang bkag pa med pas yangs pa'o //
translated: It is vast, since it pervades everything and nothing is excluded.

original: de la ye shes kyi khyad par ni //
analyzed: de la ye shes kyi khyad par ni //
translated: The distinctive wisdom is stated:

original: shes rab mtshon chen 'chad ba ste //
analyzed: shes rab mtshon chen 'chad ba ste //
translated: The great sword of wisdom,🔽the great hook of afflictions, the supreme,

original: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog / grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
analyzed: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog / grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
translated: the great fame, the great renown,

original: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //🔽zhes smos te /🔽shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa 'joms pa ste ;
analyzed: snang ba chen po gsal ba che // zhes smos te / shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa 'joms pa ste ;
translated: the great light, the great clarity.🔽The great sword of wisdom cuts the afflictions.

original: / dper na nyon mongs pa glang po che smyon pa la ye shes lcags kyus 'dul ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: / dper na nyon mongs pa glang po che smyon pa la ye shes lcags kyus 'dul ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the wisdom hook tames the wild elephant of afflictions.

original: de yang khams gsum du grags pa khyad par can yod pa dang / nang du ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su phyir 'od zer gsal bas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: de yang khams gsum du grags pa khyad par can yod pa dang / nang du ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su phyir 'od zer gsal bas bskor ba'o //
translated: Moreover, there is a special configuration of the three realms, and the outer sign of the inner manifestation of pristine consciousness is the surrounding light rays.

original: de la sprul pa'i tshul ji ltar 'byung zhe @11b na ;
analyzed: de la sprul pa'i tshul ji ltar 'byung zhe @11b na ;
translated: How does the emanation occur?

original: / mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chan po 'chang //
analyzed: / mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chan po 'chang //
translated: The wise one is the wielder of great magic.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa //
translated: The great magic is the accomplishment of the purpose.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
translated: The great magic is delighted by delight.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can // zhes smos te /
translated: The great magic is the one with magical eyes.

original: 'gro ba la tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba la tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste /
translated: As such, there is skill in the method of perfecting the two accumulations for migrating beings.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gang 'dod pa'i don 'grub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gang 'dod pa'i don 'grub par byed pa ste /
translated: The method of accomplishing the purpose of migrating beings through emanations that are like illusions is the accomplishment of the desired purpose.

original: de yang / sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste //
analyzed: de yang / sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste //
translated: Further, the mind is the aspect of an illusion.

original: byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra //
analyzed: byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra //
translated: Enlightenment is also like an illusion.

original: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas //🔽gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te //
analyzed: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas // gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te //
translated: For example, a magician🔽recites a mantra over a piece of wood

original: sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni //
translated: and strikes it with a familiar gesture.

original: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs //🔽zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs // zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur //
translated: The form of a four-footed animal, and so on,

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: appears to the mind that is attached to it.🔽The bodhisattva is the great lord of generosity,🔽the great holder of morality, the great patient,🔽the great hero of effort,🔽the great meditator in concentration,

original: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang / shes rab kyis gnyis med kyi don la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang / shes rab kyis gnyis med kyi don la dga' ba'o //
translated: the great holder of wisdom,

original: med pa 'phrul zhing yod pa bsgyur ba dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: med pa 'phrul zhing yod pa bsgyur ba dang 'dra ste /
translated: the great powerful one, the great skillful one,

original: don zab mo ma rtogs pa rnams la mig 'phrul bstan nas dngos 'dzin zlog par byed do //🔽des thun mong gi lam ji lta bu ston zhe na //
analyzed: don zab mo ma rtogs pa rnams la mig 'phrul bstan nas dngos 'dzin zlog par byed do // des thun mong gi lam ji lta bu ston zhe na //
translated: the great ocean of vows and intuition.

original: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
analyzed: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
translated: The bodhisattva is the great lord of generosity,🔽the supreme great holder of morality,

original: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
analyzed: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
translated: the firm great patient,

original: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
analyzed: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
translated: the great hero of effort,

original: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
translated: the great meditator in concentration,

original: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
analyzed: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
translated: the great holder of wisdom,

original: stobs po che la thabs che ba //
analyzed: stobs po che la thabs che ba //
translated: the great powerful one, the great skillful one,

original: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //🔽zhes smos te /
translated: the great ocean of vows and intuition.

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gtong bas sbyin pa'i gtso bo'o //
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gtong bas sbyin pa'i gtso bo'o //
translated: The generosity of the bodhisattva is the most important form of generosity, since it is given with the complete purity of the three spheres.

original: nyes byas mi 'byung bas tshul khrims chen po'o //🔽mtshan mas mi 'khrugs pas bzod pa brtan pa'o ;
analyzed: nyes byas mi 'byung bas tshul khrims chen po'o // mtshan mas mi 'khrugs pas bzod pa brtan pa'o ;
translated: His morality is the great morality, since it is not violated.🔽His patience is the firm patience, since it is not disturbed by the signs of the object to be tolerated, the injury, etc.

original: / rtogs pas ma gos pas brtson 'grus brtul ba'o //
analyzed: / rtogs pas ma gos pas brtson 'grus brtul ba'o //
translated: His vigor is the firm vigor, since it is not sullied by the realization of the transcendences.

original: g-yeng ba'i sgra med pas bsam gtan chen po'o //
analyzed: g-yeng ba'i sgra med pas bsam gtan chen po'o //
translated: His meditation is the great meditation, since it is not disturbed by the sounds of distraction.

original: gnyis med rtogs pas shes rab chen po'o //
analyzed: gnyis med rtogs pas shes rab chen po'o //
translated: His wisdom is the great wisdom, since it realizes the nonduality of the two.

original: bdud kyi dpung 'joms pas stobs che ba'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi dpung 'joms pas stobs che ba'o //
translated: His power is the great power, since it conquers the armies of Mara.

original: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i thabs sna tshogs mnga' bas thabs che bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i thabs sna tshogs mnga' bas thabs che bar 'gyur ro //
translated: His means is the great means, since it possesses the various methods for liberating oneself and others.🔽His vow is the great vow, since it possesses the vow to liberate oneself and others.

original: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i smon lam mnga' bas dang / ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i smon lam mnga' bas dang / ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ste /
translated: His knowledge is the great knowledge, since it possesses the knowledge of reality as it is and of all things as they are.

original: rgya che ba dang / snang la zhen pa med pa rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rgya che ba dang / snang la zhen pa med pa rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is vast, like the ocean, and appears without attachment.

original: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang rje btsun ldan la /
analyzed: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang rje btsun ldan la /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva who possesses the ten transcendences

original: gzhan la @12a * //
analyzed: gzhan la @12a * //
translated: is the great being.

original: yang ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: yang ston par mdzad do //
translated: He also teaches.

original: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
analyzed: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
translated: His nature of great love is immeasurable.🔽His great compassion is the best of minds.

original: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / ces pa 'gro ba la bu gcig pa'i ma bzhin du byams la /
analyzed: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / ces pa 'gro ba la bu gcig pa'i ma bzhin du byams la /
translated: He loves migrating beings as a mother loves her only child.

original: de nyid lam zhen pas byams pa chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid lam zhen pas byams pa chen po'o //
translated: Since he is not attached to that, it is great love.

original: ris su che ba dang / res 'jog med pas dpag tu med do //
analyzed: ris su che ba dang / res 'jog med pas dpag tu med do //
translated: It is immeasurable because it is impartial and uninterrupted.

original: 'gro ba la snying rje rgyun mi 'chad pas che ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba la snying rje rgyun mi 'chad pas che ba'o //
translated: It is great because his compassion for migrating beings is uninterrupted.

original: de nyid la'ang ma zhen pas blo'i mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid la'ang ma zhen pas blo'i mchog go //
translated: Since he is not attached to that, it is the best of minds.

original: 'o na tshad med pa bzhi yod pa la dga' ba dang btang snyoms ma smos pa ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na tshad med pa bzhi yod pa la dga' ba dang btang snyoms ma smos pa ci yin zhe na /
translated: If there are four immeasurables, why are joy and equanimity not mentioned?

original: de ni chos zlas dbye ba ste shugs la bstan to //
analyzed: de ni chos zlas dbye ba ste shugs la bstan to //
translated: They are included in the Dharma, so they are implicitly taught.

original: thabs shes rab kyi khyad par ci zhe na /🔽shes rab chen po blo chen ldan ;
analyzed: thabs shes rab kyi khyad par ci zhe na / shes rab chen po blo chen ldan ;
translated: What is the difference between his method and his wisdom?🔽He has great wisdom and a great mind.

original: / mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: / mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba // zhes smos te /
translated: He is a great expert and has great method.

original: chos rab tu rnam par phye nas gnyis med rtogs pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: chos rab tu rnam par phye nas gnyis med rtogs pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' ba ste /
translated: He possesses great wisdom, which is the realization of nonduality after the phenomena have been perfectly distinguished.

original: des 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa'i sgo nas thabs kyi bya ba la mkhas te /
analyzed: des 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa'i sgo nas thabs kyi bya ba la mkhas te /
translated: With the intelligence that benefits migrating beings, he is skilled in the activities of method.

original: gdul bya'i bsam pa dang sbyar nas gang la ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
analyzed: gdul bya'i bsam pa dang sbyar nas gang la ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
translated: In accordance with the thoughts of those to be tamed, he teaches various methods of taming.

original: thabs dang shes rab ni khyab che ste /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ni khyab che ste /
translated: Method and wisdom are very extensive.

original: lam dang 'bras bus bsdus pa yo la gnas so //
analyzed: lam dang 'bras bus bsdus pa yo la gnas so //
translated: They are included in the path and the result.

original: 'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi sgo ji lta bus don mdzad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi sgo ji lta bus don mdzad ce na /
translated: How does he perform benefits through the doors of his great miracles?

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan //
translated: He possesses the power of great miracles.

original: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
analyzed: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
translated: He is very powerful and very fast.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa ;
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa ;
translated: He is very famous for his great miracles.

original: / stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
analyzed: / stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
translated: He is very powerful and subdues others.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: As it is said:

original: stod nas me 'bar ba dang / smad nas chu 'brub pa dang / gcig du mar byed pa dang / du ma gcig tu byed pa dang / stong gsum phyag rgyar shong ba dang / phyag rgya stong gsum du sprul pa la sogs pa dang /
analyzed: stod nas me 'bar ba dang / smad nas chu 'brub pa dang / gcig du mar byed pa dang / du ma gcig tu byed pa dang / stong gsum phyag rgyar shong ba dang / phyag rgya stong gsum du sprul pa la sogs pa dang /
translated: Fire blazes from his upper body, and water pours from his lower body. He makes one into many and makes many into one. The billion worlds fit into his seal, and the billion worlds emanate from his seal.

original: tshur mi brdzi ba dang / gzhan phar 'joms pas stobs so //
analyzed: tshur mi brdzi ba dang / gzhan phar 'joms pas stobs so //
translated: It is strength because it does not allow itself to be overcome by anything and because it overcomes everything else.

original: 'gro ba'i don byed pa la yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don byed pa la yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing /
translated: It has the speed of thought in accomplishing the aims of living beings.

original: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / 'jig rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la cher grags so //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / 'jig rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la cher grags so //
translated: It is renowned as the greatest among the disciples, hermit buddhas, mundane beings, and bodhisattvas.

original: ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa ste che ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa ste che ba'o //
translated: It is greatness because it overwhelms the four demons with the power of intuition.

original: de'i nus mthu dngos gang zhe na //
analyzed: de'i nus mthu dngos gang zhe na //
translated: What is the actual power of that?

original: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
analyzed: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
translated: It conquers the great mountain of existence.

original: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //🔽drag po chen po drag shul che //
analyzed: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul che //
translated: It is hard and wields the great diamond scepter.🔽It is the great fierce one, the great wrath.

original: 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po // zhes smos te /
translated: It is the great fear, the instilling of fear.

original: yang nas yang du 'gro ba drug tu skye bas srid pa'o //
analyzed: yang nas yang du 'gro ba drug tu skye bas srid pa'o //
translated: Existence is the repeated birth in the six life-forms.

original: de ri bo ltar gzhom dka' @12b bas ;
analyzed: de ri bo ltar gzhom dka' @12b bas ;
translated: It is a mountain because it is difficult to conquer.

original: gnyis med rtogs pas 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med rtogs pas 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: It is conquered by the realization of nonduality.

original: de'i mtshan nyid mi 'gyur bas mkhregs la /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid mi 'gyur bas mkhregs la /
translated: It is hard because its nature is unchanging.

original: stong pa nyid rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: It is the diamond scepter because it is indivisible like the diamond.

original: de yang // mi phyed mi chod mi shigs pas //
analyzed: de yang // mi phyed mi chod mi shigs pas //
translated: Because it is indivisible, uncuttable, and indestructible,

original: stong pa nyid la rdo rjer bshad //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la rdo rjer bshad //
translated: Emptiness is explained as the vajra.

original: ces pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ces pa lta bu'o //
translated: And:🔽Since it destroys all habitual tendencies, it is the great wrathful one.🔽And:

original: de yang don gyi sgo nas bag chags thams cad 'joms bas drag po che la rtags kyi sgo nas gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i drag po'i gzugs su sprul pa'o //
analyzed: de yang don gyi sgo nas bag chags thams cad 'joms bas drag po che la rtags kyi sgo nas gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i drag po'i gzugs su sprul pa'o //
translated: Since it subdues all evil ones, it emanates in the form of wrathful ones.

original: des gang 'jigs par byed na /
analyzed: des gang 'jigs par byed na /
translated: What does it terrify?

original: khyab 'jug dang / ma h'a de ba la sogs pa 'jigs chen rnams rje btsun gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khyab 'jug dang / ma h'a de ba la sogs pa 'jigs chen rnams rje btsun gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: The great terrors such as Vishnu and Mahesvara are terrified by the Lord.

original: khyad par gyi lam gyi tshul gang zhe na //
analyzed: khyad par gyi lam gyi tshul gang zhe na //
translated: What is the special path?

original: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
analyzed: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
translated: The Lord is the great lineage,

original: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
analyzed: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
translated: the guru, the supreme great mantra, abiding in the way of the Mahayana,

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces smos te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces smos te /
translated: the supreme way of the Mahayana.

original: gdul bya'i mgon skyabs mdzad pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha'i rigs la mchog tu gyur cing 'gro ba la dam pa'i chos nye bar ston pas bla ma /
analyzed: gdul bya'i mgon skyabs mdzad pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha'i rigs la mchog tu gyur cing 'gro ba la dam pa'i chos nye bar ston pas bla ma /
translated: The Buddha is the supreme deity of body, speech, and mind, who protects and is the refuge of those to be trained. He is the guru because he teaches the holy Dharma to beings.

original: thabs dang shes rab khyad par can ston pas gsang sngags che ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab khyad par can ston pas gsang sngags che ba'i mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme of the great secret mantras because he teaches the special method and wisdom.🔽Moreover,🔽though the meaning is the same, the mantra vehicle is superior

original: de yang // don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
analyzed: de yang // don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
translated: because it is not confused, has many methods, is not difficult,

original: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'o //
translated: and is for those of sharp faculties.

original: sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags //🔽zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags // zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The mantra vehicle is superior to the perfection vehicle.

original: de yang theg pa chen po ni shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang theg pa chen po ni shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the Great Vehicle is distinguished by wisdom and compassion.

original: skal ba can de la gzud pa'i phyir //
analyzed: skal ba can de la gzud pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to introduce those with good fortune to the Great Vehicle,🔽the Buddha, who is the teacher of the Great Vehicle,

original: rang nyid kyang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston na //
analyzed: rang nyid kyang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston na //
translated: demonstrates the way to abide in the Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po 'di'i tshul pha rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur to //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di'i tshul pha rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur to //
translated: The mantra vehicle is superior to the perfection vehicle.

original: gang gis na 'khor 'das dbyer med du ston pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis na 'khor 'das dbyer med du ston pa'o //
translated: By what is cyclic existence and nirvana taught to be inseparable?

original: da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the name of the wisdom being Mañjuśrī from the perspective of the realm of phenomena,🔽it is said:

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
translated: The great buddha Vairocana,

original: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
analyzed: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
translated: the great sage, endowed with great sagehood,

original: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
translated: arisen from the great way of mantra,

original: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can // zhes smos te /
translated: the very essence of the great way of mantra.

original: sgrib pa sangs shing ye shes rgyas pas gdul bya la rnam pa sna tshogs su snang zhing /
analyzed: sgrib pa sangs shing ye shes rgyas pas gdul bya la rnam pa sna tshogs su snang zhing /
translated: Since obscurations are purified and wisdom expands, he appears in various forms to those to be tamed.

original: gzhan don mdzad pas che'o //
analyzed: gzhan don mdzad pas che'o //
translated: He is great because he acts for the benefit of others.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi mi dge ba'i las la bsrung mi dgos par thub la @13a * //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi mi dge ba'i las la bsrung mi dgos par thub la @13a * //
translated: He is a sage because he does not need to guard against nonvirtuous actions of body, speech, and mind.

original: de yang dus rtag tu mnyam pa la bzhag pas thub chen ldan no //
analyzed: de yang dus rtag tu mnyam pa la bzhag pas thub chen ldan no //
translated: He is endowed with great sagehood because he is always equipoised.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu ston pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srog bskul bas na sngags so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu ston pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srog bskul bas na sngags so //
translated: Mantra means that he displays inconceivable power and arouses the life-force of the mundane and supramundane.

original: de nyid rtogs dka' ba dang / gzhan la bstan pa ma yin dzas /
analyzed: de nyid rtogs dka' ba dang / gzhan la bstan pa ma yin dzas /
translated: It is secret because it is difficult to realize and is not taught to others.

original: gsang ba'o ; / tshul ni lam mo //
analyzed: gsang ba'o ; / tshul ni lam mo //
translated: The method is the path.

original: de las sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de las sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste /
translated: The Buddha arises from that.

original: de ni khyad par gyi lam mo //
analyzed: de ni khyad par gyi lam mo //
translated: That is the special path.

original: rje btsun nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas na bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rje btsun nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas na bdag nyid can no //
translated: Since the Lord himself abides as the essence of secret mantra, he is the embodiment.

original: thun mong gi lam gang zhe na /
analyzed: thun mong gi lam gang zhe na /
translated: What is the common path?

original: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
analyzed: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
translated: It is attaining the ten perfections.

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //🔽pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas // pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
translated: Abiding in the ten perfections,🔽purifying the ten perfections,

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
translated: the method of the ten perfections.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: It is said:

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la dbang thob cing /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la dbang thob cing /
translated: Having attained mastery over the ten perfections,

original: gzhan de la gzud pa'i phyir rang yang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa dang / de rnams lam zhen pa dang / de dag gi gzhung tshul la mkhas pa'o //🔽mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: gzhan de la gzud pa'i phyir rang yang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa dang / de rnams lam zhen pa dang / de dag gi gzhung tshul la mkhas pa'o // mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
translated: in order to introduce others to them, one demonstrates the method of abiding in them oneself, attachment to those paths, and being skilled in the treatises of those perfections.🔽The protector is the lord of the ten bhūmis,

original: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po //
analyzed: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po //
translated: abiding on the ten bhūmis.

original: zhes pas ni yon tan 'phel ba'i rten byed pas shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin las zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pas ni yon tan 'phel ba'i rten byed pas shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin las zhes bya ste /
translated: The phrase “from wisdom and meditative absorption” means that the bodhisattva serves as the basis for the increase of good qualities.

original: de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob pas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob pas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The first stage, the Joyous, is attained through the attainment of the supramundane mind.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dri ma dang bral bas gnyis pa dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dri ma dang bral bas gnyis pa dri ma med pa'o //
translated: The second stage, the Stainless, is attained through being free of the stain of immorality.

original: mchog tu gsal ba'i shes rab thob pas gsum pa 'od byed pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gsal ba'i shes rab thob pas gsum pa 'od byed pa'o //
translated: The third stage, the Radiant, is attained through the attainment of supreme illuminating wisdom.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi 'od 'phro bas bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi 'od 'phro bas bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba'o //
translated: The fourth stage, the Brilliant, is attained through the radiance of the Dharma of the factors of awakening.

original: bsam gtan dang 'gro don mdzad pa gnyis 'joms pas rang gi rgyud sbyang bar dka' bar mdzad pas lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang 'gro don mdzad pa gnyis 'joms pas rang gi rgyud sbyang bar dka' bar mdzad pas lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'o //
translated: The fifth stage, the Hard to Conquer, is attained through the difficulty of conquering one’s continuum through the combination of meditative absorption and the performance of benefit for beings.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pas drug pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pas drug pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
translated: The sixth stage, the Realized, is attained through the actualization of the meditative absorption of signlessness.

original: mtshan ma las ring du song bas na bdun pa ring du song ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma las ring du song bas na bdun pa ring du song ba'o //
translated: The seventh stage, the Far-reaching, is attained through going far beyond signs.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g-yo bar gnas pas brgyad pa mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g-yo bar gnas pas brgyad pa mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: Since one remains in that meditative absorption without wavering due to any signs, it is the eighth level, The Immovable.

original: gdul bya rnams la chos ston pa'i blo gros chen po dang ldan pas dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros so //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams la chos ston pa'i blo gros chen po dang ldan pas dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros so //
translated: Since one possesses the great intelligence that teaches the doctrine to those who are to be tamed, it is the ninth level, The Excellent Intelligence.

original: chos kyi char gyis gdul bya'i chos kyi lo tog smin par byed pa'i yon tan gyi sprin chen po dang ldan pas bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi char gyis gdul bya'i chos kyi lo tog smin par byed pa'i yon tan gyi sprin chen po dang ldan pas bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since one possesses the great cloud of qualities that ripens the crop of the doctrine of those to be tamed with the rain of the doctrine, it is the tenth level, The Cloud of Dharma.🔽In order to master the ten levels and explain them to others,

original: sa bcu la dbang bsgyur zhing gzhan la 'chad pa dang / gzhan de la gzud par bya @13b ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sa bcu la dbang bsgyur zhing gzhan la 'chad pa dang / gzhan de la gzud par bya @13b ba'i phyir /
translated: and in order to introduce others to them,

original: de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa'o //
translated: one demonstrates the way of abiding there.

original: der yang ma zad de che ba'i yon tan du mar snang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: der yang ma zad de che ba'i yon tan du mar snang ba'i phyir //
translated: Not only that, since one appears with many qualities of greatness,

original: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: one possesses the nature of the ten pure aspects of knowledge.

original: shes pa bcu ni chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
analyzed: shes pa bcu ni chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
translated: The ten knowledges are the knowledge of phenomena, the knowledge of subsequent realization, the knowledge of others’ minds, the knowledge of relative reality, the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of the origin of suffering, the knowledge of the cessation of suffering,🔽the knowledge of the path, the knowledge of exhaustion, and the knowledge of nonarising.

original: lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / shes pa bcu po de rang bzhin med par shes pas rnam dag go //
analyzed: lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / shes pa bcu po de rang bzhin med par shes pas rnam dag go //
translated: These ten knowledges are pure because they are known to be devoid of inherent nature.

original: de rnams gzhan la ston pas shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams gzhan la ston pas shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po zhes bya'o //
translated: Since they teach others, they are called “the holders of the ten pure knowledges.”

original: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
translated: The ten aspects are the meaning of the ten topics.

original: zhes pa rnam pa bcu ni 'khor ba'i chos phung po lnga dang / nyon mongs pa lnga ste bcu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rnam pa bcu ni 'khor ba'i chos phung po lnga dang / nyon mongs pa lnga ste bcu'o //
translated: The ten aspects are the five aggregates of samsaric phenomena and the five afflictions.

original: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad bsdus na der 'dus so //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad bsdus na der 'dus so //
translated: When all the phenomena of samsara are condensed, they are included in these.

original: de dag rnam par dag pas don bcu ste /
analyzed: de dag rnam par dag pas don bcu ste /
translated: Since they are completely pure, they are the ten topics.

original: rigs lnga ye shes lnga ste bcu'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga ye shes lnga ste bcu'o //
translated: The five families and the five pristine awarenesses are the ten.

original: de bcu ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i 'os yin pas don zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bcu ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i 'os yin pas don zhes bya'o //
translated: These ten are called aims because they are worthy of being pursued.

original: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag / ces ba thub pa ni rgyal ba rnams so //
analyzed: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag / ces ba thub pa ni rgyal ba rnams so //
translated: The lord of sages is the lord of the sages, the one who is pervaded by the ten powers.🔽The sages are the victors.

original: de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pas thub dbang ngo //🔽stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang 'bras bu mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / lam sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pas thub dbang ngo // stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang 'bras bu mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / lam sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
translated: Since he is the chief of them, he is the lord of the sages.🔽The ten powers are the power of knowing what is and is not possible, the power of knowing the fully ripened effects of actions, the power of knowing the various dhātus, the power of knowing the various inclinations of beings, the power of knowing the various faculties of beings,

original: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / skye ba dang 'chi 'pho mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / skye ba dang 'chi 'pho mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
translated: the power of knowing the path that leads everywhere, the power of knowing one’s own and others’ defilements and purification, the power of knowing one’s past lives, the power of knowing death, transmigration, and rebirth, and the power of knowing the exhaustion of defilements.

original: zag bcas dang zag med mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: zag bcas dang zag med mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
translated: The power of knowing the contaminated and uncontaminated.

original: de yang thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid du zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid du zhugs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, he is engaged in the nature of pervading all with great compassion.

original: thugs rjes khyab pa tsam ma yin te /🔽gdul bya ma lus pa'i don ji ltar 'tsham par mdzad pas //
analyzed: thugs rjes khyab pa tsam ma yin te / gdul bya ma lus pa'i don ji ltar 'tsham par mdzad pas //
translated: Not only does he pervade with compassion,🔽he acts in accordance with the needs of all those to be tamed.

original: kun gyi don ni ma lus byed //
analyzed: kun gyi don ni ma lus byed //
translated: He performs the welfare of all without exception.

original: ces pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: ces pa smos pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba bo //
analyzed: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba bo //
translated: He is the great one who possesses the ten masteries.

original: zhes pa rje btsun nyid dbang bcu'i yon tan dang ldan te /
analyzed: zhes pa rje btsun nyid dbang bcu'i yon tan dang ldan te /
translated: The exalted one himself possesses the qualities of the ten masteries:🔽mastery over life, mind,

original: tshe la dbang ba dang / sems dang / yo byad @14a * //
analyzed: tshe la dbang ba dang / sems dang / yo byad @14a * //
translated: possessions,🔽karma, birth,🔽miracles, aspiration,🔽prayer,

original: dang ; las dang / skye ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mos pa dang / smon lam dang / ye shes dang / chos la dbang ba'o //
analyzed: dang ; las dang / skye ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mos pa dang / smon lam dang / ye shes dang / chos la dbang ba'o //
translated: and the Dharma.

original: de ltar na mtshan ma can gyi skyon du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan ma can gyi skyon du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: If it is asked if the faults of having attributes do not arise in that way,

original: thog ma med pa spros med bdag / de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag / ces smos te /
analyzed: thog ma med pa spros med bdag / de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag / ces smos te /
translated: the reply is that he is the beginningless one, the one without elaborations, the one with the nature of suchness, and the one with the pure nature.

original: chos nyid la thog mtha' med pa la brtags pas mtha' thams cad dang bral bas sbros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos nyid la thog mtha' med pa la brtags pas mtha' thams cad dang bral bas sbros pa med pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from all extremes because it is examined as having neither beginning nor end in reality, it is free from mental fabrication.

original: 'gyur ba med pas de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pas de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Since it is unchanging, it is thusness.

original: gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas dag pa'i bdag go //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas dag pa'i bdag go //
translated: Since it is free from the stain of subject and object, it is the pure self.

original: de ltar na gzhan gyi don la ji ltar 'dug ce na //
analyzed: de ltar na gzhan gyi don la ji ltar 'dug ce na //
translated: How is it thus for the benefit of others?

original: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur//
analyzed: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur//
translated: He speaks the truth and his words are not false.

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
translated: He does what he says.

original: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
translated: He teaches nonduality as nonduality.

original: gzhan mi slu bar don dang mthun par smra bas bden par smra la /
analyzed: gzhan mi slu bar don dang mthun par smra bas bden par smra la /
translated: He speaks the truth because he speaks in accord with fact without deceiving others.

original: gzhan don byed par dam bcas pa kho na bzhin du mdzad pas tshig mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan don byed par dam bcas pa kho na bzhin du mdzad pas tshig mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: His words are not false because he does only what he has promised to do for the benefit of others.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma'am rmi lam lta bu yin no zhes smra ba kho na bzhin du rang yang spyod par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma'am rmi lam lta bu yin no zhes smra ba kho na bzhin du rang yang spyod par byed do //
translated: He does what he says because he himself practices exactly as he preaches that all phenomena are like illusions or dreams.

original: rjes su mthun pas gzhan mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pas gzhan mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He teaches nonduality as nonduality because he generates interest in others through his concordant behavior.

original: de mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon par bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon par bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation of how it outshines the discordant class is as follows.

original: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
translated: Abides in the reality limit.

original: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
analyzed: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
translated: Having the lion’s roar of selflessness,

original: mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
analyzed: mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
translated: He terrifies the evil beasts of the extremists.

original: kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs //
translated: Having the power of the all-pervading meaning,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs // zhes smos te /
translated: He is like the mind of the Tathāgata in speed.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' gnyis med la gnas nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' gnyis med la gnas nas /
translated: Having abided in the non-dual reality limit,

original: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i chos kyi sgra 'jigs pa med par sgrogs par byed pa /
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i chos kyi sgra 'jigs pa med par sgrogs par byed pa /
translated: He proclaims the fearless sound of the Dharma, which is free from the manifest clinging to self and “mine.”

original: seng ge'i sgra lta bu lta ba log pa bdag tu rtog cing /
analyzed: seng ge'i sgra lta bu lta ba log pa bdag tu rtog cing /
translated: Like the lion’s roar, he terrifies the evil beasts who have the wrong views of conceiving a self

original: nang pa la smod pa'i ri dags lta bu ngan pa 'jigs shing skrag par byed cing 'gro ba kun gyi don skyes bu'i stobs ltar ji ltar yang snang nas mdzad do //
analyzed: nang pa la smod pa'i ri dags lta bu ngan pa 'jigs shing skrag par byed cing 'gro ba kun gyi don skyes bu'i stobs ltar ji ltar yang snang nas mdzad do //
translated: and disparage the insiders. He appears in all the worlds and acts for the benefit of all beings, like the power of a person.

original: de yang 'gro ba'i don la de ka bzhin du gshegs te /
analyzed: de yang 'gro ba'i don la de ka bzhin du gshegs te /
translated: Moreover, he goes to the benefit of beings just like that.

original: myur bar mdzad pa'i dpe ni yid lta bu'o //
analyzed: myur bar mdzad pa'i dpe ni yid lta bu'o //
translated: The example of his swift action is like the mind.

original: de la sku'i yon tan ji ltar snang na /
analyzed: de la sku'i yon tan ji ltar snang na /
translated: How does the quality of his body appear?

original: rgyal ba rnam rgyal dgra las rgyal //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnam rgyal dgra las rgyal //
translated: Victorious, all-victorious, victorious over the enemy,

original: 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che //
translated: Universal monarch, great power,🔽Master of the assembly, best of assemblies,

original: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog / tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan //
analyzed: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog / tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan //
translated: Lord of the assembly, master of the assembly, powerful,🔽Great power, great power,

original: mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste //🔽tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / ces te /
analyzed: mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste // tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog / ces te /
translated: Great power, not dependent on others.

original: @14b yon tan gyi bgo skal gyis ma pham pas rgyal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa las rgyal ba dang / dgra bdud bzhi las rgyal ba ste /
analyzed: @14b yon tan gyi bgo skal gyis ma pham pas rgyal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa las rgyal ba dang / dgra bdud bzhi las rgyal ba ste /
translated: He is called Victorious because he is not defeated by any of the qualities. He is called all-victorious because he is victorious over all conceptual thoughts. He is called victorious over the enemy because he is victorious over the four demons.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: He is called universal monarch because he acts for the welfare of beings by emanating in the form of a universal monarch of the world.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas 'gro ba rnams kyi kha lo sgyur bas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas 'gro ba rnams kyi kha lo sgyur bas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: He is called universal monarch because he turns the wheel of Dharma and guides beings.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: He is called universal monarch because he is the principal figure of the mandala.

original: gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas kyang stobs che ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas kyang stobs che ba'o //
translated: He is called great power because he conquers the armies of others.

original: de yang nyan thos kyi tshogs kyi slob dpon mdzad cing /
analyzed: de yang nyan thos kyi tshogs kyi slob dpon mdzad cing /
translated: He is the master of the assembly of śrāvakas.

original: rang rgyal ba 'dren pas na tshogs kyi mchog go //
analyzed: rang rgyal ba 'dren pas na tshogs kyi mchog go //
translated: He is the leader of the pratyekabuddhas, so he is the supreme assembly.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi rje bo mdzad cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi rje bo mdzad cing /
translated: He is the lord of the assembly of bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi bdag po mdzad /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi bdag po mdzad /
translated: He is the lord of the assembly of tathāgatas.

original: de rnams la dbang bsgyur ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la dbang bsgyur ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has the power to control them.

original: der yang ma zad de gzung 'dzin 'joms pa'i mthu chen po mnga' bas shin tu gces pa'i chos ni gnyis med yin pas de 'chang bas 'dzin pa'o //
