analyzed: der yang ma zad de gzung 'dzin 'joms pa'i mthu chen po mnga' bas shin tu gces pa'i chos ni gnyis med yin pas de 'chang bas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Not only that, he has great power to destroy percepts and perceivers. Since nonduality is the most cherished dharma, he holds it by holding that.

original: des na lam bgrod du med pas /
analyzed: des na lam bgrod du med pas /
translated: Since there is no path to traverse,

original: gzhan gyis bkri mi dgos pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyis bkri mi dgos pa ste /
translated: he does not need to be led by another.

original: des na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: des na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he is not dependent on others.

original: de la gsung gi yon tan ji lta bu 'byung zhe na //
analyzed: de la gsung gi yon tan ji lta bu 'byung zhe na //
translated: What kind of good qualities of speech arise in him?

original: tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa //
analyzed: tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa //
translated: He is the lord of words, skilled in speech,

original: tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas //
analyzed: tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas //
translated: with power over words, with infinite words,

original: tshig bden bden par smra ba ste //
analyzed: tshig bden bden par smra ba ste //
translated: with true words, speaking the truth,

original: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //🔽zhes smos te /
translated: the teacher of the four truths.

original: 'dis ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bstan te /🔽tshig rje ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bstan te / tshig rje ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
translated: This verse shows the four right discriminations.🔽The first line shows the right discrimination of meaning.

original: tshig bdag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o //🔽smra ba mkhas pa ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
analyzed: tshig bdag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o // smra ba mkhas pa ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
translated: The second line shows the right discrimination of language.🔽The third line shows the right discrimination of teaching.

original: tshig la dbang ba ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
analyzed: tshig la dbang ba ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
translated: The fourth line shows the right discrimination of perspicuity.

original: sgra skad sna tshogs kyis don mdzad pas tshig mtha' yas so //
analyzed: sgra skad sna tshogs kyis don mdzad pas tshig mtha' yas so //
translated: His speech is infinite because he acts for the sake of beings with various languages and dialects.

original: mi slu ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig bden la /
analyzed: mi slu ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig bden la /
translated: His speech is true because he teaches the nonerroneous Dharma.

original: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su phye nas smra ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ste /
analyzed: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su phye nas smra ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ste /
translated: Moreover, he teaches by distinguishing the two truths, and by distinguishing the four noble truths: suffering, origin, cessation, and path.

original: de ltar bden pa bzhi phye nas kyang ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar bden pa bzhi phye nas kyang ston par mdzad do //
translated: Thus he teaches by distinguishing the four noble truths.

original: nges par 'byung ba'i chos su ji ltar snang zhe na //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba'i chos su ji ltar snang zhe na //
translated: How does he teach the Dharma of deliverance?

original: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //
translated: The nonreturner does not return;

original: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
analyzed: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
translated: The leader is the rhinoceros;

original: nges 'byung sna tshogs las 'byung ba //
analyzed: nges 'byung sna tshogs las 'byung ba //
translated: It arises from various kinds of renunciation.

original: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig bo //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig bo //
translated: It has a single cause, the great elements.

original: dge slong dgra bcom zag @15a * //
analyzed: dge slong dgra bcom zag @15a * //
translated: The monk who is an Arhat, whose impurities are destroyed,

original: pa zad // 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul //
analyzed: pa zad // 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul //
translated: who is free from passions, who has controlled his senses,

original: bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob //
analyzed: bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob //
translated: who has attained happiness and gained fearlessness,

original: ces smos te /
analyzed: ces smos te /
translated: he is the one who is called a Muni.

original: spyir bzod pa thob nas ngan song du mi ldog / sa dang po thob nas 'khor bar mi ldog / sa brgyad pa non nas theg dman du mi ldog ste /
analyzed: spyir bzod pa thob nas ngan song du mi ldog / sa dang po thob nas 'khor bar mi ldog / sa brgyad pa non nas theg dman du mi ldog ste /
translated: In general, once one has attained the stage of patience, one does not return to evil destinies. Once one has attained the first stage, one does not return to cyclic existence. Once one has attained the eighth stage, one does not return to the Hinayana.

original: de phyin chad rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste /
analyzed: de phyin chad rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste /
translated: From then on, one does not return from perfect enlightenment.

original: 'khor bar mi 'ong ngo //
analyzed: 'khor bar mi 'ong ngo //
translated: One does not come back to cyclic existence.

original: 'gro ba'i don du sprul pa ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du sprul pa ni ma gtogs so //
translated: This does not apply to the emanations who work for the benefit of beings.

original: de la 'dren pa rang rgyal ni ne tsho ltar tshogs na spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dren pa rang rgyal ni ne tsho ltar tshogs na spyod pa'o //
translated: The Pratyekabuddha guides are like cranes: they live in groups.

original: bse ru ni bse ru ltar gcig pur gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bse ru ni bse ru ltar gcig pur gnas pa'o //
translated: The rhinoceros-like live alone like rhinoceroses.

original: rje btsun der yang sprul lo //
analyzed: rje btsun der yang sprul lo //
translated: The Lord Buddha also emanates himself in these forms.

original: der yang ma zad de theg pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gang la gang gis 'dul ba dang / khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i lan sna tshogs ston par mdzad cing /
analyzed: der yang ma zad de theg pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gang la gang gis 'dul ba dang / khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i lan sna tshogs ston par mdzad cing /
translated: Not only that, he also teaches various answers for the sake of taming beings through various vehicles and for the definite emergence from the three realms.

original: 'byung ba chen po lngar snang nas kyang don mdzad de /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po lngar snang nas kyang don mdzad de /
translated: He also performs benefits by appearing as the five great elements.

original: de dag gi rgyu ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de dag gi rgyu ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The cause of those is nondual wisdom.

original: de yang dge ba lam du slong zhing /
analyzed: de yang dge ba lam du slong zhing /
translated: Moreover, since virtue is taken up as the path

original: nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms pas srid par skye ba'i zag pa zad do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms pas srid par skye ba'i zag pa zad do //
translated: and the enemy of afflictions is destroyed, the defilements of birth in existence are exhausted.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang bral bas spyod yul gyis mi gos te /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang bral bas spyod yul gyis mi gos te /
translated: Since one is free from afflictions such as desire, the field of experience is unstained.

original: mig la sogs yul lnga la mi chags par shar bas /
analyzed: mig la sogs yul lnga la mi chags par shar bas /
translated: Since one arises without attachment to the five objects such as form,

original: 'khor ba'i g-yang sas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i g-yang sas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: one is not afraid of the abyss of samsara.

original: de 'chad pa po'i tshul ci 'dra zhe na //
analyzed: de 'chad pa po'i tshul ci 'dra zhe na //
translated: What is the manner of the one who explains that?

original: bsil bar gyur bas rnyog pa med //
analyzed: bsil bar gyur bas rnyog pa med //
translated: Since it is cool, it is free of turbidity.

original: rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan //
analyzed: rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan //
translated: It is endowed with knowledge and feet.

original: bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog / bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin //
analyzed: bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog / bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin //
translated: did not grasp at “mine” or “I”

original: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
translated: and abided in the way of the two truths.

original: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa //
translated: Having reached the far shore of samsara,

original: bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas //
analyzed: bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas //
translated: he was one who had done what had to be done, and he dwelt on dry land.

original: ye shes 'ba' zhig las 'byung ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: ye shes 'ba' zhig las 'byung ba // zhes smos te /
translated: He arose from wisdom alone.

original: bsil ba chu lta bu'i chos nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel zhing /
analyzed: bsil ba chu lta bu'i chos nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel zhing /
translated: The dharmata of coolness, like water, removes the torment of the afflictions.

original: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa dri ma chu'i rnyog ma lta bu dang bral te /
analyzed: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa dri ma chu'i rnyog ma lta bu dang bral te /
translated: Free from the stains of temporary concepts, like the murkiness of water,

original: mig dang 'dra ba'i lta ba rig pa dang / rkang pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa zung 'brel du ldan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde bar gshegs pa la sems can gyi las 'phro dang / mos pa dang snod du rung mi rung dang /
analyzed: mig dang 'dra ba'i lta ba rig pa dang / rkang pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa zung 'brel du ldan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde bar gshegs pa la sems can gyi las 'phro dang / mos pa dang snod du rung mi rung dang /
translated: the view, which is like eyes, and conduct, which is like legs, are united.

original: 'dul ba'i dus la bab ma bab mkhyen pas nyan thos dang / rang rgyal las khyad par du 'phags pas 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dus la bab ma bab mkhyen pas nyan thos dang / rang rgyal las khyad par du 'phags pas 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog go //
translated: He is the best of those who know the world, because he is superior to the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas by knowing whether the time is right to tame or not.

original: mngon sum du snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas phyi yul la bdag gir mi @15b 'dzin la /
analyzed: mngon sum du snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas phyi yul la bdag gir mi @15b 'dzin la /
translated: He does not grasp external objects as his own, because he knows that these appearances are like illusions.

original: nang sems la ngar mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: nang sems la ngar mi 'dzin te /
translated: He does not grasp the inner mind as “I.”

original: rang don dang gzhan don gyi dbang gis bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas par byed do //
analyzed: rang don dang gzhan don gyi dbang gis bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas par byed do //
translated: He abides in the way of the two truths for the sake of his own and others’ goals.

original: 'on 'khor bar mi 'gyur ram zhen //
analyzed: 'on 'khor bar mi 'gyur ram zhen //
translated: “But won’t he then become a samsaric being?”

original: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son te //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son te //
translated: He has reached the end, the other shore of samsara.

original: bya ba byas nas stobs dang ldan pas 'dam nas 'thon pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'thon te byang chub kyi skam sa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba byas nas stobs dang ldan pas 'dam nas 'thon pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'thon te byang chub kyi skam sa la gnas pa'o //
translated: Having done what had to be done, he emerges from the swamp of samsara like one who has gained strength and emerges from a swamp, and abides on the dry land of enlightenment.

original: de'i rgyu ni gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba'o //
translated: The cause of that is the two form bodies arising from the sole gnosis that realizes nonduality.

original: des bstan pa'i cho gang zhe na //
analyzed: des bstan pa'i cho gang zhe na //
translated: “What is the ritual that he teaches?”

original: shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa //
analyzed: shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa //
translated: The great weapon of wisdom destroys

original: dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan //
analyzed: dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan //
translated: The holy Dharma is the clear king.

original: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The supreme illuminator of the world.

original: shes rab mtshon lta bus nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab mtshon lta bus nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o //
translated: With the sword of wisdom, he conquers the afflictions.

original: dam pa'i chos rgyal po lta bu thugs la gsal bar ldan pas 'jig rten pa la ye shes snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos rgyal po lta bu thugs la gsal bar ldan pas 'jig rten pa la ye shes snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: With the holy Dharma, which is like a king, he illuminates the wisdom of the world.

original: don phra mo tsam ma yin te thar pa la sbyor ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: don phra mo tsam ma yin te thar pa la sbyor ba'i mchog go //
translated: He is not just concerned with subtle points, but is the supreme guide to liberation.

original: des gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul ni /
analyzed: des gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul ni /
translated: The way in which he benefits others is as follows.

original: chos kyi dbang phyug cho kyi rgyal //
analyzed: chos kyi dbang phyug cho kyi rgyal //
translated: The lord of Dharma, the king of Dharma,

original: legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po //🔽don grub bsam pa grub pa ste //
analyzed: legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po // don grub bsam pa grub pa ste //
translated: The one who shows the good path,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: The one who accomplishes the aims, the one who accomplishes the thoughts,🔽The one who is the supreme guide.

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la rje btsun nyid dbang sgyur bas chos kyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la rje btsun nyid dbang sgyur bas chos kyi dbang phyug go //
translated: Since the Lord is the master of the eighty-four thousand bundles of Dharma, he is the lord of Dharma.

original: des gdul bya rnams nyon mongs pa las rgyal bar byas nas phyin ci ma log par legs pa'i lam ji ltar 'tsham par bstan te /
analyzed: des gdul bya rnams nyon mongs pa las rgyal bar byas nas phyin ci ma log par legs pa'i lam ji ltar 'tsham par bstan te /
translated: Having conquered the afflictions of those to be tamed, he shows them the unmistaken good path in accordance with their needs.

original: sems can gyi don dang bsam pa grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi don dang bsam pa grub par byed pa'o //
translated: It accomplishes the aims and intentions of sentient beings.

original: 'o na rje btsun nyid rtog bcas su mi 'gyur ram zhe na //
analyzed: 'o na rje btsun nyid rtog bcas su mi 'gyur ram zhe na //
translated: Well then, isn't the Exalted One himself conceptual?

original: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: All conceptualization is abandoned.

original: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
translated: The nonconceptual realm is inexhaustible.

original: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes // zhes smos te /
translated: The holy realm of phenomena is inexhaustible.

original: gzhan don mdzad kyang rtog pa med de //
analyzed: gzhan don mdzad kyang rtog pa med de //
translated: Even though he acts for the sake of others, he is without conceptualization,

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang log rtog 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang log rtog 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because right wisdom and wrong conceptualization are mutually exclusive.

original: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbyings las yon tan zad pa med par 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbyings las yon tan zad pa med par 'byung ste /
translated: Even though he is nonconceptual, qualities arise inexhaustibly from the realm.

original: yon tan gyi 'byung khungs chos kyi dbyings la zad mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi 'byung khungs chos kyi dbyings la zad mi shes pa'o //
translated: The source of qualities is the inexhaustible realm of phenomena.

original: de tshogs ji ltar rdzogs she na //
analyzed: de tshogs ji ltar rdzogs she na //
translated: How are the two collections perfected?

original: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
analyzed: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
translated: The meritorious one has the collection of merit.

original: ye shes ye shes khyad par che //
analyzed: ye shes ye shes khyad par che //
translated: The wise one has the great collection of wisdom.

original: ye shes ldan pa yod med shes //
analyzed: ye shes ldan pa yod med shes //
translated: The wise one knows existence and nonexistence.

original: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o // zhes smos te /
translated: The two collections are the collection of merit and the collection of wisdom.

original: rje btsun nyid ye nas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan la /
analyzed: rje btsun nyid ye nas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan la /
translated: The Exalted One himself is always endowed with the collection of merit.

original: gzhan de la gzhug pa'i @16a * //
analyzed: gzhan de la gzhug pa'i @16a * //
translated: and the other is to lead others to it.

original: phyir nyid kyang tshogs sogs pa'i tshul ston pa'o //
analyzed: phyir nyid kyang tshogs sogs pa'i tshul ston pa'o //
translated: Thus he shows the way to gather the accumulations.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs dang yang ldan te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs dang yang ldan te /
translated: He is also endowed with the accumulation of intuition,

original: de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i ye shes las kyang /
analyzed: de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i ye shes las kyang /
translated: and that is also superior to the intuition of the Disciples and the Self- Buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khyad par che ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khyad par che ste /
translated: The Bodhisattva's intuition is superior to that,

original: de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas /
translated: and he is endowed with the intuition of the Tathagata, which is even more superior.

original: yod pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa dang / med pa zhes bya ba ji lta ba shes pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa dang / med pa zhes bya ba ji lta ba shes pa ste /
translated: Thus he knows the extent of what is called existence and the mode of what is called non-existence.

original: de ltar tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas ni tshogs bsags pa las 'byung bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas ni tshogs bsags pa las 'byung bar bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, by perfecting the two accumulations, he shows the origination from the accumulation of the stores.

original: tshogs bsags pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku ji ltar 'byung zhe na //
analyzed: tshogs bsags pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku ji ltar 'byung zhe na //
translated: How does the Buddha-body originate from the accumulation of the stores?

original: rtag ba kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
analyzed: rtag ba kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
translated: The yogi who is always victorious,🔽the supreme one who is endowed with the thought of meditation,

original: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog / so sor rang rig spyod yul ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog / so sor rang rig spyod yul ba //
translated: the one whose domain is the intuition of each one for himself,

original: chog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
analyzed: chog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
translated: the one who first holds the three bodies,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa smros te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa smros te /
translated: and so on.

original: don dam chos kyi sku mi 'gyur ba de rnam rtog gi sgra las rgyal zhing /
analyzed: don dam chos kyi sku mi 'gyur ba de rnam rtog gi sgra las rgyal zhing /
translated: The ultimate, unchanging dharmakāya is victorious over the sounds of conceptuality.

original: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas rnal 'byor te /
translated: It is yoga because it is the union of method and wisdom.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: The union of method and wisdom

original: rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin //🔽zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin // zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: is called “yoga.”

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying bo la rnam pa rtog pa mi g-yo bas bsam gtan /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying bo la rnam pa rtog pa mi g-yo bas bsam gtan /
translated: It is concentration because the essence of nonconceptuality is unmoving from conceptuality.

original: de sangs rgyas don du gnyer ba rnams kyis bsam par bya ba'i 'os yin pas bsam bya //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas don du gnyer ba rnams kyis bsam par bya ba'i 'os yin pas bsam bya //
translated: It is to be contemplated because it is suitable to be contemplated by those who strive for the state of buddhahood.

original: gnyis med rtogs pas blo dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: gnyis med rtogs pas blo dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme of the wise because it is the realization of nonduality.

original: de yang mkhyen tshad ni /
analyzed: de yang mkhyen tshad ni /
translated: Moreover, the extent of that knowledge

original: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par so sor rang gis rig pa'o //
analyzed: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par so sor rang gis rig pa'o //
translated: is the individual, unmixed knowledge of the general and specific characteristics of phenomena.

original: de la ma zhen pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: de la ma zhen pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: Nonattachment to that is immovability.

original: de lta bu ni sku thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bu ni sku thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: Such a state is the supreme of all kāyas.

original: sku'i bye brag gzhan 'byung ba'i dngos po la de thob dgos pas dang po //
analyzed: sku'i bye brag gzhan 'byung ba'i dngos po la de thob dgos pas dang po //
translated: The other particular bodies arise from that, and the entities are necessary to attain that.

original: de'i yon tan gyi khyad par sku gsum du snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan gyi khyad par sku gsum du snang ba'o //
translated: The special qualities of that appear as the three bodies.

original: de las sku dang ye shes kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byung zhe na //
analyzed: de las sku dang ye shes kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byung zhe na //
translated: From that, how do the particular bodies and pristine consciousnesses arise?🔽The five bodies of the buddhas,🔽the lord of the five pristine consciousnesses,

original: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can / khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can / khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //
translated: the crown ornament of the five buddhas,

original: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chad //
analyzed: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chad //
translated: the five eyes, and the absence of attachment are explained.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
translated: The producer of all buddhas,🔽the supreme sublime son of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces smos te /
translated: is explained.

original: sku lnga ni chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sbrul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sku dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: sku lnga ni chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sbrul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sku dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
translated: The five bodies are the dharmakāya, the saṃbhogakāya, the nirmāṇakāya, the vajrakāya, and the abhisambodhikāya.

original: khyab bdag ni chos kyi dbyings kyis snod bcud kun la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: khyab bdag ni chos kyi dbyings kyis snod bcud kun la khyab pa'o //
translated: The lord pervades the entire world and its inhabitants with the dharmadhātu.

original: @16b ye shes lnga ni slad du bshad zin to //
analyzed: @16b ye shes lnga ni slad du bshad zin to //
translated: The five pristine consciousnesses have already been explained.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The buddhas are the five buddhas, Vairocana and so on.

original: ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngas brgyan pa cod pan can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngas brgyan pa cod pan can zhes bya'o //
translated: The five pristine awarenesses are adorned with the five buddhas, and so it is called “crowned.”

original: spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan no //
analyzed: spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan no //
translated: The five eyes are the flesh eye, the divine eye, the eye of wisdom, the eye of Dharma, and the eye of the buddhas.

original: de rnams la thogs chags med pas mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams la thogs chags med pas mnga' ba'o //
translated: Since they are unimpeded with respect to those, they are possessed.

original: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid rtogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid rtogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum du 'gyur zhing /
translated: Having realized the suchness of awakening mind, it becomes the mother who gives birth to all buddhas.

original: sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sras so //
analyzed: sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sras so //
translated: Bodhisattvas abiding on the levels are the children of the buddhas.

original: 'o na nyan thos rnams sras dam pa min pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nyan thos rnams sras dam pa min pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are the śrāvakas not the sublime children?

original: dper na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sras stong yod kyang /
analyzed: dper na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sras stong yod kyang /
translated: For example, a universal monarch may have a thousand sons.

original: mtshan dang ldan pa gcig sras kyi dam par 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: mtshan dang ldan pa gcig sras kyi dam par 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
translated: But he regards only the one who has the characteristics as the sublime son.

original: nyan thos dang rang rgyal shes rab dang snying rje chung bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa sgrub mi nus pas sras kyi dam pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang rgyal shes rab dang snying rje chung bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa sgrub mi nus pas sras kyi dam pa ma yin no //
translated: The śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas are not the best of the Buddha’s sons because they are unable to hold the Buddha’s lineage and accomplish his deeds, due to their lesser wisdom and compassion.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje dang shes rab che bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa sgrub pas sras po dam pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje dang shes rab che bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa sgrub pas sras po dam pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas are the best of the Buddha’s sons because they are able to hold the Buddha’s lineage and accomplish his deeds, due to their great compassion and wisdom.

original: gnas skabs su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su rje btsun nyid bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su rje btsun nyid bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: In terms of the situation, the venerable one himself abides in the form of a bodhisattva and performs the benefit of beings, so it is called that.

original: de'i mdzad pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i mdzad pa ci zhe na /
translated: What are his deeds?

original: shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med //
analyzed: shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med //
translated: Knowledge arises from existence, but not from birth.

original: chos las byung ba srid pa sel //
analyzed: chos las byung ba srid pa sel //
translated: Arising from the Dharma, it dispels existence.🔽The sole lord of the vajra, hard and solid,

original: gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag / ces smos te /
analyzed: gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag / ces smos te /
translated: the lord of beings from the moment of birth.

original: de kho na shes pas srid pa las 'byung ste /
analyzed: de kho na shes pas srid pa las 'byung ste /
translated: By knowing reality, one arises from existence.

original: 'khor bar skye ba'i gnas med do //
analyzed: 'khor bar skye ba'i gnas med do //
translated: There is no basis for birth in saṃsāra.

original: chos kyi sku rtogs pa las ye shes 'byung ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sku rtogs pa las ye shes 'byung ste /
translated: From the realization of the dharmakāya, wisdom arises.

original: de srid pa'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa sel lo //
analyzed: de srid pa'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa sel lo //
translated: It eliminates the causes of existence, karma and afflictions.

original: gang gis sel na ye shes drug ro gcig pa /
analyzed: gang gis sel na ye shes drug ro gcig pa /
translated: By what is it eliminated? By the six wisdoms, of one taste,

original: gnyen po med pa /
analyzed: gnyen po med pa /
translated: without antidote,

original: dbyer med pa des sel lo //
analyzed: dbyer med pa des sel lo //
translated: indivisible.

original: dus nam sel na skyes ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: dus nam sel na skyes ma thag tu'o //
translated: When is it eliminated? Immediately upon arising.

original: ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis ma rig pa ji ltar sel na //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis ma rig pa ji ltar sel na //
translated: How does it eliminate the ignorance of others by the method of the five wisdoms?

original: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
translated: Arisen from space, self-arisen,

original: shes rab ye shes ma'i che //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes ma'i che //
translated: great wisdom, great intuition,

original: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //🔽ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
analyzed: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed // ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
translated: great light, illuminating,🔽wisdom star, blazing,

original: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
translated: lamp of migrators, wisdom lamp.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang dra ba las yon tan 'gag pa med pa 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang dra ba las yon tan 'gag pa med pa 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: Since the qualities of the space and web of the dharmadhatu arise without obstruction, it is the wisdom of the dharmadhatu.

original: de'i don shes rab dam ba rtogs te /
analyzed: de'i don shes rab dam ba rtogs te /
translated: The supreme wisdom of that is realized.

original: gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ye @17a * //
analyzed: gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ye @17a * //
translated: The fire of nonconceptual clear wisdom

original: shes kyi mes 'joms te /
analyzed: shes kyi mes 'joms te /
translated: destroys it.

original: me yis rtsi sdur bsreg pa lta bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: me yis rtsi sdur bsreg pa lta bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: Like a fire burning a pile of kindling, it is the mirror-like wisdom.

original: chos thams cad mnyam par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od chen po 'bar bas gdul bya la che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs snang bar byed pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //🔽so sor rtog /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od chen po 'bar bas gdul bya la che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs snang bar byed pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so // so sor rtog /
translated: The great light of gnosis that realizes the equality of all phenomena blazes, and it illuminates the various great qualities for those to be tamed.

original: pa'i ye shes sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la skar ma'i tshogs ma 'dres par gsal ba ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par rtogs pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: pa'i ye shes sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la skar ma'i tshogs ma 'dres par gsal ba ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par rtogs pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Discerning gnosis is like the sky free of clouds, in which the host of stars are clearly distinct. In the same way, since it realizes the distinct characteristics of all phenomena, it is discerning gnosis.

original: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mar me lta bus 'gro ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing /
analyzed: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mar me lta bus 'gro ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing /
translated: Accomplishing gnosis is like a lamp that dispels the darkness of beings’ ignorance and

original: 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: accomplishes the fulfillment of their wishes.

original: khyad par gsang sngags kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: khyad par gsang sngags kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In particular, in order to teach through the door of Secret Mantra,

original: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //🔽sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba // sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
translated: it is said, “The great splendor is luminosity.🔽The lord of supreme mantra is the king of awareness mantras.

original: gsang sngags rgyal bo don chen byed //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal bo don chen byed //
translated: The king of secret mantras accomplishes the great purpose.”

original: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces smos te /
analyzed: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces smos te /
translated: The great uṣṇīṣa, the marvelous crest.

original: gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung po chen po mnga' zhing /
analyzed: gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung po chen po mnga' zhing /
translated: He possesses the great mass of splendor that overwhelms others.

original: nang na ye shes lnga gsal ba'i rtags su phyi rol du 'od kha dog lnga gsal ba'o //
analyzed: nang na ye shes lnga gsal ba'i rtags su phyi rol du 'od kha dog lnga gsal ba'o //
translated: The sign of the manifestation of the five pristine consciousnesses within is the manifestation of the five colors of light without.

original: sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pas gsang sngags rig sngags yin la de'i mnga' bdag go //
analyzed: sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pas gsang sngags rig sngags yin la de'i mnga' bdag go //
translated: Since he is the supreme mantra, he is the vidyā mantra, and he is the lord of that.

original: rig sngags kyi rgyal po ni shes rab dang ye shes yin la /
analyzed: rig sngags kyi rgyal po ni shes rab dang ye shes yin la /
translated: The king of vidyā mantras is wisdom and pristine consciousness.

original: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po ni thabs dang shes rab khyad par can yin pas /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po ni thabs dang shes rab khyad par can yin pas /
translated: The king of secret mantras is the special method and wisdom.

original: skal ba dad skal bar ldan pa la de gnyis kyi sgo nas don byed pa'o //
analyzed: skal ba dad skal bar ldan pa la de gnyis kyi sgo nas don byed pa'o //
translated: He acts for the benefit of those who have good fortune and are endowed with good fortune through those two.

original: de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos yin pas gtsug tor ltar kun gyi sbyi gtsug tu bkur bar 'os pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos yin pas gtsug tor ltar kun gyi sbyi gtsug tu bkur bar 'os pa'o //
translated: Since that is a marvelous dharma, it is suitable to be the crest of all, like the uṣṇīṣa.

original: de tsam du ma zad de 'khrul ba sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: de tsam du ma zad de 'khrul ba sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni /
translated: Not only that, the arising of various delusions is

original: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
analyzed: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
translated: the display of the various lords of space.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
translated: The supreme body of all Buddhas, endowed with eyes pleasing to all beings,

original: sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po //
translated: The creator of various forms.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: zab pa rang gi don nam mkha' lta bu las rgya che ba gzhan gyi don sna tshogs ston pa'o //
analyzed: zab pa rang gi don nam mkha' lta bu las rgya che ba gzhan gyi don sna tshogs ston pa'o //
translated: From the profound, its own meaning like space, the extensive, the meaning for others, is shown as various.🔽The supreme body is the sixth.

original: sku'i mchog tu gyur pa ni drug por gcig pa'o / des 'gro ba'i don la gzigs te ji ltar dga' ba'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sku'i mchog tu gyur pa ni drug por gcig pa'o / des 'gro ba'i don la gzigs te ji ltar dga' ba'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o //
translated: Having seen the meaning for beings, having emanated various forms according to their pleasure, he acts for their welfare.

original: mngor na byang chub kyi sems sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: mngor na byang chub kyi sems sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o //
translated: In brief, having emanated the thought of enlightenment in various ways, he acts for their welfare.

original: mdor na byang chub kyi sems gzugs sna tshogs su shar bar ston to //
analyzed: mdor na byang chub kyi sems gzugs sna tshogs su shar bar ston to //
translated: In brief, it shows the thought of enlightenment arising in various forms.🔽Since it is endowed with the meaning, it is worthy of being honored by others.

original: @17b de nyid don dang ldan pas gzhan gyis bkur ba'i 'os su gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: @17b de nyid don dang ldan pas gzhan gyis bkur ba'i 'os su gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: Therefore,

original: drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod //
analyzed: drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod //
translated: It is worshipped and praised by the great sages.

original: rigs gsum 'char ba gsang sngags 'chang //
analyzed: rigs gsum 'char ba gsang sngags 'chang //
translated: The one who arises in the three families, the holder of the secret mantras,

original: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
translated: The great vow, the holder of the secret mantras.

original: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
analyzed: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
translated: The chief one is the holder of the Three Jewels.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: This is what it says.

original: drang srong ni spyir rig pa sgrub pa rnams la bya /
analyzed: drang srong ni spyir rig pa sgrub pa rnams la bya /
translated: The sage is generally one who accomplishes knowledge.

original: drang srong chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te rang yang drang po'i lam du zhugs pa la /
analyzed: drang srong chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te rang yang drang po'i lam du zhugs pa la /
translated: The great sage is the Bhagavān, because he himself has entered the path of uprightness,

original: gzhan yang drang po'i lam du song ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang drang po'i lam du song ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and because he has caused others to enter the path of uprightness.

original: des yang rje btsun nyid la mchod pa dang / yon tan brjod cing bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des yang rje btsun nyid la mchod pa dang / yon tan brjod cing bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
translated: He is the one who makes offerings to the venerable one himself, and is the one who praises and extols his qualities.

original: de ci 'chad na /
analyzed: de ci 'chad na /
translated: What does he explain?

original: sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / gsung padma'i rigs dang / thugs rdo rje'i rigs gsum 'chang zhing thabs dang shes rab khyad par can 'chang bas na /
analyzed: sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / gsung padma'i rigs dang / thugs rdo rje'i rigs gsum 'chang zhing thabs dang shes rab khyad par can 'chang bas na /
translated: He is the holder of the three families of the Tathāgata’s body, the lotus family of speech, and the vajra family of mind, and because he holds the special method and wisdom,

original: gsang sngags 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags 'chang ba ste /
translated: he is the holder of the secret mantra.

original: don las mi 'da' bas na /
analyzed: don las mi 'da' bas na /
translated: Because he does not transgress the meaning,

original: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo nas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin te /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo nas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin te /
translated: he holds the great commitment, and through the door of the secret mantra, he takes care of those to be tamed.

original: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas gtso bo'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas gtso bo'o //
translated: The root is the mind of enlightenment, and because it is the supreme of all dharmas, it is the chief one.

original: des dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul 'dzin cing /
analyzed: des dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul 'dzin cing /
translated: It upholds the way of the Three Jewels

original: gzhan yang 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad do //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad do //
translated: and causes others to uphold it as well.

original: de yang rgya che ba'i dkon mchog ni spyi dang mthun /🔽zab pa'i dbang du byas nas byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas dkon mchog / de'i don rtogs pa ni chos dkon mchog go //
analyzed: de yang rgya che ba'i dkon mchog ni spyi dang mthun / zab pa'i dbang du byas nas byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas dkon mchog / de'i don rtogs pa ni chos dkon mchog go //
translated: The extensive Three Jewels are in general agreement with the above.

original: rjes su sgrub pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog go //
analyzed: rjes su sgrub pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog go //
translated: From the point of view of the profound, the nondual mind of enlightenment is the jewel of the Buddha, the realization of its meaning is the jewel of the Dharma, and the practice of it is the jewel of the Sangha.

original: chos kyi sgo mo ji snyed pa yang theg pa gsum du 'dus te /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo mo ji snyed pa yang theg pa gsum du 'dus te /
translated: All the doors of Dharma are included in the three vehicles.

original: gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to care for those to be trained,

original: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa'o //🔽don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //🔽'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
analyzed: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa'o // don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal // 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
translated: the three supreme vehicles are taught.🔽The Amoghapaśa, the Victorious,🔽the Great Holder, the Vajra Lasso,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //🔽zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che // zhes pa smos te /
translated: the Vajra Hook, and the Great Lasso.

original: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / theg pa chen po gsum gang zag gi blo dang sbyar nas gang mos pa la ston par byed de /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / theg pa chen po gsum gang zag gi blo dang sbyar nas gang mos pa la ston par byed de /
translated: The three vehicles are the Hearers', the Solitary Realizers', and the Great Vehicle. They are taught in accordance with the mental capacities of the individuals to be trained, and they are taught to those who are interested in them.

original: des 'gro ba'i don yod par mdzad do //
analyzed: des 'gro ba'i don yod par mdzad do //
translated: He acts for the welfare of transmigrators.

original: 'khor ba las rgyal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'khor ba las rgyal bar byed do //
translated: He causes victory over cyclic existence.

original: thugs rje'i zhags pas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas de yang rgyu ci las 'byung na /
analyzed: thugs rje'i zhags pas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas de yang rgyu ci las 'byung na /
translated: If one asks from what cause does that arise,

original: chos kyi sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las 'byung ngo //
translated: it arises from the realization of the vajra-like dharmakāya.🔽Moreover,

original: de yang // stong nyid chos skur rtogs pa'i rtags //
analyzed: de yang // stong nyid chos skur rtogs pa'i rtags //
translated: The sign of realizing emptiness as the dharmakāya

original: byams dang snying rjes rab tu 'phel //
analyzed: byams dang snying rjes rab tu 'phel //
translated: Is the increase of love and compassion.

original: zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like that.

analyzed: de yang rdo rje'i rigs yin pas rdo rje'o //

analyzed: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i cha byad du bstan nas /

analyzed: ma h'a de ba la sogs pa dang / las kyi gshin rje rnams zhi bas mi 'dul ba de dag 'jigs shing skrag par byed pas 'dul ba'o ;

original: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //

original: de yang // gso dang skrod dang drag por ston ;

analyzed: de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //

original: de yang rigs drug dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
analyzed: de yang rigs drug dang ldan pa'i rtags so //

original: de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //🔽de yang rig drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su gdong drug go //
analyzed: de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o // de yang rig drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su gdong drug go //
translated: He is a king because he is the chief among the wrathful ones.🔽He has six faces as a sign of possessing the six families.

original: ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su mig drug go //
analyzed: ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su mig drug go //
translated: He has six eyes as a sign of possessing the six pristine awarenesses.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su lag pa drug go //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su lag pa drug go //

analyzed: gdug pa 'joms par byed pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: mi mgo skam rlon gyis brgyan pas keng rus so // nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab rnon pos nyon mongs pa 'joms shing /

original: gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rtags su mche ba gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rtags su mche ba gcig pa'o //
translated: He has one fang as a sign of subduing evil ones and destroying afflictive emotions with the sharp wisdom of the decisive process.

original: ha la ha la gdong brgya pa //
analyzed: ha la ha la gdong brgya pa //
translated: He has a hundred faces of Hala Hala.

original: zhes pa 'dis 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyan bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyan bstan te /

original: ha la ni dug ste /
analyzed: ha la ni dug ste /
translated: Hala means poison.

analyzed: dug bzhi dang ldan pa'i sprul gyis lus dang yan lag brgyan pa'o // gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //

original: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa //
translated: He is the vajra-speedy one, the terrifying one.

original: zhes pa 'dis ni sku'i phrin las bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni sku'i phrin las bstan te /

original: 'di las kyi gshin rje rnams 'dul ba'i gshed du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'di las kyi gshin rje rnams 'dul ba'i gshed du gyur pa ste /
translated: He is the one who became the executioner for subduing the Yama of karma.

original: bgegs kyi rgyal po byin ya ka dang / tshogs bdag glang sna la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar byed pas rgyal po'o //
analyzed: bgegs kyi rgyal po byin ya ka dang / tshogs bdag glang sna la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar byed pas rgyal po'o //

original: rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par @18b mdzad pa'i shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gdug pa can rnams 'jigs shing sgrag par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par @18b mdzad pa'i shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gdug pa can rnams 'jigs shing sgrag par mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje'i grags pa'i khyad par ji tsam zhe na //

original: rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying // zhes smos te /
translated: He is the vajra fame, the vajra heart.

original: chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed cing /
analyzed: chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed cing /
translated: He is the one who is indivisible like a vajra from all phenomena.

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o//
translated: He has the distinction of being famous in the three worlds.

original: dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
analyzed: dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi 'phro bar gyur pa'i gzhir gyur pas kyang snying po / rdo rje lta bu thugs kyi rigs yin pas kyang rdo rje'i snying /
translated: It is the essence because it is the basis of the emanation of all phenomena.🔽It is the essence of the vajra because it is the vajra family of the mind.

analyzed: rtags khro bo rnams kyi thugs kar bzhag pas kyang rdo rje'i snying po //
translated: It is the essence of the vajra because it is placed in the heart of the wrathful ones.

original: sku de'i yon tan bstan pa ni //
analyzed: sku de'i yon tan bstan pa ni //

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che // zhes smos te /

analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs su sprul zhing /
translated: It is called that because it emanates various magical illusion emanations.

analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i sku de yang nang du che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis gang ba'i rtags su gsus khyim che ba'o //

original: de'i rgyu ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rgyu ci zhe na /

original: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag / ces pa smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag / ces pa smos te /

analyzed: de'i rgyu ni chos sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las skyes te /
translated: The cause of that is being born from the realization of the vajra-like dharmakāya.

original: rigs thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas bdag po'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas bdag po'o //
translated: It is the lord because it is the chief of all the families.

original: de'i dpe ni //
analyzed: de'i dpe ni //
translated: The example of that is

analyzed: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba // zhes smos te /
translated: The vajra essence is like space.

analyzed: dngos po med pa dang / kun la khyab pa dang / cho 'phrul mi 'gag pa'i phyir nam mkha'o //
translated: Space is taught because of the absence of entities, pervading everything, and the unimpeded miracles.

analyzed: 'o na mtshan ma can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na //

original: mi g-yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings //

analyzed: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //

analyzed: gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i rtags ral pa'i thor tshugs gcig tu bcings pa'o //

analyzed: theg pa mchog dang ldan pa'i rtags su glang po che'i ko rlon gos su gyon pa'o //

analyzed: khro bo'i gsung ji lta bu zhe na //

analyzed: drag chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa //
translated: The great wrathful one, ha ha, proclaims

analyzed: hi hi zhes pa'i sgras ma rungs pa rnams 'jigs shing brgyal bar byed pa'i gad mo che bar sgrogs te /

analyzed: rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzhan gyis bar du mi chod par shin tu rgya che ba ste /

analyzed: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che //

analyzed: rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs // zhes smos te /

analyzed: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i thugs ye shes chen po /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la sems pa dang / thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o //

analyzed: de'i gong na gzhan med pas rgyal po'o //

original: thag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mnga' zhing /
analyzed: thag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mnga' zhing /
translated: He possesses great bliss without a cause.

original: gdug pa can 'joms pa'i thugs mnga' bas drag po'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can 'joms pa'i thugs mnga' bas drag po'o //
translated: He is fierce because he has the mind that destroys the wicked.

analyzed: des sems can rnams kyi dga' ba chen po skyed par mdzad do //

analyzed: rdo rje lta bu thugs su chud pa'i sbo nas /

original: h'um h'um zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags nas /
analyzed: h'um h'um zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags nas /
translated: He is called Hum because he is the Hum sound that is proclaimed

analyzed: / khro bo de las ci mdzad ce na / mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa //
translated: What does he do with that wrath?🔽He holds a vajra arrow as his weapon,🔽and a vajra sword that cuts everything.🔽He is the vajra holder, the vajra wielder,

original: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //
translated: the single vajra that conquers the enemy.

original: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
analyzed: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
translated: He is called Hum because he is the Hum sound that is proclaimed🔽in order to destroy the wicked,

original: rdo rje gcig bu g-yul sel ba //
analyzed: rdo rje gcig bu g-yul sel ba //
translated: through the wrath that arises from the pride of understanding the vajra.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: What does he do with that wrath?🔽He holds a vajra arrow as his weapon,🔽and a vajra sword that cuts everything.🔽He is the vajra holder, the vajra wielder,

original: phyag mtshan rdo rje ltar nyon mongs pa 'bigs pa'i thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhu dang / rnam bar rtog pa gcod par byed pa'i /
analyzed: phyag mtshan rdo rje ltar nyon mongs pa 'bigs pa'i thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhu dang / rnam bar rtog pa gcod par byed pa'i /

translated: He is called “Vajra-holder” because he holds the sword of wisdom, because he bears the sign of having conquered the five poisons, and because he has the power to conquer others like a vajra.

analyzed: de yang rdo rje lta bu gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis bdud bzhi dang gdug pa can 'joms shing g-yul do zlog par byed do //
translated: Moreover, with the vajra-like nondual wisdom, he conquers the four demons and evil ones and defeats the enemy in battle.

original: rgyan gyi sgo nas khyad par gyi yon tan bstan pa ni //
analyzed: rgyan gyi sgo nas khyad par gyi yon tan bstan pa ni //
translated: The special qualities are taught by way of ornaments:

original: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
translated: The blazing vajra is an unbearable eye.

original: sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che //

analyzed: mig brgya ba ste rdo rje'i mig / lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
translated: The hundred-eyed one has vajra eyes, and the body has vajra hairs.

original: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus //
analyzed: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus //
translated: The vajra hair is a single body.

original: sen mo skyes ba rdo rje rtse //
analyzed: sen mo skyes ba rdo rje rtse //

analyzed: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs // rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //

original: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: He is adorned with vajra ornaments.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i drag po'i spyan shin tu mi bzad par 'jigs pa mnga' zhing dbu skra yang rdo rje'i skra'o //
translated: His eyes are blazing like a vajra, and he has a terrifying, unbearable gaze. His hair is also vajra hair.

analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud la yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes 'bebs par mdzad la mig brgya pa zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: He also causes the wisdom that is like the vajra of body, speech, and mind to descend into the mindstreams of others. The “hundred eyes” are just an illustration.

original: thams cad du ma 'gags pa shes rab kyi spyan dbyer mi phyed ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du ma 'gags pa shes rab kyi spyan dbyer mi phyed ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with the eye of wisdom that is unobstructed in every way and indivisible.

original: lus la rdo rje'i ba spu dngos su 'khyil ba mnga' zhing /
analyzed: lus la rdo rje'i ba spu dngos su 'khyil ba mnga' zhing /
translated: His body is actually coiled with vajra body hair.

original: rdo rje'i spu de gnyis su med pa'i lus la brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i spu de gnyis su med pa'i lus la brgyan pa'o //
translated: That vajra body hair adorns his nondual body.

original: gdug pa can @19b 'dul ba'i rtags dang / rigs lnga ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags su sor mo'i rtse mor rdo rje skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can @19b 'dul ba'i rtags dang / rigs lnga ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags su sor mo'i rtse mor rdo rje skyes pa'o //
translated: The sign of subduing the wicked and the sign of the indivisibility of the five families and five pristine consciousnesses are the vajras that grow at the tips of his fingers.

original: thams cad gnyis med du bsdus pa'i rtags su /
analyzed: thams cad gnyis med du bsdus pa'i rtags su /
translated: The sign of subsuming everything into nonduality is

original: rdo rje'i pags pa sra la 'thas pa mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i pags pa sra la 'thas pa mnga' ba'o //
translated: his vajra skin, which is hard and tough.

original: rdo rje'i phreng ba thogs nas gzhan don mdzad pas dpal dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phreng ba thogs nas gzhan don mdzad pas dpal dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is glorious because he performs the benefit of others while holding the vajra garland.

original: che ba'i yon tan phreng ba brgyus pa ltar rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
analyzed: che ba'i yon tan phreng ba brgyus pa ltar rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
translated: This is the sign of possessing the garland of great qualities, which is like a continuous string.

original: de ltar khyad par gyi rgyan rdo rjes brgyan pa'i sgo nas che ba'i yon tan rnams bstan pa yin te //
analyzed: de ltar khyad par gyi rgyan rdo rjes brgyan pa'i sgo nas che ba'i yon tan rnams bstan pa yin te //
translated: Thus, the great qualities are taught through the special ornament of being adorned with vajras.

original: thugs rdo rje'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he is the vajra family of enlightened mind.

original: 'o na gsung gi sgo nas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gsung gi sgo nas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is the quality of leading transmigrating beings through speech?

original: gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //
analyzed: gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //
translated: He proclaims the sound of “ha ha” laughter.

original: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
translated: The vajra sound of the six syllables.

original: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
analyzed: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
translated: The great Mañjughoṣa, the great sound.

original: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
translated: The single sound in the three worlds.

original: nam mkha'i mtha' la sgra sgrogs pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' la sgra sgrogs pa //
translated: The sound that resounds in the limits of space.

original: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces smos te /
analyzed: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces smos te /
translated: The supreme of those possessing sound.

original: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pa'i sgra ha ha zhes sgrogs shing /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pa'i sgra ha ha zhes sgrogs shing /
translated: He proclaims the sound of “ha ha” laughter, which is the sound of delight in performing the benefit of transmigrating beings.

original: yi ge drug pa ni rgyas par yi ge drug pa'i sngags /
analyzed: yi ge drug pa ni rgyas par yi ge drug pa'i sngags /
translated: The six syllables are the extensive six syllable mantra.

original: de las bsdu na b'a g'i shva ri'i 'bru drug pa'o //
analyzed: de las bsdu na b'a g'i shva ri'i 'bru drug pa'o //
translated: The briefest form is the six-syllable mantra.

original: de gnyis ni gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa'i sgra'o //
analyzed: de gnyis ni gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa'i sgra'o //
translated: These are the sounds of the Vajra Vehicle of Secret Mantra.

original: las 'phro can rnams la snyan cing yid du 'ong bas 'jam dbyangs so //
analyzed: las 'phro can rnams la snyan cing yid du 'ong bas 'jam dbyangs so //
translated: It is Mañju, because it is pleasant and agreeable to those with the right karma.

original: don chen po ston pa'i sgra yin pas che bas so //
analyzed: don chen po ston pa'i sgra yin pas che bas so //
translated: It is ghosa, because it is a sound that teaches the great meaning.

original: de gang du sgrogs ni 'jig rten gsum du'o //
analyzed: de gang du sgrogs ni 'jig rten gsum du'o //
translated: Where is it proclaimed? In the three worlds.

original: gnyis med ston pa'i sgra yin pas gcig go //
analyzed: gnyis med ston pa'i sgra yin pas gcig go //
translated: It is one, because it is the sound that teaches nonduality.

original: yang ji snyed cig bsgrags kyang 'gro ba 'dren par gcig pa'o //
analyzed: yang ji snyed cig bsgrags kyang 'gro ba 'dren par gcig pa'o //
translated: However many times it is proclaimed, it is the same in leading beings.

original: sgra de la 'gren zla med pas kyang sgra gcig pa'o //
analyzed: sgra de la 'gren zla med pas kyang sgra gcig pa'o //
translated: It is the one sound, because there is no other sound like it.

original: de ji tsam du sgrogs she na /
analyzed: de ji tsam du sgrogs she na /
translated: How far does it proclaim?

original: nam mkha' khyab par sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab par sgrogs pa'o //
translated: It proclaims throughout the whole of space.

original: sgra rnams kyi nang na chos kyi sgra 'di mchog tu gyur pa ste don chen po la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyi nang na chos kyi sgra 'di mchog tu gyur pa ste don chen po la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Of all sounds, the sound of Dharma is the best, because it leads to the great meaning.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: To indicate the name of the wisdom being Mañjuśrī from the perspective of discerning wisdom,

original: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
translated: The true nature of reality, the absence of self, suchness,

original: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //🔽ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med // ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The limit of reality, and the absence of letters.

original: de la gsung gi rgyu ni yang dag pa bdag med de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de la gsung gi rgyu ni yang dag pa bdag med de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The cause of the Buddha's speech is the true nature of reality, the absence of self.

original: gsung gi che ba ni /
analyzed: gsung gi che ba ni /
translated: Its greatness is indicated by:

original: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
analyzed: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
translated: The supreme speaker on emptiness,

original: zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa //🔽chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
analyzed: zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa // chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
translated: Proclaiming the profound and vast,🔽The Dharma conch, the great sound,

original: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
analyzed: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
translated: The great sound of the Dharma horn,

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'o //
translated: The nonabiding nirvana,

original: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //🔽zhes smos te /🔽chos @20a * //
analyzed: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che // zhes smos te / chos @20a * //
translated: The great Dharma drum of the ten directions.

original: thams cad stong pa nyid du smra ba ni smra ba thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas khyu mchog ste /
analyzed: thams cad stong pa nyid du smra ba ni smra ba thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas khyu mchog ste /
translated: The Buddha is the supreme speaker on emptiness because he is the foremost of all speakers.

original: dper na / glang po che'i phru gu pha ma shi nas seng ges nu ma bsnun nas gsos pa la khyu mchog zer te /
analyzed: dper na / glang po che'i phru gu pha ma shi nas seng ges nu ma bsnun nas gsos pa la khyu mchog zer te /
translated: For example, a young elephant whose parents have died is raised by a lioness and is called the supreme of the herd.

original: des khyus 'gro zil gyis gnon te de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des khyus 'gro zil gyis gnon te de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he surpasses the herd in power.

original: ci'i mchog yin na ;
analyzed: ci'i mchog yin na ;
translated: Why is he supreme?

original: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it proclaims the sound of the profound and vast Dharma.

original: chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas ni /🔽chos kyi dung lta bu'i sgra chen pos bdud btul nas /
analyzed: chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas ni / chos kyi dung lta bu'i sgra chen pos bdud btul nas /
translated: The sign of the arising of the Dharma is as follows:🔽Having subdued Mara with the great sound of the Dharma conch,

original: chos kyi gand'i lta bu'i sgra chen pos 'khor bsdus nas /
analyzed: chos kyi gand'i lta bu'i sgra chen pos 'khor bsdus nas /
translated: having gathered the retinue with the great sound of the Dharma bell,

original: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston pa ste /🔽de yang shes pas srid la mi gnas dang // snying rjes zhil mi gnas shing //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston pa ste / de yang shes pas srid la mi gnas dang // snying rjes zhil mi gnas shing //
translated: he teaches the Dharma of nirvana that does not abide in the two extremes.

original: zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it is said, By wisdom, one does not abide in existence; by compassion, one does not abide in peace.

original: rgya ji tsam che zhe na /
analyzed: rgya ji tsam che zhe na /
translated: How vast is it?

original: phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: It pervades all ten directions.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what means?

original: chos kyi sgra chen po rnga bo che dang 'dra ba sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sgra chen po rnga bo che dang 'dra ba sgrogs pa'o //
translated: By proclaiming the great sound of the Dharma, like a great drum.

original: de la kun 'byung ba'i gzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun 'byung ba'i gzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What is the basis of origination?

original: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa sta //
analyzed: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa sta //
translated: Formless, yet possessing excellent form,

original: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
translated: having various forms, born from the mind,

original: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
analyzed: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
translated: the glory of the appearance of all forms,

original: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po // zhes smos te /
translated: The bearer of all the reflected images.

original: chos sku la ngo bo nyid ma grub pas gzugs med pa'o //
analyzed: chos sku la ngo bo nyid ma grub pas gzugs med pa'o //
translated: The Dharma Body is formless, because it is not established as an essence.

original: de'i byin gyi rlabs las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: de'i byin gyi rlabs las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: The Enjoyment Body, which is the transformation of that [Dharma Body], is adorned with the major and minor marks,

original: gzugs bzang ba'i dam pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs bzang ba'i dam pa'o //
translated: and is the highest form.

original: sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can de yid ye shes su grol ba las skyes zhes pa dang / yang sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can gyi yid la ji ltar 'dod pa ltar skyes zhes bshad do //
analyzed: sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can de yid ye shes su grol ba las skyes zhes pa dang / yang sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can gyi yid la ji ltar 'dod pa ltar skyes zhes bshad do //
translated: The Emanation Body, which has various forms, is said to arise from the mind liberated as pristine awareness, and also to arise in the mind of the Emanation Body in whatever form is desired.

original: rje btsun de nyid nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs ba dang / khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ma lus par snang nas don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rje btsun de nyid nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs ba dang / khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ma lus par snang nas don mdzad pa'o //
translated: The Venerable One appears as all the reflected images of the Hearers, Solitary Realizers, Bodhisattvas, Brahma, Vishnu, and so forth, and acts for the welfare of those to be tamed.

original: sku de'i che ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sku de'i che ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the greatness of that body?

original: mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags //
translated: It is incomparable and renowned as great.

original: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste /
analyzed: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste /
translated: It is the great lord of the three realms.

original: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
analyzed: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the exalted path, very high.

original: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog / ces smos te /
analyzed: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog / ces smos te /
translated: The great spread of the Dharma, the crest jewel.

original: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis gnyen po gang gis kyang mi tshugs te /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis gnyen po gang gis kyang mi tshugs te /
translated: By the power of completing the two accumulations, it cannot be destroyed by any antidote.

original: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pas na che bar grags so //
analyzed: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pas na che bar grags so //
translated: Since it cannot be overwhelmed by any demons, extremists, and so forth, it is renowned as great.

original: de yang @20b 'phags pa'i lam las mtho bar gyur pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang @20b 'phags pa'i lam las mtho bar gyur pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, since it is higher than the noble path, it abides in nondual wisdom.

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong mkhyen pas dar ba chen po'i chos so //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong mkhyen pas dar ba chen po'i chos so //
translated: Since it knows the eighty-four thousand bundles of the Dharma, it is the Dharma of the great spread.

original: gnyis su med pa ni rab rtse mo'i tog ces bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa ni rab rtse mo'i tog ces bya'o //
translated: Nonduality is called the crest jewel of the summit.

original: de gdul bya la ji ltar mos par snang ba ni /
analyzed: de gdul bya la ji ltar mos par snang ba ni /
translated: How does that appear to the disciples according to their aspirations?🔽The one youthful body in the three worlds,🔽the elder, the old one, the lord of beings,

original: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'tshang ba //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'tshang ba //
translated: the one with the thirty-two marks,

original: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //🔽zhes smos te /
translated: the handsome one, beautiful in the three worlds.

original: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba rnams la bgres rgud mi mnga' ste rtag tu byis pa lo brgyad lon pa lta bu gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed pa lta bus don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba rnams la bgres rgud mi mnga' ste rtag tu byis pa lo brgyad lon pa lta bu gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed pa lta bus don mdzad pa'o //
translated: For those to be trained by bodhisattvas, he is never old or young, but always acts for their benefit in a way that captivates the minds of others, like an eight-year-old.

original: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la gnas brtan rab 'byor lta bur sprul /
analyzed: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la gnas brtan rab 'byor lta bur sprul /
translated: For those to be trained by hearers, he emanates as the elder Subhūti.

original: rang rgyal bas 'dul ba rnams la rang rgyal rgan po rdzu 'phrul cher ston pa lta bur sprul /
analyzed: rang rgyal bas 'dul ba rnams la rang rgyal rgan po rdzu 'phrul cher ston pa lta bur sprul /
translated: For those to be trained by solitary realizers, he emanates as an old solitary realizer who displays great miracles.

original: sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba la skyed dgu'i bdag por sprul nas don mdzad de /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba la skyed dgu'i bdag por sprul nas don mdzad de /
translated: For those to be trained by a variety of methods, he emanates as the lord of the three-and-a-half-million-world-system realm and acts for their benefit.

original: de la skye ba dgu ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / theg pa chen po dang gsum /
analyzed: de la skye ba dgu ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / theg pa chen po dang gsum /
translated: In this case, the three-and-a-half-million-world-system realm refers to the three: hearers, solitary realizers, and the Great Vehicle.

original: de'i khar 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas su sprul sku thub pa drug gis don mdzad pa dang / dgu la bya'o //
analyzed: de'i khar 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas su sprul sku thub pa drug gis don mdzad pa dang / dgu la bya'o //
translated: In addition, the emanation bodies of the six munis act for the benefit of the six classes of migrating beings in the six realms.

original: de la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni thun mong du bstan to //
analyzed: de la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni thun mong du bstan to //
translated: In this case, the thirty-two major marks are taught in common.

original: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang / zhabs rus sbal bzhin du gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang /
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang / zhabs rus sbal bzhin du gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang /
translated: His hands and feet are marked with wheels, his feet are like tortoise feet, the fingers and toes of his hands and feet are connected by webs, his hands and feet are soft and youthful, he has seven convex surfaces, his fingers are long,

original: rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / 'bur mi mngon pa dang / sku'i spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / byin pa ri dags ae na ya lta bu dang / phyag ring zhing mdzes pa dang / mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /
analyzed: rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / 'bur mi mngon pa dang / sku'i spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / byin pa ri dags ae na ya lta bu dang / phyag ring zhing mdzes pa dang / mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /
translated: his heels are broad, his body is large and straight, his ankles do not protrude, the hairs on his body point upward, his calves are like the antelope of the gods, his arms are long and beautiful, and his sexual organ is concealed in a sheath.

original: sku mdog gser lta bu dang / pags pa 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo zlum pa dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang /
analyzed: sku mdog gser lta bu dang / pags pa 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo zlum pa dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang /
translated: His body is golden in color, his skin is smooth, each hair on his body curls to the right, his face is adorned with a tuft of hair, his upper body is like a lion’s, his shoulders are rounded, his chest is broad,🔽and his neck is like a conch.

original: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa dang / shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / ljags ring ba dang / gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / tshems dkar ba dang /
analyzed: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa dang / shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / ljags ring ba dang / gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / tshems dkar ba dang /
