translated: He has the supreme taste, the size of a nyagrodha tree, the crown of the head, the long tongue, the voice of Brahma, the cheeks of a lion, the white teeth,

original: @21a * // tshems mnyam pa dang / tshoms thags bzang ba dang / tshoms bzhi bcu mda' ba dang / spyan mthon mthing du gnas pa dang / spyan rdzi ba'i rdi ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: @21a * // tshems mnyam pa dang / tshoms thags bzang ba dang / tshoms bzhi bcu mda' ba dang / spyan mthon mthing du gnas pa dang / spyan rdzi ba'i rdi ma lta bu'o //
translated: the even teeth, the forty teeth, the deep blue eyes, and the eyelashes of an ox.

original: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na /
analyzed: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na /
translated: From the point of view of the special qualities,

original: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la rgyu'i sems dpa' bcu drug 'bras bu'i sems dba' bcu drug gis brgyan pa la bshad do //
analyzed: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la rgyu'i sems dpa' bcu drug 'bras bu'i sems dba' bcu drug gis brgyan pa la bshad do //
translated: it is explained that the glorious Vairocana is adorned with the sixteen causal bodhisattvas and the sixteen resultant bodhisattvas.

original: de ltar 'jig rten gsum na shin tu sdug cing yid du 'ong la /
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten gsum na shin tu sdug cing yid du 'ong la /
translated: Thus, he is the object of desire in the three worlds, very attractive and delightful,

original: blta bas cho ga mi shes pa 'dun pa skyes bu'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: blta bas cho ga mi shes pa 'dun pa skyes bu'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
translated: the place of the person who gives rise to the aspiration to see him.

original: des 'jig rten pa ji ltar skyob ce na //
analyzed: des 'jig rten pa ji ltar skyob ce na //
translated: How does he protect the world?

original: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //🔽'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te // 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med //
translated: He is the teacher of the world's good knowledge.🔽The teacher of the world is fearless.

original: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa //
analyzed: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa //
translated: He is the world's protector, refuge, and friend.

original: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med //🔽ces smos te /
analyzed: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med // ces smos te /
translated: He is the unsurpassed protector and refuge.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sman dang bzo la sogs pa yang rje btsun nyid kyis bslabs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sman dang bzo la sogs pa yang rje btsun nyid kyis bslabs pa yin la /
translated: He is the teacher of the world's good knowledge, because he teaches the world the good knowledge of the arts, medicine, and so on.

original: log pa'i lam las zlog cing dam pa'i lam ston pa'i slob dpon yang mdzad do//
analyzed: log pa'i lam las zlog cing dam pa'i lam ston pa'i slob dpon yang mdzad do//
translated: He is the teacher who turns one away from the wrong path and shows the right path.

original: tha snyad kyi rigs pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyis brtsad bcad kyang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med par 'jig rten skyob pa ste /🔽ji ltar yid dang mthun par sngar gyi yang skyobs mdzad la /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi rigs pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyis brtsad bcad kyang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med par 'jig rten skyob pa ste / ji ltar yid dang mthun par sngar gyi yang skyobs mdzad la /
translated: He is fearless in protecting the world, because he is not afraid or timid when others dispute with him, since he is endowed with conventional reasoning.

original: phyis kyang skyob ste bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed do //
analyzed: phyis kyang skyob ste bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed do //
translated: He is the protector who is in accord with the mind, because he protects in the past and will protect in the future, and he causes one to attain unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: 'o na thugs kyi mkhyen ci mnga' zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na thugs kyi mkhyen ci mnga' zhe na /
translated: What does he know in his mind?

original: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
translated: He enjoys the limits of space.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
translated: The ocean of the gnosis of omniscience.

original: zhes pa / chos kyi sku nam mkha'i mtha' lta bu la longs spyod cing rtogs pas shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu mda' ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / chos kyi sku nam mkha'i mtha' lta bu la longs spyod cing rtogs pas shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu mda' ba'o //
translated: Since the dharmakāya is enjoyed and realized in the manner of the limits of space, the ocean of the great qualities of gnosis that knows all objects of knowledge as they are and in their entirety is opened.

original: de'i byed pa'i las gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i byed pa'i las gang zhe na /
translated: What is the function of that?

original: ma rig sgo nga'i spubs 'byed pa //
analyzed: ma rig sgo nga'i spubs 'byed pa //
translated: The one who cracks the egg of ignorance,

original: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
analyzed: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
translated: the one who destroys the net of existence,

original: nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa //🔽'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
translated: the one who pacifies all afflictions,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: the one who has gone to the other side of the ocean of samsara.

original: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas ma rig sgo nga'i shun lpags 'dra ba sbubs phye nas srid pa'i dra ba las dang nyon mongs pa dang 'brel ba rnams bcom ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas ma rig sgo nga'i shun lpags 'dra ba sbubs phye nas srid pa'i dra ba las dang nyon mongs pa dang 'brel ba rnams bcom ste /
translated: Since the meaning of nonduality is realized, the egg of ignorance is cracked open like a shell, and the net of existence, which is connected with karma and affliction, is destroyed.

original: nyon mongs pa rtsa ba lnga'am drug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu po dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ste brgya dang gsum lta bu zhi nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rtsa ba lnga'am drug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu po dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ste brgya dang gsum lta bu zhi nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa'o //
translated: The afflictions are the five or six root afflictions, the twenty secondary afflictions, and the thoroughly afflicted, which are like the one hundred and three.

original: de rtogs pa'i phan yon ni //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i phan yon ni //
translated: The benefits of realizing that are as follows:

original: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan @21b can ;
analyzed: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan @21b can ;
translated: The one who is crowned with the empowerment of pristine consciousness

original: / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
analyzed: / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
translated: is adorned with the ornament of perfect buddhahood.

original: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
translated: The suffering of the three sufferings is pacified.

original: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
analyzed: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
translated: The three liberations are attained, which are the three liberations from the three.

original: sgrib pa kun las des par grol //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun las des par grol //
translated: Liberated from all obscurations,

original: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
analyzed: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
translated: one abides in the equality that is like space.

original: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
analyzed: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
translated: Transcending all the stains of afflictions,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: it is said:

original: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol te /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol te /
translated: Since the meaning of nonduality is realized, the five afflictions are liberated in their own place without being abandoned.

original: ye shes lngar snang ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes lngar snang ba ste /
translated: They appear as the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not dependent on the empowerments of the vase and so on.

original: ye shes gcig rdzogs kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes gcig rdzogs kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the empowerment of the perfection of the single pristine consciousness.

original: bzhi rig pa gcig la snang tshul ye shes kyis brgyan pa de shin tu mdzes pa'i phyir cod pan no //
analyzed: bzhi rig pa gcig la snang tshul ye shes kyis brgyan pa de shin tu mdzes pa'i phyir cod pan no //
translated: The four awarenesses are the way in which the single awareness is adorned with pristine consciousness. Since that is very beautiful, it is the crown.🔽Moreover,

original: de yang // sems kyis chos la dbang thob na //
analyzed: de yang // sems kyis chos la dbang thob na //
translated: when the mind obtains power over phenomena,

original: rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dbang rnams kun //
analyzed: rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dbang rnams kun //
translated: all the powers of substances, words, and symbols

original: ma bskur kyang ni thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ma bskur kyang ni thob par 'gyur // zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: are obtained without being conferred.

original: ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas lngar shar te /
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas lngar shar te /
translated: The reflections of the five pristine consciousnesses arise as the five buddhas.

original: gsal zhing mdzes pa'i phyir rgyan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsal zhing mdzes pa'i phyir rgyan zhes bya'o //
translated: Since they are clear and beautiful, they are called ornaments.

original: sdug bsngal ni gsum du 'dus //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni gsum du 'dus //
translated: Suffering is included in three.

original: de ltar rtog pas sdug bsngal gya sdug bsngal dang / 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang gsum zhi la /
analyzed: de ltar rtog pas sdug bsngal gya sdug bsngal dang / 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang gsum zhi la /
translated: In that way, the three sufferings—the suffering of suffering, the suffering of change, and the suffering of formations—are pacified by the concepts.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams kyang dug gsum du 'dus ta /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams kyang dug gsum du 'dus ta /
translated: The afflictions are also included in the three poisons.

original: des sel zhing spong ngo //
analyzed: des sel zhing spong ngo //
translated: They are removed and abandoned.

original: de gsum bsal nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i don byas nas /
analyzed: de gsum bsal nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i don byas nas /
translated: After those three are removed, having benefited infinite migrators,

original: grol ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang gsum thob par byed do //
analyzed: grol ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang gsum thob par byed do //
translated: It brings about the three kinds of liberation: that of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the bodhisattvas.

original: khyad par du sku gsum la bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par du sku gsum la bya'o //
translated: In particular, it refers to the three buddha bodies.

original: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa kun las grol nas /
analyzed: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa kun las grol nas /
translated: Moreover, having been liberated from all the obscurations of afflictive states and of cognitive experience,

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas te /
translated: one abides in the state of equalness, which is like space.

original: de phan tshod nyon mongs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de phan tshod nyon mongs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa'o //
translated: To that extent, one has gone beyond the distortions of afflictive states.

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na //
translated: What is the nature of such realization?🔽It is said:

original: dus gsum dus med rtog pa po //
analyzed: dus gsum dus med rtog pa po //
translated: The one who has realization beyond the three times,

original: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
translated: the supreme leader of all ordinary beings,

original: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
analyzed: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
translated: the crown of all those with crowns,

original: lus kun las ni rnam grol ba //
analyzed: lus kun las ni rnam grol ba //
translated: totally free of any physical embodiment,

original: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa // zhes smos te /
translated: resting on the path of space.

original: mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum du dbyer med de /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum du dbyer med de /
translated: In the state of equalness, there is no division into the three times.🔽As is said:

original: de yang / 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: de yang / 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of the past, the suchness of the future,

original: da ltar de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med //🔽ces pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: da ltar de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med //🔽ces pa lta bu'o //
translated: and the suchness of the present are all without distinction.

original: de ltar rtogs pa ni sems can kun las ches khyad par 'phags pas gtso bo che'o //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa ni sems can kun las ches khyad par 'phags pas gtso bo che'o //
translated: Thus, since the realization is far superior to that of all sentient beings, it is the great chief.🔽Moreover,

original: de yang // 'jig rten pa bas nyan @22a * //🔽thos yon tan che la /
analyzed: de yang // 'jig rten pa bas nyan @22a * // thos yon tan che la /
translated: the śrāvakas have greater qualities than the worldly,

original: de las kyang rang rgyal ba /
analyzed: de las kyang rang rgyal ba /
translated: and the pratyekabuddhas have greater qualities than they,

original: de las kyang byang chub sems dpa'/
analyzed: de las kyang byang chub sems dpa'/
translated: and the bodhisattvas have greater qualities than they,

original: de bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan che ba rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan che ba rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: and the tathāgatas have greater qualities than they.

original: thod ni yon tan gyis mdzes par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: thod ni yon tan gyis mdzes par brgyan pa'o //
translated: The head is adorned with the beauty of qualities.

original: de las kyang thod ltar mdzes shing rab tu gyur pa ni be tsu tsun nyid do //
analyzed: de las kyang thod ltar mdzes shing rab tu gyur pa ni be tsu tsun nyid do //
translated: And the head is even more beautiful and excellent than that, which is the very crown of Vairocana.

original: de ltar 'gro ba'i lus kun du skye ba grol nas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la gnas so //
analyzed: de ltar 'gro ba'i lus kun du skye ba grol nas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la gnas so //
translated: Thus, having liberated the entire body of transmigrating beings, he abides in space-like gnosis.

original: 'o na 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na /
analyzed: 'o na 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na /
translated: But how does he act for the welfare of transmigrating beings?

original: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //🔽khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag / dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag / dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
translated: He is the holder of the great wish-fulfilling gem,🔽the lord of all jewels, the great spreading wish-fulfilling tree,

original: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / byed pa sems can kun don byed //
analyzed: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / byed pa sems can kun don byed //
translated: the excellent vase, the supreme of the great, the agent who acts for the welfare of all sentient beings.

original: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa // zhes smos te /
translated: because it is the source of happiness for all beings.

original: gzhan don 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu la yang chos brgyad de /🔽sems can gyi dgos 'dod 'byung ba dang / de yang gsol ba ma btab na mi 'byung ba dang btab na 'byung ba dang / dus su 'byung ba dang / ji ltar 'tsham par 'byung ba dang / zad mi shes par 'byung ba dang / rtog pa med par 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan don 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu la yang chos brgyad de / sems can gyi dgos 'dod 'byung ba dang / de yang gsol ba ma btab na mi 'byung ba dang btab na 'byung ba dang / dus su 'byung ba dang / ji ltar 'tsham par 'byung ba dang / zad mi shes par 'byung ba dang / rtog pa med par 'byung ba dang /
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel is also a metaphor for the source of benefit for others, and it has eight qualities:

original: phyis lan la re ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyis lan la re ba med pa'o //
translated: it is the source of all that is needed and desired by beings; it does not give forth its gifts unless requested; it gives forth its gifts when requested; it gives forth its gifts at the right time; it gives forth appropriate gifts; it gives forth inexhaustible gifts; it gives forth its gifts without any conceptual thought; and it does not expect any repayment or interest.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rin po che lta bu des kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rin po che lta bu des kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The jewel of the mind is like that jewel, and it is the nature that pervades all beings.

original: yang dpag bsam shing dang 'dra ste ;
analyzed: yang dpag bsam shing dang 'dra ste ;
translated: The wish-fulfilling tree is another metaphor.

original: de la yang chos bcu ste /
analyzed: de la yang chos bcu ste /
translated: It has ten qualities:

original: snga ma brgyad kyi khar bsil ba dang / 'gro ba ngal sos pa'i gnas su gyur pa lta bu dang bcu'o //
analyzed: snga ma brgyad kyi khar bsil ba dang / 'gro ba ngal sos pa'i gnas su gyur pa lta bu dang bcu'o //
translated: the eight mentioned above, plus it is a source of coolness and a place of rest for beings.

original: yang bum pa bzang po bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: yang bum pa bzang po bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: The wish-fulfilling tree is also like the accomplishment of the excellent vase.

original: de la chos bcu ste /
analyzed: de la chos bcu ste /
translated: It has ten qualities:

original: snga ma brgyad kyi khar /
analyzed: snga ma brgyad kyi khar /
translated: In addition to the above eight,

original: bsgrubs na 'byung ba dang / ma bsgrubs na mi 'byung ba dang bcu'o //
analyzed: bsgrubs na 'byung ba dang / ma bsgrubs na mi 'byung ba dang bcu'o //
translated: there are ten, if one includes that which occurs when one practices and that which does not occur when one does not practice.🔽Moreover,

original: de yang // bum pa bzang po dang ni dpag bsam shing //
analyzed: de yang // bum pa bzang po dang ni dpag bsam shing //
translated: the excellent vase, the wish-fulfilling tree,

original: yid bzhin nor rnams sems dang mi ldan bas //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor rnams sems dang mi ldan bas //
translated: and the wish-fulfilling gem, which are devoid of thought,

original: sems can rnams kyi don ni 'byung 'gyur na //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don ni 'byung 'gyur na //
translated: produce benefits for sentient beings.

original: thugs rje cher mnga' rgyal ba smos ci dgos //
analyzed: thugs rje cher mnga' rgyal ba smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention the Victorious One, who possesses great compassion?

original: zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like that.

original: de ltar bu gcig pa'i ma ltar phan 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bu gcig pa'i ma ltar phan 'dogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, he benefits like a mother of an only child.

original: des gdul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: des gdul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does he know the thoughts of those to be tamed?

original: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
analyzed: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
translated: He knows good and bad, and he knows time.

original: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
analyzed: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
translated: The sovereign knows the sacred, and he is committed to the sacred.

original: dus shes sems can dbang don shes //
analyzed: dus shes sems can dbang don shes //
translated: He knows time, and he knows the faculties and aims of sentient beings.

original: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
analyzed: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
translated: He is skilled in the three liberations.

original: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes // zhes smos te /
translated: He possesses qualities, and he knows qualities.

original: las bzang ngan shes @22b shing ;
analyzed: las bzang ngan shes @22b shing ;
translated: He knows good and bad karma.

original: de'i 'bras bu dus ji tsam na 'byung shes la /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu dus ji tsam na 'byung shes la /
translated: He knows when the results of that will occur.

original: thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i bdag po gzhan gyi tshig kyang shes la /
analyzed: thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i bdag po gzhan gyi tshig kyang shes la /
translated: He is the lord who pervades all with compassion.

original: rang yang de kho na las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rang yang de kho na las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He knows the words of others and is endowed with the samaya of never transgressing thatness.

original: don mdzad pa'i tshe 'dul ba'i dus tshod shes shing sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma dang / dad pa dang brtson 'grus rab 'bring tha ma'i don shes pa'o //
analyzed: don mdzad pa'i tshe 'dul ba'i dus tshod shes shing sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma dang / dad pa dang brtson 'grus rab 'bring tha ma'i don shes pa'o //
translated: When he acts for the benefit of beings, he knows the time for taming and the meaning of the high, medium, and low faculties of sentient beings, as well as the high, medium, and low meaning of faith and diligence.

original: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas /
analyzed: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas /
translated: Since he possesses the gnosis of omniscience,

original: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / theg pa chen po dang rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dang / theg pa chen po dang rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa'o //
translated: he is skilled in the three: the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and the Mahāyāna.

original: sku dang ye shes stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang rje btsun nyid kyang ldan zhing /
analyzed: sku dang ye shes stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang rje btsun nyid kyang ldan zhing /
translated: He is endowed with the qualities of the kāyas, gnosis, strengths, fearlessnesses, and so on.

original: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang shes pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang shes pa'o //
translated: He also knows the qualities that exist in the mind streams of śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and so on.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i bkra shis pa'i dam par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i bkra shis pa'i dam par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate that he is the most auspicious one,

original: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
analyzed: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
translated: The auspiciousness of Dharma is the auspiciousness of auspiciousness.

original: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
analyzed: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
translated: It is the auspiciousness of all auspiciousness.

original: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge //🔽dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
analyzed: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge // dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
translated: It is the auspiciousness of fame, the auspiciousness of good reputation.🔽It is the great relief, the great festival,

original: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
analyzed: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
translated: the great joy, the great celebration.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de ltar chos kyi don shes pas tshe 'dir yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung pas bkra shis la /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi don shes pas tshe 'dir yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung pas bkra shis la /
translated: Since the meaning of the Dharma is understood in this way, all good qualities arise in this life, so it is auspicious.

original: phyi mar yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phyi mar yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis 'byung ngo //
translated: And since all good qualities arise in the future, it is the auspiciousness of auspiciousness.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tshe ring ba dang / nor dang rigs rgyud 'phel ba la sogs pa bkra shis pa rnams kyi nang na yang bkra shis dam pa 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tshe ring ba dang / nor dang rigs rgyud 'phel ba la sogs pa bkra shis pa rnams kyi nang na yang bkra shis dam pa 'gyur ro //
translated: Among the auspicious things of the world, such as long life, wealth, and the increase of family lineage, it is the highest auspiciousness.

original: khams gsum du grags shing legs pa'i yon tan 'byung bas grags pa'i bkra shis so //
analyzed: khams gsum du grags shing legs pa'i yon tan 'byung bas grags pa'i bkra shis so //
translated: Since it is renowned in the three realms and good qualities arise, it is the auspiciousness of fame.

original: mi dge ba las log nas dge ba sna tshogs la zhugs pas snyan grags dge ba'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba las log nas dge ba sna tshogs la zhugs pas snyan grags dge ba'o //
translated: Since one turns away from non-virtue and engages in various virtues, it is the auspiciousness of good reputation.

original: 'gro ba rnams thar pa'i lam du dbugs 'byin pas kun dga' ba'i chos kyi ston mo chen po mdzad cing /
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams thar pa'i lam du dbugs 'byin pas kun dga' ba'i chos kyi ston mo chen po mdzad cing /
translated: He is the great festival of the Dharma, which delights all beings, since he gives them relief on the path to liberation.

original: zag med kyi bde ba chen po thob pas dga' chen no //
analyzed: zag med kyi bde ba chen po thob pas dga' chen no //
translated: He is the great joy, since he has attained the great untainted bliss.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan mi spong bas rol mo chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan mi spong bas rol mo chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: He is the great play, since he does not reject the objects of desire.

original: des 'gro ba skyob pa'i tshul ni /
analyzed: des 'gro ba skyob pa'i tshul ni /
translated: The way he protects beings

original: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
translated: He is the perfect object of honor and service,

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i grags bdag dpal //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i grags bdag dpal //
translated: the lord of fame, the glory of supreme joy,

original: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //
analyzed: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //
translated: the best of the best, the bestower of the best, the chief,

original: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os //
analyzed: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os //
translated: the best refuge, worthy of refuge.

original: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //🔽zhes smos te /🔽kun gyis bkur ba dang / rim gror @23a * //🔽bya ba'i 'os ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po // zhes smos te / kun gyis bkur ba dang / rim gror @23a * // bya ba'i 'os ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa /
translated: He is the enemy of the world, the best of the best, the dispeller of all fear.🔽He is the perfect object of honor and service, since he is the treasure of all the perfect qualities of the mundane and supramundane.

original: mchog tu 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba /
analyzed: mchog tu 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba /
translated: He is the lord of fame, since he is the glory of supreme joy in the benefit of beings.

original: khams gsum du grags shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas dpal te /
analyzed: khams gsum du grags shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas dpal te /
translated: He is glorious because he is renowned in the three realms and has perfected the two accumulations.

original: yon tan gyi skal pa mchog dang ldan zhing ;
analyzed: yon tan gyi skal pa mchog dang ldan zhing ;
translated: He is the best of those who have the fortune of good qualities.

original: gzhan yang mchog ster ba'i gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang mchog ster ba'i gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: He is also the best of those who grant the best.

original: des sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob cing de las lhag pa med pas skyabs su 'os pa'o //
analyzed: des sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob cing de las lhag pa med pas skyabs su 'os pa'o //
translated: He is worthy of being a refuge because he protects those who suffer from the dangers of cyclic existence and there is no one better than him.

original: ci las skyob ce na /
analyzed: ci las skyob ce na /
translated: From what does he protect?

original: 'jig rten gyi rtog pa dgra yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rtog pa dgra yin te /
translated: He protects from the enemy of worldly thoughts.

original: de las skyob pa'o //
analyzed: de las skyob pa'o //
translated: He also protects from the enemy of the afflictions.

original: de yang 'jig rten las rab tu gyur pas nyan thos so //🔽de las rab tu gyur pas rang rgyal lo //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten las rab tu gyur pas nyan thos so // de las rab tu gyur pas rang rgyal lo //
translated: He is a śrāvaka because he has gone far beyond the world.🔽He is a pratyekabuddha because he has gone far beyond that.

original: de las rab tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de las rab tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He is a bodhisattva because he has gone far beyond that.

original: de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa rje btsun no //
analyzed: de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa rje btsun no //
translated: And he is the most excellent of those because he is the venerable one.

original: des bdud dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: des bdud dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
translated: He is the one who removes all māras and sufferings.

original: mu stegs kyi cha byad kyis 'dul ba la der sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mu stegs kyi cha byad kyis 'dul ba la der sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: Because he benefits migrating beings by emanating in that way for those to be tamed who have the guise of tīrthikas,

original: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
analyzed: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
translated: he has a topknot with curling locks.

original: ral pa munydza cod pan thogs //🔽gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: ral pa munydza cod pan thogs // gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
translated: He has matted hair and a crown.🔽He has five faces and five topknots.

original: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
analyzed: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
translated: He has five locks of hair and a flower skull.

original: ces smos te /
analyzed: ces smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: gtsug phud ni skra dang kha spu bzhar bregs nas spyi bor gtsug phud tsam 'dzin pas 'dul ba der sprul lo //
analyzed: gtsug phud ni skra dang kha spu bzhar bregs nas spyi bor gtsug phud tsam 'dzin pas 'dul ba der sprul lo //
translated: The topknot is the hair and beard shaved and cut, holding just a topknot on the head. He emanates as a discipliner there.

original: phud pu ni skra gzhan bregs nas dpral bar bcings pa'o //
analyzed: phud pu ni skra gzhan bregs nas dpral bar bcings pa'o //
translated: The topknot is the other hair shaved, bound on the forehead.

original: lcang lo can ni skra sil bu ring ba'o //
analyzed: lcang lo can ni skra sil bu ring ba'o //
translated: The locks are the long loose hair.

original: ral pa ni ral pa sog kha non pa ni /
analyzed: ral pa ni ral pa sog kha non pa ni /
translated: The matted hair is the matted hair covering the forehead.

original: lha chen po la dad pa rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'o //🔽munydza ni rked sor slebs pa'i ral pa ske rags su bcings pa'o //
analyzed: lha chen po la dad pa rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'o // munydza ni rked sor slebs pa'i ral pa ske rags su bcings pa'o //
translated: It is the form of those who have faith in the great god.🔽The crown is the matted hair reaching to the waist, bound as a belt.

original: cod pan ni dar la sogs pa thod du bcings pa'o //
analyzed: cod pan ni dar la sogs pa thod du bcings pa'o //
translated: The crown is silk and so forth bound on the head.

original: tha ma cod pan du 'phur ba'o //
analyzed: tha ma cod pan du 'phur ba'o //
translated: The end is the topknot.

original: gdong lnga ni phyogs bzhin gdong pa bzhi /
analyzed: gdong lnga ni phyogs bzhin gdong pa bzhi /
translated: The five faces are the four faces in the directions.

original: spyi bo'i gtsug na gcig ste lnga'o //
analyzed: spyi bo'i gtsug na gcig ste lnga'o //
translated: There is one on the top of the head, making five.

original: gdong pa bzhi nas rig byed kyi sgra bzhi 'don te /
analyzed: gdong pa bzhi nas rig byed kyi sgra bzhi 'don te /
translated: The four faces recite the four sounds of the Vedas.

original: shar nas nges brjod kyi rig byed /🔽lho nas mchod brjod kyi rig byed /🔽nub nas snyan dang gas kyi rig byed /
analyzed: shar nas nges brjod kyi rig byed / lho nas mchod brjod kyi rig byed / nub nas snyan dang gas kyi rig byed /
translated: In the east, he emanated as the one who recites the Veda of the Rig Veda.🔽In the south, he emanated as the one who recites the Veda of the Yajur Veda.🔽In the west, he emanated as the one who recites the Veda of the Sama Veda.

original: byang nas srid srung gi rig byed 'don pa'o //
analyzed: byang nas srid srung gi rig byed 'don pa'o //
translated: In the north, he emanated as the one who recites the Veda of the Atharva Veda.

original: de ltar tshangs pa gdong lnga pa lta bus 'dul ba der sprul lo //🔽yang mgo la gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa mu stegs gzegs zan gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba la des sprul lo //
analyzed: de ltar tshangs pa gdong lnga pa lta bus 'dul ba der sprul lo // yang mgo la gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa mu stegs gzegs zan gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba la des sprul lo //
translated: In this way, he emanated as the one who tames the five-faced Brahma.🔽Again, he emanated as the one who tames the tirthikas with five topknots on his head, in the form of the tirthika Kanada.

original: yang mgo la rin po che'i zur phud lnga @23b yong pa dri za'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der sprul lo //
analyzed: yang mgo la rin po che'i zur phud lnga @23b yong pa dri za'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der sprul lo //
translated: Again, he emanated as the one who tames the gandharvas with five jeweled topknots on his head.

original: yang mgo la me tog gi thod bcings pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der sprul lo //
analyzed: yang mgo la me tog gi thod bcings pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der sprul lo //
translated: Again, he emanated as the one who tames the Paranirmita-vasavartin devas with a flower garland bound on his head.

original: 'o na sangs rgyas pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar 'dzin zhe na //🔽mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
analyzed: 'o na sangs rgyas pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar 'dzin zhe na // mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
translated: Well then, how does he uphold the Buddhist observances?🔽He upholds the great observance of a shaven head.

original: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
translated: He is the supreme observance of pure conduct, the great ascetic who has perfected asceticism.

original: gtsang gnas dam pa goo tam //
analyzed: gtsang gnas dam pa goo tam //
translated: The holy one of the pure state is Gautama.

original: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
analyzed: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
translated: The Brahmin is Brahma, the knower of Brahma.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: sh'akya thub pa lta bu'i rab tu byung bas 'dul ba la mgo zlum du sprul nas gnod pa las zlog pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad do //
analyzed: sh'akya thub pa lta bu'i rab tu byung bas 'dul ba la mgo zlum du sprul nas gnod pa las zlog pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad do //
translated: For those to be disciplined by the renunciate, like Shakyamuni, he emanates as a shaven-headed one and upholds the discipline of turning away from harm.

original: yang tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la gnas shing brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'dul ba la der ston to //
analyzed: yang tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la gnas shing brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'dul ba la der ston to //
translated: For those to be disciplined by the discipline of pure conduct, he appears as one who upholds the discipline of pure conduct.

original: sh'akya thub pa chu bo ne ra dz'a rar dka' thub mdzad pa lta bu la yang der ston to //
analyzed: sh'akya thub pa chu bo ne ra dz'a rar dka' thub mdzad pa lta bu la yang der ston to //
translated: For those to be disciplined by austerities, like Shakyamuni's practice of austerities at the Nairajnana River, he appears as one who practices austerities.

original: goo ta ma ni sh'akya'i rigs te //
analyzed: goo ta ma ni sh'akya'i rigs te //
translated: Gautama is of the Shakya lineage.

original: gtsang sbra la gnas pa rgyal rigs su sprul pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dka' thub dang ; gtsang sbra la gnas pa bram ze lta bur kyang sprul pa mdzad do //
analyzed: gtsang sbra la gnas pa rgyal rigs su sprul pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dka' thub dang ; gtsang sbra la gnas pa bram ze lta bur kyang sprul pa mdzad do //
translated: He emanates as a kshatriya who abides in purity, and also as a Brahmin who naturally abides in austerity and purity.

original: nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas tshangs pa /
analyzed: nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas tshangs pa /
translated: He is Brahma because he is untainted by the faults of wrongdoing.

original: gzhan skyon dang bral ba'i thabs shes pas tshangs pa shes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan skyon dang bral ba'i thabs shes pas tshangs pa shes zhes bya'o //
translated: Since one knows the method of being free from the faults of others, it is called Brahma knows.

original: de ltar sprul pa'i phan yon ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar sprul pa'i phan yon ci zhe na /
translated: What are the benefits of emanation?

original: mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob //🔽grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus ;
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob // grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus ;
translated: Nirvana is Brahma,🔽liberation is freedom, the liberated body,

original: / rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: / rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
translated: liberation is peace, peace itself,

original: mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das //🔽legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das // legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //
translated: nirvana is nirvana,🔽close to good nirvana,

original: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa // zhes smos te /
translated: the end of the elimination of happiness and suffering.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Since one is free from the suffering of samsara, there is nirvana.

original: de nyid la zhen pa dang bral bas tshangs pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la zhen pa dang bral bas tshangs pa thob pa'o //
translated: Since one is free from clinging to that, Brahma is attained.

original: de ltar 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol zhing thar nas ye shes kyi sku thob ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol zhing thar nas ye shes kyi sku thob ste /
translated: As such, having been liberated from all bondage and having attained the body of gnosis,

original: des yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten byed pas lus zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten byed pas lus zhes bya'o //
translated: since it acts as the support for the arising of all qualities, it is called the body.

original: de ltar nyon mongs pa las grol zhing spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyon mongs pa las grol zhing spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o //
translated: Since one is liberated from afflictions and all signs of proliferation are pacified, there is peace.

original: zhi ba de nyid las mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi yon tan rnams 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhi ba de nyid las mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi yon tan rnams 'byung ste /
translated: From that peace, the qualities of the Dharma of nirvana arise.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyan thos kyi lam mo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyan thos kyi lam mo //
translated: Nirvana is the path of the śrāvakas.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa phyi ma ni rang rgyal ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa phyi ma ni rang rgyal ba'i lam mo //
translated: The subsequent nirvana is the path of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: legs par mya ngan las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: legs par mya ngan las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The good nirvana is the bodhisattvas.

original: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang / sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtha' gnyis sel te /
analyzed: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang / sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtha' gnyis sel te /
translated: The end of happiness is nirvana, and the end of suffering is samsara.

original: @24a * // mthar gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: @24a * // mthar gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: The one who removes both of those and possesses the wisdom of the end is buddhahood.

original: gzhi'i gnas lugs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhi'i gnas lugs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the essence of the pure nature of the basis,

original: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
analyzed: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
translated: it is free from attachment, beyond the body,

original: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //
analyzed: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //
translated: the sage, without example,

original: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
analyzed: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
translated: unapparent, invisible, and not manifest,

original: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //🔽phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //🔽rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
analyzed: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po // phra zhing zag med sa bon bral // rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
translated: unchanging, omnipresent, and pervasive,🔽subtle, without taint, and free from seeds,🔽without dust, free from dust, and stainless,

original: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
analyzed: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
translated: free from faults, and without faults.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is what is meant.

original: yul rnams la chags pa'i blo dang bral ba'i ye shes su snang ba las 'das te /
analyzed: yul rnams la chags pa'i blo dang bral ba'i ye shes su snang ba las 'das te /
translated: The pristine wisdom that is free from the mind of attachment to objects transcends appearances.

original: de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis mi brdzi bas thub pa med do //
analyzed: de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis mi brdzi bas thub pa med do //
translated: Since it is not suppressed by the power of adverse factors, it is invincible.

original: gang dang yang mnyam pa med pas dpe med do //
analyzed: gang dang yang mnyam pa med pas dpe med do //
translated: Since it is not the same as anything else, it is without example.

original: 'di mtshan nyid dngos po cir yang mi mthong la mtshan ma gang du yang mi snang ste /
analyzed: 'di mtshan nyid dngos po cir yang mi mthong la mtshan ma gang du yang mi snang ste /
translated: It does not see any characteristics as things, and no characteristics appear anywhere.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pas don la gsal byed mi dgos te mar me lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pas don la gsal byed mi dgos te mar me lta bu'o //
translated: Since it abides in the nature of natural luminosity, it does not need to be clarified, like a lamp.

original: 'dus ma byas pa'i rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa'i rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is not changed by any uncompounded conditions.

original: bde gshegs kyi snying po kun grol des til 'bru la mar bzhin kun la khyab po //
analyzed: bde gshegs kyi snying po kun grol des til 'bru la mar bzhin kun la khyab po //
translated: The sugata essence is all-liberating, and it pervades everything, like butter in milk.

original: rtul pos mi shes pas phra zhing zag pa ste srid par skye ba'i sa bon ma rig pa bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rtul pos mi shes pas phra zhing zag pa ste srid par skye ba'i sa bon ma rig pa bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Since it is not known by the coarse, it is subtle. It is the seed of the defilements, the ignorance of grasping at a self, and the birth in existence.

original: de ltar gzhi la rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dag nas med la /
analyzed: de ltar gzhi la rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dag nas med la /
translated: In that way, the dust of conceptuality is removed from the basis, and it is not existent.

original: de ma rtogs pa'i blo yang de nyid /
analyzed: de ma rtogs pa'i blo yang de nyid /
translated: The mind that does not realize that is itself that.

original: rtogs na rtogs pa'i rdul dang bral bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rtogs na rtogs pa'i rdul dang bral bar 'gyur la /
translated: If it is realized, it becomes free from the dust of conceptualization.

original: de nyid la yang ma zhen pas dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la yang ma zhen pas dri ma med pa'o //
translated: And since there is no attachment to that itself, it is immaculate.

original: de ltar sgrib gnyis spangs pas nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sgrib gnyis spangs pas nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med pa'o //
translated: Thus, since the two obscurations are eliminated, there are no faults of error.

original: don gnyis su med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni //
analyzed: don gnyis su med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni //
translated: The way the two benefits are spontaneously accomplished is🔽the extremely awakened one, the lord of awakening,

original: shin tu sad ba sad pa'i bdag / kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
analyzed: shin tu sad ba sad pa'i bdag / kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
translated: the holy one who knows all and perceives all,

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
translated: has transcended the dharmatā of consciousness.

original: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
translated: He holds the mode of nondual pristine consciousness

original: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //🔽ces smos te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub // ces smos te /
translated: and is free from conceptuality and spontaneously present.

original: sgrib pa gnyis las sad pa'am /🔽yang na snang ba ye shes sus sad pa'am /
analyzed: sgrib pa gnyis las sad pa'am / yang na snang ba ye shes sus sad pa'am /
translated: As such, he is free from the two obscurations.🔽Alternatively, he is awakened from appearances into pristine consciousness,

original: sems stong par sad pas ji snyed pa kun shes shing /🔽ji lta ba rig la /
analyzed: sems stong par sad pas ji snyed pa kun shes shing / ji lta ba rig la /
translated: or he is awakened from mind into emptiness.🔽Since he knows everything there is and perceives everything there is,

original: de yang dbyer med du shes pas dam pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dbyer med du shes pas dam pa'o //
translated: he is the holy one.

original: de ltar rtog pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rtog pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du 'das pa'o //
translated: Since he is free from conceptuality, he has transcended into the dimension of the dharmatā of consciousness.

original: 'das pa tsam na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa tsam na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul 'chang ba'o //
translated: In the mere past, he holds the mode of nondual pristine awareness.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa ste /
translated: Pristine awareness, free from conceptuality, is spontaneously present without causes and conditions.

original: ngo bo lhun grub po //
analyzed: ngo bo lhun grub po //
translated: Its essence is spontaneous presence.

original: de la yon tan @24b thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yon tan lhun grub po //
analyzed: de la yon tan @24b thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yon tan lhun grub po //
translated: Since all good qualities are spontaneously present, it is the spontaneous presence of good qualities.

original: rgyu rkyen gyis ji ltar ma bskyed cen /
analyzed: rgyu rkyen gyis ji ltar ma bskyed cen /
translated: How is it not produced by causes and conditions?

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //🔽sangs rgyas thog ma tham med //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa // sangs rgyas thog ma tham med //
translated: The deeds of the buddhas of the three times🔽The buddha has no beginning or end.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
translated: The primordial buddha has no cause.

original: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
translated: The single eye of pristine awareness is unstained.

original: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The one with a body of pristine awareness is the tathāgata.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can 'dren pa'i las mdzad de /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can 'dren pa'i las mdzad de /
translated: The buddhas of the three times perform the deeds of guiding sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas la thog ma 'di nas byung bya ba dang / tha ma 'dir song bya ba med de dang po nyid nas rgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la thog ma 'di nas byung bya ba dang / tha ma 'dir song bya ba med de dang po nyid nas rgyu med pa'o //
translated: The buddha has no beginning, such as “He arose from this,” and no end, such as “He went to this,” because he is primordially without cause.

original: de la gnyis 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas ye shes mig gcig go //
analyzed: de la gnyis 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas ye shes mig gcig go //
translated: Since it is without the stain of dualistic grasping, it is the single eye of pristine consciousness.

original: ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is the body of the single taste of the six pristine consciousnesses, it is called that.

original: de la gsung gi khyad par ci zhe na //
analyzed: de la gsung gi khyad par ci zhe na //
translated: What is the difference between the speech?

original: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //🔽smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
analyzed: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che // smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
translated: The lord of words is the great speaker.🔽The supreme speaker is the king of speakers.

original: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
analyzed: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
translated: The supreme one is the supreme place.

original: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //
analyzed: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //
translated: The lion of speakers is unequaled.

original: ces smras te /
analyzed: ces smras te /
translated: It is said:

original: zab cing rgya che ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o //
analyzed: zab cing rgya che ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o //
translated: Since the profound and vast Dharma is spoken, the lord of words is the great speaker.

original: mu stegs kyi smra ba las mchog tu gyur cing /
analyzed: mu stegs kyi smra ba las mchog tu gyur cing /
translated: Since it is superior to the speakers of the tīrthikas,

original: nyan thos kyi smra ba zil gyis gnon pas smra ba'i rgyal lo //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi smra ba zil gyis gnon pas smra ba'i rgyal lo //
translated: it is the king of speakers.

original: rang rgyal ba'i smra ba las 'phags pas dam pa'o //
analyzed: rang rgyal ba'i smra ba las 'phags pas dam pa'o //
translated: Since it is superior to the speakers of the pratyekabuddhas, it is supreme.

original: skye med kyi sgra chos smra ba'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog gi gnas so //
analyzed: skye med kyi sgra chos smra ba'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog gi gnas so //
translated: Since there is no one above the Dharma speaker of the sound of nonarising, it is the supreme place.

original: de ni seng ge dang 'dra ste bdud la sogs pa'i rgol bas mi tshugs so //
analyzed: de ni seng ge dang 'dra ste bdud la sogs pa'i rgol bas mi tshugs so //
translated: That is similar to a lion because it cannot be harmed by opponents such as Māra.

original: 'o na sku'i che ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'o na sku'i che ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the greatness of the body?

original: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
analyzed: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
translated: He is the all-seer, the supreme delight,🔽the mass of splendor, the beautiful to behold,

original: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug /'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug /'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
translated: the good light, the blazing glory,

original: lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po // zhes smos te /
translated: the light-handed, the illuminator.

original: shes rab ldan pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: shes rab ldan pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: This is said because of his possession of wisdom.

original: de yang dam pas 'gro ba la gzigs pas kun du lta pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dam pas 'gro ba la gzigs pas kun du lta pa'o //
translated: Moreover, he is the all-seer because he looks upon the world with his eyes of compassion.

original: bde pa chen po 'phags pas mchog tu dga'o //
analyzed: bde pa chen po 'phags pas mchog tu dga'o //
translated: He is the supreme delight because he is the supreme bliss of the āryas.

original: gzi brjid chen po gzhan yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa'i sku mnga' la /
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po gzhan yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa'i sku mnga' la /
translated: He is the mass of splendor because he has a body that is attractive to others and of great splendor.

original: nang na ye shes drug 'bar bas ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i rtags phyi ru 'od kha dog drug 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: nang na ye shes drug 'bar bas ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i rtags phyi ru 'od kha dog drug 'bar ba'o //
translated: The sign of his inner burning of the six pristine wisdoms that dispels the darkness of nescience is the outer blazing of six-colored light.

original: mtshan thun mong ma yin pa thugs ka na rin po che dpal be'us brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan thun mong ma yin pa thugs ka na rin po che dpal be'us brgyan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with a glorious jewel cintamani on his chest, which is his uncommon mark.

original: phyag las kyang 'od zer 'bar te zhi bas 'dul ba rnams 'dun pa skyed par byed la /
analyzed: phyag las kyang 'od zer 'bar te zhi bas 'dul ba rnams 'dun pa skyed par byed la /
translated: Light rays also blaze from his hands, and he generates the aspiration of those to be trained by means of his pacifying activities.

original: des mi 'dul ba rnams tshar gcod par byed do //
analyzed: des mi 'dul ba rnams tshar gcod par byed do //
translated: He annihilates those who cannot be trained by means of pacification.

original: des 'gro ba'i nad ji ltar sel zhe na //
analyzed: des 'gro ba'i nad ji ltar sel zhe na //
translated: How does it remove the sickness of beings?🔽It is said:

original: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
analyzed: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
translated: The supreme, chief physician,

original: zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
analyzed: zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed remover of pain,

original: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
analyzed: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
translated: The tree of all medicines,

original: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //🔽zhes @25a * //
analyzed: nad do cog gi dgra che ba // zhes @25a * //
translated: The great enemy of all sickness.

original: smos te / sman pa'i mchog ste bdag med kyi don bstan nas bdag 'dzin gyi zug rngu 'byin cing /
analyzed: smos te / sman pa'i mchog ste bdag med kyi don bstan nas bdag 'dzin gyi zug rngu 'byin cing /
translated: The supreme physician, having taught the meaning of selflessness, removes the pain of grasping at self.

original: de yang sman gyi dpe ni ljon shing dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: de yang sman gyi dpe ni ljon shing dang 'dra ste /
translated: The example of medicine is like a tree,

original: rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me tog la brten nas 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar rtsa ba ni byang chub sems so //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me tog la brten nas 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar rtsa ba ni byang chub sems so //
translated: for fruit arises in dependence on the root, branches, leaves, and flowers. The root is the thought of awakening.

original: yal ga ni rtogs par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: yal ga ni rtogs par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: The branches are the branches of the means of realization.

original: lo ma ni 'dir theg pa so so'i chos kyang bkag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lo ma ni 'dir theg pa so so'i chos kyang bkag pa med pa'o //
translated: The leaves are the individual vehicles of the Dharma, which are not prohibited here.

original: me tog ni rtogs pa'i nyams myong ngo //
analyzed: me tog ni rtogs pa'i nyams myong ngo //
translated: The flowers are the experiences of realization.

original: 'bras bu ni de mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: The fruit is the perfection of that.

original: der yang ma zad de phyi nang gi sman sna tshogs su yang sprul lo //
analyzed: der yang ma zad de phyi nang gi sman sna tshogs su yang sprul lo //
translated: Not only that, it also emanates as various external and internal medicines.

original: des dgra phyi nang gi nad sel bar byed do //
analyzed: des dgra phyi nang gi nad sel bar byed do //
translated: He removes the inner and outer diseases of enemies.

original: 'o na sku'i khyad par ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na sku'i khyad par ci zhe na /
translated: What is the difference in body?🔽The beautiful one of the three worlds,

original: sngu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sngu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can // zhes smos te /
translated: the glorious one with a mandala of stars,

original: sems can gyi ngo bo la sdug cing mdzes par sprul nas don mdzad de /
analyzed: sems can gyi ngo bo la sdug cing mdzes par sprul nas don mdzad de /
translated: Having emanated as the essence of a sentient being, he acts for the benefit of others.

original: dper na rgyu skar rnams kyi nang na zla ba ltar /
analyzed: dper na rgyu skar rnams kyi nang na zla ba ltar /
translated: For example, like the moon among the stars,

original: lha dang mi rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: he outshines gods and humans.

original: des skyob pa'i thugs rje ji lta bu zhe na /🔽phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa //
analyzed: des skyob pa'i thugs rje ji lta bu zhe na / phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa //
translated: What is the compassion of the protector like?🔽The banner of the Dharma is well-raised

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
translated: to the ends of space in the ten directions.

original: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
analyzed: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
translated: The one parasol for beings,

original: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
translated: the one with a mandala of love and compassion,

original: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //🔽zhas smos te //
analyzed: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //🔽zhas smos te //
translated: the glorious one, the lord of dance, the great lord, the precious parasol,

original: rgya ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par dam pa'i chos sgrogs pa'i mtshan mar rgyal mtshan 'dzugs shing /
analyzed: rgya ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par dam pa'i chos sgrogs pa'i mtshan mar rgyal mtshan 'dzugs shing /
translated: The banner is a symbol of proclaiming the sacred Dharma in the ten directions, as far as the limits of space.

original: gdugs kyis char dang nyi ma la sogs pa skyob pa lta bu ni /
analyzed: gdugs kyis char dang nyi ma la sogs pa skyob pa lta bu ni /
translated: The parasol protects from rain, sun, and so forth.

original: byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: This is due to the power of love and compassion.

original: de yang mgos pa padma dang 'dra la /
analyzed: de yang mgos pa padma dang 'dra la /
translated: Moreover, the parasol is like a lotus.

original: 'gro ba 'dren pa'i thabs sna tshogs sgyur ba ni gar dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dren pa'i thabs sna tshogs sgyur ba ni gar dang 'dra'o //
translated: The various means of guiding beings are like dance.

original: de yang yon tan rin po che'i gdugs lta bus skyob pa'i bdag po ni rje btsun nyid do //
analyzed: de yang yon tan rin po che'i gdugs lta bus skyob pa'i bdag po ni rje btsun nyid do //
translated: The lord who protects with a parasol of precious qualities is the venerable one himself.

original: ji ltar bstan kyang nges pa'i lam gcig las med pa'i phyir /🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che //
analyzed: ji ltar bstan kyang nges pa'i lam gcig las med pa'i phyir / sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che //
translated: No matter how it is taught, there is only one definitive path.🔽Therefore, it is said:🔽The great splendor of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
translated: The great body of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
translated: The great yoga of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces smos te /
translated: The single teaching of all buddhas.

original: rje btsun nyid la sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid chen po mnga' la /
analyzed: rje btsun nyid la sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid chen po mnga' la /
translated: The venerable one himself possesses the great splendor of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku rnam pa gsum yang 'chang bar mdzad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku rnam pa gsum yang 'chang bar mdzad de /
translated: He also bears the three bodies of all the buddhas.

original: thams cad rje btsun gyi sprul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad rje btsun gyi sprul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all of them are emanations of the venerable one.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal @25b 'byor che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal @25b 'byor che //
translated: He is the great yoga of all the buddhas.

original: thabs dang shas rab kyi gtso bor yang zhugs la /
analyzed: thabs dang shas rab kyi gtso bor yang zhugs la /
translated: He also enters into the principal method and wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos ji snyed cig gsungs kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos ji snyed cig gsungs kyang /
translated: Although there are as many teachings of the Buddha as there are,

original: yang dag par na gnyis su med par ston pa'i theg pa gcig las med de /
analyzed: yang dag par na gnyis su med par ston pa'i theg pa gcig las med de /
translated: in reality there is only one vehicle that teaches nonduality.🔽And that is like this:

original: de yang / theg pa'i sgo mo bsam yas kyang //
analyzed: de yang / theg pa'i sgo mo bsam yas kyang //
translated: Although the doors of vehicles are inconceivable,

original: nges pa'i don du gcig las med //🔽ces pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i don du gcig las med // ces pa lta bu'o //
translated: in the definitive meaning there is only one.

original: nges pa'i don gcig la ye shes ltar ji ltar snang zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa'i don gcig la ye shes ltar ji ltar snang zhe na /
translated: How does the single definitive meaning appear like pristine consciousness?

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
translated: The glorious one who bestows the empowerment of the vajra jewel

original: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
translated: is the lord of all jewels,🔽the lord of all lords of the world,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
translated: and the king of all vajra holders.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //🔽zhes smos te /
translated: He is the great mind of all buddhas.

original: rdo rje ni tshur mi tshugs pa dang par shes bya 'bigs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni tshur mi tshugs pa dang par shes bya 'bigs pa ste /
translated: The vajra is that which cannot be destroyed and which pierces the object of knowledge.

original: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa la dbang thob pas //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa la dbang thob pas //
translated: Since one has gained power over the realization of the dharmadhatu,

original: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: that is the mirrorlike gnosis, the essence of Akshobya.

original: des zhe sdang rang kha ma 'dul bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: des zhe sdang rang kha ma 'dul bar byed pa'o //
translated: That is what tames the ordinary anger.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs te /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs te /
translated: All phenomena are realized to be sameness.

original: yon tan rin po che kun la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: yon tan rin po che kun la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The lord who has power over all precious qualities is the gnosis of uniformity, the essence of Ratnasambhava.

original: des nga rgyal dad ser sna rang kha ma 'dul lo //
analyzed: des nga rgyal dad ser sna rang kha ma 'dul lo //
translated: That is what tames the ordinary pride and miserliness.

original: des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo so so ma 'dres pa la gsal pa la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo so so ma 'dres pa la gsal pa la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The lord who has power over the clarity of the individual, unmixed essence of all worldly phenomena is the discerning gnosis, the essence of Amitabha.

original: des 'dod chags rang kham 'dul lo ;
analyzed: des 'dod chags rang kham 'dul lo ;
translated: That is what tames the ordinary desire.

original: / rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par 'chang ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: / rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par 'chang ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The one who holds the vajra, the unobstructed activity, is the essence of Amoghasiddhi, the all-accomplishing wisdom.

original: des phrag dog dang le lo rang kham 'dul lo //
analyzed: des phrag dog dang le lo rang kham 'dul lo //
translated: With that, he tames the self-indulgent envy and laziness.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The mind of all buddhas, the great purity of the dharmadhatu, is the essence of Vairocana, the wisdom of the dharmadhatu.

original: des gti mug rang kha ma 'dul lo //
analyzed: des gti mug rang kha ma 'dul lo //
translated: With that, he tames the self-indulgent ignorance.

original: de dag kyang sku gsung thugs su 'dus tshul bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag kyang sku gsung thugs su 'dus tshul bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate how those are included in body, speech, and mind,🔽it says:

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas /
translated: Dwelling in the mind of all buddhas,

original: g/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
analyzed: g/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
translated: the great body of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin // zhes smos te /
translated: and also the speech of all buddhas.

original: rje btsun gyi thugs ni ye shes drug ro gcig cing mnyam pa ste ;
analyzed: rje btsun gyi thugs ni ye shes drug ro gcig cing mnyam pa ste ;
translated: The mind of the venerable one is the single taste and equality of the six wisdoms.

original: des sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la khyab cing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: des sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la khyab cing gnas pa'o //
translated: With that, he pervades and dwells in the mind of all buddhas.

original: de yang shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen cing rig pas na thugs so //
analyzed: de yang shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen cing rig pas na thugs so //
translated: Moreover, since he knows and is aware of all objects of knowledge, he is the mind.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi skur sprul pa yang rje btsun nyid yin pas sku rnams kyi nang na che ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi skur sprul pa yang rje btsun nyid yin pas sku rnams kyi nang na che ba'o //
translated: Since the Lord himself is the emanation of the body of all Buddhas, he is the greatest of the bodies.

original: de yang khyab cing rten byed pa dang / snang bas na sku'o //🔽sangs @26a * //
analyzed: de yang khyab cing rten byed pa dang / snang bas na sku'o // sangs @26a * //
translated: Moreover, he is the body because he pervades, he acts as the support, and he appears.

original: rgyas kun gyi gsung 'byung ba'i rgyu dang ngo bo nyid du yang rje btsun 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: rgyas kun gyi gsung 'byung ba'i rgyu dang ngo bo nyid du yang rje btsun 'gyur ba ste /
translated: He is the speech of all Buddhas, the cause and the essence of the origination of speech.

original: gsal ba dang go bar byed pa dang grags pa'i phyir na gsung ngo //
analyzed: gsal ba dang go bar byed pa dang grags pa'i phyir na gsung ngo //
translated: He is speech because he is clear, he causes understanding, and he is renowned.

original: des gzhan gyi mun pa sel zhing ma gos pa ni //
analyzed: des gzhan gyi mun pa sel zhing ma gos pa ni //
translated: He removes the darkness of others without being stained by it.

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
translated: The great light of the vajra sun,

original: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
translated: the stainless light of the vajra moon,

original: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
analyzed: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
translated: the great passion of the passionless, etc.

original: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
translated: The light of the blazing variegated color,

original: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: the perfect Buddha in the vajra posture,

original: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
translated: the holder of the Dharma of the Buddha's migration,

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
translated: the glorious Buddha born from the lotus.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems pas nyi ma che'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems pas nyi ma che'o //
translated: He is the great sun because he dries up the ocean of existence with nondual intuition.

original: ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i zla ba'i 'od do//
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i zla ba'i 'od do//
translated: The light of the moon that dispels the darkness of ignorance.

original: chags pa rang kha ma dang bral zhing don dang gdul bya la chags pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa rang kha ma dang bral zhing don dang gdul bya la chags pa'o //
translated: Free from self-centered attachment and attached to the meaning and those to be tamed.

original: yang na pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba'i gang zag la chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul du chos bshad la //
analyzed: yang na pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba'i gang zag la chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul du chos bshad la //
translated: Or, for individuals to be tamed by the perfections, the Dharma is explained in a way that is free from attachment.

original: gsang sngags kyi rigs can la chags pa rang rgyud du spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos bshad do //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi rigs can la chags pa rang rgyud du spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos bshad do //
translated: For those of the mantra type, the Dharma is explained in a way that is practiced with self-centered attachment.

original: nang na ye shes dang thugs rje'i 'od 'bar ba'i rtags /
analyzed: nang na ye shes dang thugs rje'i 'od 'bar ba'i rtags /
translated: The inner sign is the blazing light of wisdom and compassion.

original: phyi rol du kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'bar ba'o //
translated: The outer sign is the blazing light of various colors.

original: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rtags su rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rtags su rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The sign of inseparable method and wisdom is sitting in vajra posture.

original: sangs rgyas rnams 'gro ba la byams pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni thugs mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis rang sgrar shar ba la bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams 'gro ba la byams pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni thugs mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis rang sgrar shar ba la bya'o //
translated: The buddhas' holding the Dharma of love for migrating beings is the self-appearance in the manner of the nonconceptual mind.

original: nyes skyon dang bral ba ni padma lta bu ste //
analyzed: nyes skyon dang bral ba ni padma lta bu ste //
translated: Free from faults and flaws, it is like a lotus.

original: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi skye gnas su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi skye gnas su gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the source of all the Buddhas.

original: tshul ji lta bu zhe na //
analyzed: tshul ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: In what way?

original: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
translated: He holds the treasury of omniscient intuition,

original: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: the king, the holder of various magical powers,

original: che ba gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: che ba gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang // zhes smos te /
translated: the great one, the holder of the knowledge and mantras.

original: shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pas kun mkhyen ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pas kun mkhyen ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He holds the treasury of omniscient intuition, knowing the way things are and all that exists.

original: yon tan gyi bgo skal las rgyal ba dang bdud las rgyal zhing sgyu ma lta bu'i sdrul pa mos pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi bgo skal las rgyal ba dang bdud las rgyal zhing sgyu ma lta bu'i sdrul pa mos pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the king, the holder of various magical powers, having conquered the demons and the portions of good qualities, and holding the various means of disciplining the various inclinations of disciples, which are like magical creations.

original: che ba'i yon tan khyad par du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs shes rab dang / rig sngags kyi ngo bo shes rab dang ye shes 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: che ba'i yon tan khyad par du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs shes rab dang / rig sngags kyi ngo bo shes rab dang ye shes 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the great one, the holder of the knowledge and mantras, holding the knowledge and intuition which are the essence of the knowledge and mantras.

original: 'o na shes rab kyi las gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'o na shes rab kyi las gang zhe na //
translated: What is the function of the knowledge?

original: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
translated: The sharp vajra, the great sword,

original: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
