translated: The supreme syllable, the pure, the Great Vehicle, the cutter of suffering,

original: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
analyzed: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
translated: the great weapon, the vajra Dharma,

original: rdo rje zab mo dzin dzi ka / rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / ces @26b smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje zab mo dzin dzi ka / rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / ces @26b smos te /
translated: the profound vajra, the vajra intellect, the knower of the meaning as it is.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ral gri dang 'dra bas bdag tu rtog pa thams cad gcod cing /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ral gri dang 'dra bas bdag tu rtog pa thams cad gcod cing /
translated: Nondual wisdom is like a sword, cutting all conceptions of self.

original: don mi 'gyur ba yi ge dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: don mi 'gyur ba yi ge dang 'dra ste /
translated: The unchanging meaning is like a syllable.

original: rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pas mchog go //
analyzed: rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pas mchog go //
translated: It is supreme, unstained by the defilements of thought.

original: shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par byas nas theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par byas nas theg pa chen po ste /
translated: The Great Vehicle is distinguished by wisdom and compassion.

original: de rtogs pas sdug bsngal rtsa ba nas gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de rtogs pas sdug bsngal rtsa ba nas gcod pa'o //
translated: By realizing it, suffering is cut off at the root.

original: de gcod pa'i mtshon cha ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'o //
analyzed: de gcod pa'i mtshon cha ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'o //
translated: The weapon that cuts it off is the nondual wisdom that is like a vajra.

original: de lta bu'i zab mo ni rgyal ba'i yang rgyal po yin pas dzin dzi ka go //
analyzed: de lta bu'i zab mo ni rgyal ba'i yang rgyal po yin pas dzin dzi ka go //
translated: Such a profound [wisdom] is the king of conquerors, and so it is called Jinajika.

original: shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pas /
analyzed: shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with the intellect of great wisdom,

original: shes bya ji lta ba rig pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya ji lta ba rig pa'o //
translated: one knows the object of knowledge as it is.

original: de ltar rig pas gdul bya la rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa ston pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar rig pas gdul bya la rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa ston pa ni /
translated: Thus, the teaching of the vehicles of cause and effect to those to be tamed by awareness is as follows.

original: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
translated: The perfection of all perfections,

original: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
translated: adorned with all the grounds,

original: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
translated: the pure, selfless dharma,

original: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
translated: the excellent moonlight of perfect wisdom,

original: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
analyzed: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
translated: the great diligence, the magical net,

original: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces smos te /
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces smos te /
translated: the supreme lord of all tantras.

original: rje btsun nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rnams kyang rdzogs par mnga' la /
analyzed: rje btsun nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rnams kyang rdzogs par mnga' la /
translated: The essence of the perfection of all perfections is complete in the Jetsun himself.

original: sa bcu'i yon tan gyis kyang brgyan te /
analyzed: sa bcu'i yon tan gyis kyang brgyan te /
translated: He is also adorned with the qualities of the ten grounds.

original: ma gos pas rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so //
analyzed: ma gos pas rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so //
translated: Since he is unstained, he is the pure, selfless dharma.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa dang gdung ba sel zhing //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa dang gdung ba sel zhing //
translated: The moonlight of perfect wisdom dispels ignorance and torment.

original: 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan te /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan te /
translated: He possesses great diligence for the benefit of migrating beings.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs ston cing /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs ston cing /
translated: He displays various magical emanations.

original: khyad par du rgyud thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du rgyud thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston pa'o //
translated: In particular, it teaches the nondual pristine awareness that is the supreme of all tantras.🔽In order to show that the root of all the victors is the nondual mind of enlightenment,

original: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas rgyal ba kun gyi snying por bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas rgyal ba kun gyi snying por bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: it is said:

original: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan //
translated: Endowed with all the vajra seats,

original: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
analyzed: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
translated: Holder of all the pristine awareness bodies,

original: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
analyzed: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
translated: Samantabhadra, good intellect,

original: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin //
analyzed: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin //
translated: Essence of the earth, holder of beings,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che // zhes smos te /
translated: Great essence of all the buddhas,

original: gzhi chos sku rdo rje lta bu'i rtogs pa las ye shes kyi sku sna tshogs 'byung zhing bzang ngan dang blang dor gang yang med pas kun du bzang la //
analyzed: gzhi chos sku rdo rje lta bu'i rtogs pa las ye shes kyi sku sna tshogs 'byung zhing bzang ngan dang blang dor gang yang med pas kun du bzang la //
translated: From the realization of the vajra-like dharmakaya, the ground, the pristine awareness bodies arise in various ways. Since there is neither good nor bad, nor anything to accept or reject, it is Samantabhadra.

original: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa mkhyen pas blo gros bzang ngo //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa mkhyen pas blo gros bzang ngo //
translated: Since it knows what is beneficial for oneself and others, it is good intellect.

original: sa bzhin du sems can la phan pa'i yon tan skyed pa'i phyir dang / snod kyi 'jig rten du sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sa bzhin du sems can la phan pa'i yon tan skyed pa'i phyir dang / snod kyi 'jig rten du sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir //
translated: Since it produces the qualities that benefit sentient beings like the earth, and since it emanates into the world of the environment and acts for the benefit of beings, it is the essence of the earth and the holder of beings.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa 'byung ba'i snying po chen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa 'byung ba'i snying po chen por gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the great heart essence from which the emanations of all buddhas arise.

original: snying po de las sprul pa tshul ji ltar 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: snying po de las sprul pa tshul ji ltar 'byung ba ni /
translated: The way in which emanations arise from that heart essence is as follows:

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //🔽dngos po kun gyi @27a * //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // dngos po kun gyi @27a * //
translated: The emanation wheel holds the variety.🔽The supreme nature of all things

original: rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
analyzed: rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
translated: holds the nature of all things.

original: skye med chos de sna tshogs ston //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: skye med chos de sna tshogs ston // zhes smos te /
translated: The unborn Dharma is shown to be diverse.

original: rig pa byang chub sems cir yang 'char bas sgrub thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: rig pa byang chub sems cir yang 'char bas sgrub thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'byung ba yin la /
translated: Since awareness—awakened mind—arises as anything at all, the various specific methods for practice come about.

original: der yang ma zad sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi yin la /
analyzed: der yang ma zad sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi yin la /
translated: Not only that, it is the ground from which the various emanations of awakened body, speech, and mind arise.

original: snod bcud kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin skye med du gnas pas kyang mchog go //
analyzed: snod bcud kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin skye med du gnas pas kyang mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because the nature of all things in the universe abides as unborn.

original: don skye ba med pas kyang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar lta bur kyang ma 'gags par shar bas rang bzhin 'dzin to //
analyzed: don skye ba med pas kyang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar lta bur kyang ma 'gags par shar bas rang bzhin 'dzin to //
translated: Since the unborn ultimate also arises without impediment as form and so forth, up to and including omniscience, it holds the nature of all things.

original: mdor na zab par skye ba med kyang rgya che ba sna tshogs su ston to //
analyzed: mdor na zab par skye ba med kyang rgya che ba sna tshogs su ston to //
translated: In brief, although there is no production in the profound, there is a display in the manifold of the vast.

original: zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pas theg pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pas theg pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o //
translated: And because of the nonduality of the profound and the vast, it is called the supreme vehicle.

original: shes rab dam ba'i ngo bo ci zhe na //
analyzed: shes rab dam ba'i ngo bo ci zhe na //
translated: What is the nature of the best wisdom?

original: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
analyzed: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
translated: It is the nature of all phenomena.

original: shes rab chen pos skad cig la //🔽chos kun khong du chud pa ste //
analyzed: shes rab chen pos skad cig la // chos kun khong du chud pa ste //
translated: By the great wisdom, in an instant,🔽all phenomena are comprehended.

original: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste //
translated: It is the clear realization of all phenomena.

original: zhes smos te //
analyzed: zhes smos te //
translated: It is said.

original: chos phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid ni mnyam pa chen po yin la /
analyzed: chos phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid ni mnyam pa chen po yin la /
translated: The nature of all the aggregates of phenomena, the elements, the sense fields, dependent origination, and so forth is great equality.

original: de gang gis rtogs na shes rab chen pos skad cig la /
analyzed: de gang gis rtogs na shes rab chen pos skad cig la /
translated: If that is realized, by the great wisdom, in an instant,

original: shes bya'i chos thams cad khong du chud de mngon sum du gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya'i chos thams cad khong du chud de mngon sum du gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
translated: all phenomena that are objects of knowledge are comprehended and clearly realized in a direct perception.

original: shes rab de'i stobs ji lta bu zhe na //
analyzed: shes rab de'i stobs ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: What is the power of that wisdom?

original: thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel //
analyzed: thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel //
translated: The Sage, with the best mind, dispels the spirits.

original: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
analyzed: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
translated: holds the enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //🔽ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa // ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
translated: It is the direct perception of all buddhas,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: the flame of wisdom, shining with brilliant light.

original: lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba'i las la thub cing /
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba'i las la thub cing /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are restrained from nonvirtuous actions.🔽Since the supreme mind that realizes dharmatā exists, it eliminates the

original: chos nyid rtogs pa'i blo'i mchog yod pas rnam rtog gi gnod pa 'byung ba lta bu sel te /
analyzed: chos nyid rtogs pa'i blo'i mchog yod pas rnam rtog gi gnod pa 'byung ba lta bu sel te /
translated: harm of conceptuality.🔽Since it is unmoving by any sign, the nature of clarity without

original: mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g-yo bar chu dang ba lta bu'i bdag nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g-yo bar chu dang ba lta bu'i bdag nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
translated: conceptuality is the enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: de yang lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni mchog mkhyen la /
analyzed: de yang lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni mchog mkhyen la /
translated: Moreover, the yogin who is on the path knows the supreme, and the

original: sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum mkhyen te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum mkhyen te /
translated: buddhas know it directly.

original: ye shes de'i dpe ni me lce 'bar ba dang 'dra la /
analyzed: ye shes de'i dpe ni me lce 'bar ba dang 'dra la /
translated: The example of that wisdom is like a blazing flame.

original: ma rig pa sel ba dang nyon mongs pa sel ba dang / srin bu me khyer la sogs pa'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa dang / zhing khams grangs med du snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa sel ba dang nyon mongs pa sel ba dang / srin bu me khyer la sogs pa'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa dang / zhing khams grangs med du snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: It dispels ignorance and afflictions, outshines the light of fireflies and so forth, and illuminates countless buddha fields.

original: da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas @27b 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas @27b 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach the name of the wisdom being Mañjuśrī from the perspective of the wisdom of equality,🔽it is said:

original: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
translated: The supreme accomplishment of the desired goal,

original: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
translated: purifying all lower realms,🔽the protector, the supreme of all beings,

original: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
analyzed: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
translated: liberating all beings,

original: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
translated: the sole hero in the battle against afflictions,

original: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
analyzed: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
translated: conquering the arrogance of the enemy of ignorance.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so forth.

original: mtho ris dang thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi don du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: mtho ris dang thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi don du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed de /
translated: For those who desire higher rebirth and liberation, it accomplishes their goals through generosity and so forth.

original: dman pa ngan song gsum las kyang thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams bstan nas rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyong zhing /
analyzed: dman pa ngan song gsum las kyang thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams bstan nas rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyong zhing /
translated: He teaches the Dharma that is suitable for liberation from the three lower realms, which are inferior, and he purifies causes and effects.

original: sems can kun gyi don byed pas mchog go //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don byed pas mchog go //
translated: He is supreme because he acts for the welfare of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen pas blo'i rim pa dang sbyar nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen pas blo'i rim pa dang sbyar nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar byed do //
translated: He knows the thoughts of all sentient beings and, in accordance with their mental level, he liberates them from the bondage of the afflictions.

original: chos ji snyed cig bshad kyang nyon mongs pa 'dul pa'i gnyen por gcig go //
analyzed: chos ji snyed cig bshad kyang nyon mongs pa 'dul pa'i gnyen por gcig go //
translated: No matter how much Dharma he explains, it is all the antidote for subduing the afflictions.

original: des mu stegs la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pas dregs pa 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: des mu stegs la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pas dregs pa 'joms pa'o //
translated: Since he outshines tīrthikas and so on, he conquers arrogance.

original: gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa de ltar 'joms na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa de ltar 'joms na /
translated: If he conquers the afflictions of others in that way,

original: 'o na gzhan 'dul ba'i gzugs su ji ltar ston zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gzhan 'dul ba'i gzugs su ji ltar ston zhe na /
translated: how does he display the form of taming others?

original: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
analyzed: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
translated: He is glorious and has a charming mind.

original: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba // zhes smos te /
translated: He is steadfast and has an ugly form.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du gyur pas shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du gyur pas shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pa /
translated: He is glorious for himself and others. He has a mind of great wisdom.

original: bltan mdzes par mdzad pas na sgeg pa'o //
analyzed: bltan mdzes par mdzad pas na sgeg pa'o //
translated: He is charming because he is beautiful to behold.

original: don mi 'gyur bar brtan la /
analyzed: don mi 'gyur bar brtan la /
translated: He is steadfast because his purpose is unchanging.

original: zhi bas mi 'dul ba la bdud la sogs pa zlog pa'i 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: zhi bas mi 'dul ba la bdud la sogs pa zlog pa'i 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is terrifying because he wears a form that is frightening to those who cannot be subdued by peace, such as Mara.

original: de yang gar la mos pa la gar du ston pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yang gar la mos pa la gar du ston pa'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, he displays dance in order to show dance to those who are devoted to dance.🔽He dances with the gait of a dance

original: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
translated: with all his hundred arms moving.

original: gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa //
translated: He dances in the sky,

original: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //🔽nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la // nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa // zhes smos te /
translated: filled with his glorious hundred arms.

original: tshangs pa 'dul ba'i gar lag pa brgya sprul te bsgyur ba dang / tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i mthus lag pa brgyar sprul te //
analyzed: tshangs pa 'dul ba'i gar lag pa brgya sprul te bsgyur ba dang / tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i mthus lag pa brgyar sprul te //
translated: He displays dance in order to subdue Brahma, manifesting a hundred arms, and he displays a hundred arms through the power of completing the two accumulations.

original: nam mkha' khyab tshad du 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab tshad du 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: He performs the benefit of transmigrating beings as far as the sky pervades.

original: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang ston pa'i phyir //🔽sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
analyzed: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang ston pa'i phyir // sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
translated: In order to display other physical miracles,

original: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
analyzed: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
translated: he presses down with the sole of one foot🔽the perimeter of the earth

original: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
analyzed: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
translated: and with the tip of his toe

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //🔽zhes smos te /🔽gling bzhi'i khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba de'i gnyen por gling bzhi ri rab @28a * //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon // zhes smos te / gling bzhi'i khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba de'i gnyen por gling bzhi ri rab @28a * //
translated: He presses down with his foot the abode of Brahma.🔽The four continents are the domain of Vishnu.

original: dang bcas pa rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil gyis mnan pa ste /
analyzed: dang bcas pa rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil gyis mnan pa ste /
translated: The antidote to that is to press down with the sole of one foot the four continents and Mount Meru.

original: gling bzhi chung du ma song la zhabs che rum song ngo //
analyzed: gling bzhi chung du ma song la zhabs che rum song ngo //
translated: The four continents do not become smaller and the foot does not become larger.

original: gyen la ni zhabs kyi mthe bong gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dus gcig tu gnon to //
analyzed: gyen la ni zhabs kyi mthe bong gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dus gcig tu gnon to //
translated: He presses down with his big toe the Brahma world.

original: snga ma ltar che chung du ma song ba'i rdzu 'phrul ston to //
analyzed: snga ma ltar che chung du ma song ba'i rdzu 'phrul ston to //
translated: He displays his magical power without the former becoming smaller or the latter becoming larger.

original: 'khor ba 'di ma spangs par ji ltar grol bar 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: 'khor ba 'di ma spangs par ji ltar grol bar 'gyur zhe na //
translated: How can one be liberated without abandoning samsara?

original: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
analyzed: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
translated: The meaning of the Dharma is the non-duality of the one meaning.

original: dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med //🔽rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
analyzed: dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med // rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
translated: The ultimate meaning is fearless.🔽It has the meaning of the various forms of consciousness.

original: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
analyzed: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
translated: It is endowed with the various consciousnesses and continuums.

original: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
analyzed: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
translated: It delights in all the meanings of entities.

original: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
translated: It is the mind of desire and delight in emptiness.

original: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //
translated: It abandons the desire of existence.

original: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa // zhes smos te /
translated: He is the great delight of the three worlds.

original: gnyis su med pa ni don dam pa chos kyi sku ni don dam pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa ni don dam pa chos kyi sku ni don dam pa ste /
translated: The nondual is the ultimate, the Dharmakaya, which is the ultimate.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pas 'jigs pa med de /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pas 'jigs pa med de /
translated: Since it is not overcome by anything else, it is fearless.

original: thugs rje dang smon lam gyi shugs kyis rnam rig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul lo //
analyzed: thugs rje dang smon lam gyi shugs kyis rnam rig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul lo //
translated: By the power of compassion and vows, it emanates in the form of various awarenesses.

original: kun gzhi rnam shes nyid rnam rtog sna tshogs dang 'brel pas rgyud do //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam shes nyid rnam rtog sna tshogs dang 'brel pas rgyud do //
translated: The alaya consciousness itself is the continuum because it is connected with various thoughts.

original: de ltar dngos po 'khor ba'i don ma lus par mdzad pa las dgyes shing /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po 'khor ba'i don ma lus par mdzad pa las dgyes shing /
translated: Thus, he is delighted in performing the benefit of all things, the meaning of samsara.

original: don dam par stong pa nyid la dga' zhing chags pa'i blos khams gsum gyi 'dod chags rang kha ma las grol bas spangs pa'o //
analyzed: don dam par stong pa nyid la dga' zhing chags pa'i blos khams gsum gyi 'dod chags rang kha ma las grol bas spangs pa'o //
translated: He is free from the abandonment of the self-fixated attachment of the three worlds because he is delighted in and attached to the ultimate emptiness.

original: shes rab chen pos srid pa las grol kyang thugs rjes der sprul nas don mdzad pa la dga'o //
analyzed: shes rab chen pos srid pa las grol kyang thugs rjes der sprul nas don mdzad pa la dga'o //
translated: He is delighted in the emanation there and the performance of benefit by compassion, even though he is free from samsara by great wisdom.

original: don mdzad pa'i tshe sku'i gzi mdangs ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: don mdzad pa'i tshe sku'i gzi mdangs ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is the radiance of the body when performing benefit?

original: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //
analyzed: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //
translated: He is white like a pure white cloud.

original: 'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
analyzed: 'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
translated: His light is like the light of the autumn moon,

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
translated: beautiful like the orb of the rising sun.

original: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar // zhes smos te /
translated: The light of his nails is very red.

original: don lam gos pa'i mtshan ma 'od kha dog sprin ltar dkar zhing /
analyzed: don lam gos pa'i mtshan ma 'od kha dog sprin ltar dkar zhing /
translated: The sign of the path of the goal is light, white like a cloud.

original: ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i dpe ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing gdung ba tshim par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i dpe ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing gdung ba tshim par byed pa'o //
translated: The example of the light of intuition is like the light of the autumn moon, which dispels the darkness of ignorance and satisfies beings with its radiance.

original: de las kyang ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i rtags su 'od kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ste /
analyzed: de las kyang ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i rtags su 'od kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ste /
translated: Moreover, as a sign of the oneness of the six intuitions, he has a body endowed with six colored lights.

original: 'gro ba la thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su phyag gi sen mo dmar ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba la thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su phyag gi sen mo dmar ba'o //
translated: And as a sign of his compassion for beings, the light of his nails is red.

original: rgyan gyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rgyan gyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are the special ornaments?

original: cod pan bzang bo mthon ka'i rtse //
analyzed: cod pan bzang bo mthon ka'i rtse //
translated: His excellent crown is the peak of Meru,

original: skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa //
analyzed: skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa //
translated: his excellent hair is great Meru,

original: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //🔽sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal // sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
translated: his great jewel is the glory of radiance,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: he is adorned with the ornaments of the emanations of the buddhas.

original: mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba'i @28b rtags su dbu la rin po che'i cod pan bzang zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba'i @28b rtags su dbu la rin po che'i cod pan bzang zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o //
translated: As a sign of victory over the two extremes, he is adorned with a beautiful and lovely jeweled diadem on his head.

original: skra yang gzhan pas mchog tu gyur pas rin po che mthon ka ltar sngo zhing mdzes pa'i skra mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: skra yang gzhan pas mchog tu gyur pas rin po che mthon ka ltar sngo zhing mdzes pa'i skra mnga' ba'o //
translated: His hair is better than others, and he has hair that is blue and lovely like a sapphire.

original: 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rtags su thugs ka na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sa brgyan cing /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rtags su thugs ka na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sa brgyan cing /
translated: As a sign of his perfect performance of the welfare of transmigrating beings, he is adorned with a wish-fulfilling jewel on his heart.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pa mnga' ba'i rtags su ba spu re re la ye shes sems dpa' re re gsal zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pa mnga' ba'i rtags su ba spu re re la ye shes sems dpa' re re gsal zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o //
translated: As a sign of his possession of limitless emanations of buddhas, he is adorned with each pore of his body being clear and lovely with each being of pristine cognition.

original: de lta bu de la lam gyi khyad par ji lta bu mnga' zhe na //
analyzed: de lta bu de la lam gyi khyad par ji lta bu mnga' zhe na //
translated: What is the special path like for such a one?

original: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
translated: He shakes a hundred world systems.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //🔽de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan // de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
translated: He has the great power of the bases of magical emanations.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: He is the great holder of mindfulness.

original: 'jig rten khams brgya ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten khams brgya ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: A hundred world systems is just an illustration.

original: mtha' yas par bskyod par mdzad do //
analyzed: mtha' yas par bskyod par mdzad do //
translated: He moves to infinite realms.

original: bskyod nas ci mdzad na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'gro don mdzad de /
analyzed: bskyod nas ci mdzad na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'gro don mdzad de /
translated: What does he do after moving? He benefits migrators by way of the four bases of magic power and so forth.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
translated: The four bases of magic power are: the base of magic power endowed with the concentration of aspiration, the base of magic power endowed with the concentration of mind, the base of magic power endowed with the concentration of effort,

original: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: and the base of magic power endowed with the concentration of investigation.

original: de yang don mi bsnyel ba'i dren pa chen po 'chang ste /
analyzed: de yang don mi bsnyel ba'i dren pa chen po 'chang ste /
translated: Moreover, he holds the great mindfulness that does not forget the meaning.

original: gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what are the branches of enlightenment?

original: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
analyzed: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
translated: The four mindfulnesses are the king of concentrations.

original: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
translated: The flowers and incense of the branches of enlightenment

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
translated: are the ocean of qualities of the Tathagata.

original: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig / yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig / yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa // zhes smos te /
translated: The eight branches of the path are known, and the path of perfect buddhahood is known.

original: dran pa bzhi ni lus dran pa nye par gzhag pa dang / sems dang / tshor ba dang / chos so //
analyzed: dran pa bzhi ni lus dran pa nye par gzhag pa dang / sems dang / tshor ba dang / chos so //
translated: The four establishments of mindfulness are the establishment of mindfulness of body, of feeling, of mind, and of dharmas.

original: de rnams ni tshogs lam gyi gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de rnams ni tshogs lam gyi gnas skabs so //
translated: These are the stages of the path of accumulation.

original: dran pa bzhi po de la yang ma zhen pas ting nge 'dzin rgyal lo //
analyzed: dran pa bzhi po de la yang ma zhen pas ting nge 'dzin rgyal lo //
translated: Since one is not attached to those four establishments of mindfulness, samādhi is the king.

original: de la mthong lam gyi gnas skabs na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te /
analyzed: de la mthong lam gyi gnas skabs na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te /
translated: At the time of the path of seeing, there are seven aids to enlightenment:

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par dbye ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms so //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par dbye ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms so //
translated: the correct mindfulness that is an aid to enlightenment, the discernment of dharmas, diligence, joy, fitness, samādhi, and equanimity.

original: de lta bu'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang / 'phags pa mnyes par byed pas me tog spos so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang / 'phags pa mnyes par byed pas me tog spos so //
translated: Since one benefits migrating beings and pleases the āryas through such means, they are flowers and incense.

original: der yang ma zad de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs te /
analyzed: der yang ma zad de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs te /
translated: Not only that, there are the eighteen unshared qualities of the buddhas, and so on.

original: de bzhin @29a * //
analyzed: de bzhin @29a * //
translated: In the same way,

original: gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho tsam gyi gzhir rje btsun nyid 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho tsam gyi gzhir rje btsun nyid 'gyur ro //
translated: the Lord himself is the basis of the ocean-like qualities of the Tathagata.

original: gzhan yang bsgom lam gyi gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgom lam gyi gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
translated: Moreover, in the context of the path of cultivation, there is the eightfold noble path:

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / rtog pa dang / dag dang / las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dang / rtsol ba dang / dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / rtog pa dang / dag dang / las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dang / rtsol ba dang / dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: right view, right thought, right speech, right activity, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samadhi.

original: de lta bu'i tshul rig nas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul rig nas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad do //
translated: Knowing such a method, he leads transmigrating beings.

original: de ltar rig pa ni yang dag par sangs rgyas pa'i lam rig pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rig pa ni yang dag par sangs rgyas pa'i lam rig pa'o //
translated: Knowing thus is knowing the path of perfect Buddhahood.

original: don mdzad pa la sngon du thugs rje skye dgos pa'i phyir //
analyzed: don mdzad pa la sngon du thugs rje skye dgos pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the performance of benefit must first generate compassion,

original: sems can kun la shas cher chags //
analyzed: sems can kun la shas cher chags //
translated: He is greatly attached to all sentient beings.

original: nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
translated: He is unattached like space.

original: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug / sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug / sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
translated: He enters the minds of all sentient beings, and is as swift as the mind of all sentient beings.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sems can kun la bu gcig pa'i ma ltar thugs rjes chags shing /
analyzed: sems can kun la bu gcig pa'i ma ltar thugs rjes chags shing /
translated: He is attached with compassion to all sentient beings like a mother to her only son.

original: 'o na mtshan mar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mtshan mar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: But, it will be objected, is not that a conceptualization?

original: don nam mkha' ltar mkhyen pas chags pa rang kha ma sal lo //
analyzed: don nam mkha' ltar mkhyen pas chags pa rang kha ma sal lo //
translated: No, because the meaning is known like space, and the attachment is self-purified.

original: de yang sams can kun gyi yid la khyab par 'jug cing /
analyzed: de yang sams can kun gyi yid la khyab par 'jug cing /
translated: Moreover, it pervades the minds of all sentient beings,

original: 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus yid ltar mgyogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus yid ltar mgyogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: and it is diligent in the aims of beings, acting as quickly as thought.

original: de yang don bya ba'i yul mkhyen pa bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yang don bya ba'i yul mkhyen pa bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, in order to demonstrate the object of the activity of that knowledge,🔽it is said:

original: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
translated: It knows the faculties and aims of all sentient beings,

original: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
translated: it captivates the minds of all sentient beings,

original: phung po lnga don de nyid shes //
analyzed: phung po lnga don de nyid shes //
translated: it knows the reality of the meaning of the five aggregates,

original: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba // zhes smos te /
translated: it possesses the five pure aggregates.

original: sems can kun gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma shes shing don gang la mos pa rnams shes pas so //🔽sku lta bas chog mi shes pa ston pas kyang sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog la /
analyzed: sems can kun gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma shes shing don gang la mos pa rnams shes pas so // sku lta bas chog mi shes pa ston pas kyang sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog la /
translated: It knows the superior, middling, and inferior faculties of all sentient beings, and it knows the aims to which they are devoted.

original: yid rtog bcas rtog med du bzlog pas kyang yid 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: yid rtog bcas rtog med du bzlog pas kyang yid 'phrog pa'o //
translated: It captivates the minds of all sentient beings by displaying a body whose sight is never satisfying, and it captivates the minds by turning the mind with and without discursive thought.

original: de yang phung po lnga'i don kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur shes la /
analyzed: de yang phung po lnga'i don kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur shes la /
translated: Furthermore, one understands the meaning of the five aggregates as the relative, which is like an illusion.

original: don dam du skye ba med par shes pa'o //
analyzed: don dam du skye ba med par shes pa'o //
translated: And one understands them as ultimately unborn.

original: de yang rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga dang ldan te /
analyzed: de yang rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga dang ldan te /
translated: One is endowed with the five pure aggregates:

original: tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
translated: the aggregate of morality, the aggregate of meditative stabilization, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the wisdom of liberation.

original: 'o na don byed pa'i thabs ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: 'o na don byed pa'i thabs ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does one know the means of accomplishing the aims of others?

original: nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
analyzed: nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
translated: One abides in the end of all definite exits.

original: nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
translated: One is skilled in all definite exits.

original: des 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
analyzed: des 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
translated: One abides on the path of all definite exits.

original: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa // zhes smos te /
translated: One teaches all definite exits.

original: khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun gyi mthar thug pa ni gnyis @29b su med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun gyi mthar thug pa ni gnyis @29b su med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The ultimate end of all the Dharmas that are definite exits from the three realms is nondual wisdom.

original: de la rje btsun nyid ngang gis gnas shing /
analyzed: de la rje btsun nyid ngang gis gnas shing /
translated: The exalted one himself naturally abides in that.

original: des par 'byung ba'i chos kun ston pa la yang mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: des par 'byung ba'i chos kun ston pa la yang mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is also skilled in teaching the Dharma of definite release.

original: nyid kyang lam de la gnas pa'i tshul ston te /
analyzed: nyid kyang lam de la gnas pa'i tshul ston te /
translated: He demonstrates the way to abide in that path,

original: gzhan dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is like others.

original: gdul bya rnams la ji ltar 'tsam par 'byung ba'i chos ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams la ji ltar 'tsam par 'byung ba'i chos ston par mdzad do //
translated: He teaches the Dharma of definite release to disciples in whatever way is appropriate.

original: des gzhan don ji ltar mdzad ce na //
analyzed: des gzhan don ji ltar mdzad ce na //
translated: How does he act for the benefit of others?

original: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
translated: He has uprooted the root of existence, the twelve factors.

original: dag pa rnam ba bcu gnyis 'chang //🔽bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
analyzed: dag pa rnam ba bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
translated: He possesses the twelve aspects of purity.

original: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
analyzed: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
translated: He has the eight realizations, the aspects of the four truths.

original: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
analyzed: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
translated: He has the twelve aspects of the meaning of the truths.🔽He knows the sixteen aspects of reality.

original: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
translated: He is enlightened by the twenty aspects.🔽He is the supreme knower of all aspects of complete buddhahood.

original: rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
translated: He is the emanation body of all buddhas.

original: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po // zhes smos te /
translated: He sends out countless millions.

original: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyis ni srid pa yin te /
analyzed: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyis ni srid pa yin te /
translated: Existence is the twelve factors of dependent arising.

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung /
translated: Conditioned by ignorance, there are actions.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
translated: The condition of volitional action is consciousness.

original: rnam par shes ba'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
analyzed: rnam par shes ba'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
translated: The condition of consciousness is name and form.🔽The condition of name and form is the six sense spheres.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mchod drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mchod drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
translated: The condition of the six sense spheres is contact.

original: reg ba'i rkyen gyis len pa /
analyzed: reg ba'i rkyen gyis len pa /
translated: The condition of contact is grasping.

original: len ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
analyzed: len ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
translated: The condition of grasping is becoming.

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye len pa /🔽len ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa /🔽srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye len pa / len ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
translated: The condition of becoming is birth.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o //
translated: The condition of birth is old age and death.

original: de rnams kyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin te /
translated: The root of those is ignorance.

original: ma rig pa 'gags na de rnams 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags na de rnams 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When ignorance ceases, they cease.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen pos ma rig ba rtsa ba nas bton pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen pos ma rig ba rtsa ba nas bton pa'o //
translated: Great nondual wisdom uproots ignorance.

original: yang skye mched bcu gnyis dag pa'i tshul ni /
analyzed: yang skye mched bcu gnyis dag pa'i tshul ni /
translated: The way the twelve sense bases are purified is as follows.

original: mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba dang sgra dang / sna dang ; dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg bya dang / yid dang / chos kyi'o //
analyzed: mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba dang sgra dang / sna dang ; dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg bya dang / yid dang / chos kyi'o //
translated: The eye sense-sphere, the form sense-sphere, the ear and sound, the nose and smell, the tongue and taste, the body and touch, the mind and the mental objects.

original: yang bden pa rnam pa bzhis kyang sems can khrid par mdzad de /
analyzed: yang bden pa rnam pa bzhis kyang sems can khrid par mdzad de /
translated: Moreover, sentient beings are led by means of the four aspects of the truth.

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden ba dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'o /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden ba dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'o /
translated: The truth of suffering, the truth of the origin, the truth of cessation, and the truth of the path.

original: de dag ni thun mong gi lam mo //
analyzed: de dag ni thun mong gi lam mo //
translated: Those are the common paths.

original: khyad par gyi lam ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par gyi lam ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa ste /
translated: The special path is the realization of the nature of the eight collections of consciousness.

original: de yang tshogs bdun ni kun gzhi'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung ba yin la kun gzhi skye med du shes pas 'dres pas brgyad car skye med du shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang tshogs bdun ni kun gzhi'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung ba yin la kun gzhi skye med du shes pas 'dres pas brgyad car skye med du shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the seven collections arise by the blessing of the all-base, and by recognizing the all-base as unborn, all eight are recognized as unborn.

original: de yang 'di skad du /🔽brgyad @30a * //
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du / brgyad @30a * //
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: po skye med shes pa yis //
analyzed: po skye med shes pa yis //
translated: By recognizing the eight as unborn,

original: dgongs pa rgyal ba kun dang mnyam //
analyzed: dgongs pa rgyal ba kun dang mnyam //
translated: the transcendent state is the same as all victors.

original: zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: This is the way it is.

original: yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don sangs rgyas pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis dang yang ldan te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don sangs rgyas pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis dang yang ldan te /
translated: The ultimate meaning of authentic truth is also endowed with the twelve qualities of buddhahood:

original: rigs lnga ye shes lnga shes rab dang snying rje khyad par can no //
analyzed: rigs lnga ye shes lnga shes rab dang snying rje khyad par can no //
translated: the five families, the five pristine awarenesses, and the special union of wisdom and compassion.

original: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni stong de nyid bcu drug ste /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni stong de nyid bcu drug ste / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The sixteen aspects of that ultimate reality are the sixteen emptinesses:🔽emptiness of the inner, emptiness of the outer, emptiness of the outer and inner, emptiness of emptiness, emptiness of immensity, emptiness of the ultimate, emptiness of the conditioned,🔽emptiness of the unconditioned, emptiness of the infinite, emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, emptiness of nonrepudiation, emptiness of inherent nature, emptiness of all phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness of defining characteristics, emptiness of the nonexistence of things, and emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo po nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo po nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation, and the emptiness of the essence of non-things.

original: de ma gtogs pa sems can gyi dus na //
analyzed: de ma gtogs pa sems can gyi dus na //
translated: Apart from those, at the time of sentient beings,

original: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga ;
analyzed: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga ;
translated: the five elements such as earth,

original: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga /
translated: the five aggregates such as form,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga /
translated: the five afflictions such as desire,

original: mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga ste /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga ste /
translated: and the five sense organs such as the eyes

original: rnam pa nyi shur snang ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa nyi shur snang ba ste /
translated: appear in twenty aspects.

original: don rtogs ba'i dus na de dag kyang rigs lnga ye shes lngar shar te /
analyzed: don rtogs ba'i dus na de dag kyang rigs lnga ye shes lngar shar te /
translated: When the meaning is realized, those also arise as the five families and the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de dag tu 'dus te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de dag tu 'dus te /
translated: The qualities of a buddha are also included in those.

original: rnam pa de dag las grol nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin pas mchog go //
analyzed: rnam pa de dag las grol nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin pas mchog go //
translated: Since liberation from those aspects is the enlightenment of buddhahood, it is supreme.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: 'byung ba lnga dang nyon mongs phung po lnga //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga dang nyon mongs phung po lnga //
translated: The five elements and the five aggregates of afflictions

original: dbang po rnam lnga'i zhen pa dang bral nas //
analyzed: dbang po rnam lnga'i zhen pa dang bral nas //
translated: are free from the clinging of the five sense organs.

original: rigs lnga ye shes lngar snang la //
analyzed: rigs lnga ye shes lngar snang la //
translated: The five families and the five pristine consciousnesses appear.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub yin //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub yin //
translated: It is the enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas kun rig pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas kun rig pa'o //
translated: Since the Buddha has the exalted wisdom which knows all aspects, he is omniscient.

original: rig nas sprul pa bye ba dpag tu med pa bkye nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rig nas sprul pa bye ba dpag tu med pa bkye nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
translated: Having known, he emanates countless millions of emanations and acts for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de yang gdul bya'i blo dang 'tsham pa'i theg pa ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang gdul bya'i blo dang 'tsham pa'i theg pa ston pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, in order to teach the vehicles in accordance with the minds of those to be tamed,

original: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
analyzed: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
translated: he realizes all things in every instant.

original: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig //
translated: He knows the meaning of every instant of mind.🔽He is the knower of the meaning of beings

original: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //🔽'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis // 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
translated: through the various vehicles and methods.

original: theg pa gsum gyi des 'byung la //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi des 'byung la //
translated: He is the one who arises from the three vehicles

original: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
analyzed: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
translated: and abides in the result of the single vehicle.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: skad cig gis gdul bya'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal thams cad rig nas don mdzad de /
analyzed: skad cig gis gdul bya'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal thams cad rig nas don mdzad de /
translated: Having known all the thoughts and latent tendencies of those to be tamed in an instant, he acts for their welfare.
